(none).name: EXPLOSIVE CLEARANCE
(none).target: One unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
(none).effect: Select one model in your unit that is equipped with a weapon with the [BLAST] ability. Until the end of the phase, when determining how many models are in the target unit for the purpose of that ability, include models that are not visible to the attacking model. In addition, attacks made with that weapon can be allocated to models that are not visible to the attacking model.

(none).name: BATTLEFIELD COMMAND
(none).when: Start or end of any phase.
(none).target: One Leader unit from your army and one friendly Bodyguard unit within 6" of it that it could normally be attached to.
(none).effect: Select one of your Leader unit’s Leader abilities. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Bodyguard unit is treated as being led by that Leader unit for the purposes of that Leader ability.
(none).restrictions: Once you target a unit with this Stratagem, that unit cannot be targeted with it again until your next Command phase.

(none).name: COUNTER-OFFENSIVE
(none).when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has fought.
(none).target: One unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and that has not already been selected to fight this phase.

(none).name: COMMAND RE-ROLL
(none).when: Any phase, just after you make an Advance roll, a Charge roll, a Desperate Escape test or a Hazardous test for a unit from your army, or a Hit roll, a Wound roll, a Damage roll or a saving throw for a model in that unit, or a roll to determine the number of attacks made with a weapon equipped by a model in that unit. If you are using fast dice rolling, this Stratagem can still be used after rolling multiple rolls or saving throws at once.
(none).target: That unit or model from your army.
(none).effect: You re-roll that roll, test or saving throw. If you are using fast dice rolling, select one of those rolls or saving throws to re-roll.

(none).name: GO TO GROUND
(none).when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
(none).target: One INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
(none).effect: Until the end of the phase, all models in your unit have a 6+ invulnerable save and have the Benefit of Cover.

(none).name: INSANE BRAVERY
(none).when: Battle-shock step of your Command phase, just before you take a Battle-shock test for a unit from your army.
(none).effect: Your unit automatically passes that Battle-shock test.
(none).restrictions: You cannot use this Stratagem more than once per battle.

(none).name: EPIC CHALLENGE
(none).when: Fight phase, when a CHARACTER unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more Attached units is selected to fight.
(none).target: One CHARACTER model in your unit.
(none).effect: Until the end of the phase, all melee attacks made by that model have the [PRECISION] ability.

(none).name: HEROIC INTERVENTION
(none).when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Charge move.
(none).target: One unit from your army that is within 6" of that enemy unit and would be eligible to declare a charge against that enemy unit if it were your Charge phase.
(none).effect: Your unit now declares a charge that targets only that enemy unit, and you resolve that charge as if it were your Charge phase.
(none).restrictions: You can only select a VEHICLE unit from your army if it is a WALKER. Note that even if this charge is successful, your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

(none).name: RAPID INGRESS
(none).when: End of your opponent’s Movement phase.
(none).target: One unit from your army that is in Reserves.
(none).effect: Your unit can arrive on the battlefield as if it were the Reinforcements step of your Movement phase, and if every model in that unit has the Deep Strike ability, you can set that unit up as described in the Deep Strike ability (even though it is not your Movement phase).
(none).restrictions: You cannot use this Stratagem to enable a unit to arrive on the battlefield during a battle round it would not normally be able to do so in.

(none).name: TANK SHOCK
(none).when: Your Charge phase, just after a VEHICLE unit from your army ends a Charge move.
(none).effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit, and select one VEHICLE model in your unit that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit. Roll a number of D6 equal to the Toughness characteristic of the selected VEHICLE model. For each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).

(none).name: FIRE OVERWATCH
(none).when: Your opponent’s Movement or Charge phase, just after an enemy unit is set up or when an enemy unit starts or ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, or declares a charge.
(none).target: One unit from your army that is within 24" of that enemy unit and that would be eligible to shoot if it were your Shooting phase.
(none).effect: If that enemy unit is visible to your unit, your unit can shoot that enemy unit as if it were your Shooting phase.
(none).restrictions: You cannot target a TITANIC unit with this Stratagem. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 6 is required to score a hit.

(none).name: GRENADE
(none).target: One GRENADES unit from your army (excluding units that Advanced, Fell Back or have shot this turn) that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
(none).effect: Select one GRENADES model in your unit and one enemy unit that is not within Engagement Range of any units from your army and is within 8" of and visible to your GRENADES model. Roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

(none).name: SMOKESCREEN
(none).when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
(none).target: One SMOKE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
(none).effect: Until the end of the phase, all models in your unit have the Benefit of Cover and the Stealth ability.

(none).name: NEW ORDERS
(none).target: One of your active Secondary Mission cards.
(none).effect: Discard it and draw one new Secondary Mission card.
(none).restrictions: You can only use this Stratagem once per battle.

Tristraen’s Gilded Blades.name: The Gilded Spear
Tristraen’s Gilded Blades.target: One Adeptus Custodes unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Tristraen’s Gilded Blades.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile‑in move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3".

Tristraen’s Gilded Blades.name: Inescapable Vengeance
Tristraen’s Gilded Blades.target: One Adeptus Custodes unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
Tristraen’s Gilded Blades.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 2 to Advance rolls made for your unit.

Tristraen’s Gilded Blades.name: Overawing Magnificence
Tristraen’s Gilded Blades.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit declares a charge.
Tristraen’s Gilded Blades.target: One Adeptus Custodes unit that was selected as a target of that charge.
Tristraen’s Gilded Blades.effect: That enemy unit must take a Leadership test. If that test is failed, until the end of the phase, subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for that enemy unit.

Auric Champions.name: EARNING OF A NAME
Auric Champions.target: Up to two ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER units from your army that have not been selected to fight this phase.
Auric Champions.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a CHARACTER model in either of your units makes an attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

Auric Champions.name: THE EMPEROR’S AUSPICE
Auric Champions.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Auric Champions.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Auric Champions.effect: Until the end of the phase, CHARACTER models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

Auric Champions.name: SUPERHUMAN RESERVES
Auric Champions.when: Any phase, just after an ADEPTUS CUSTODES WARLORD model from your army has used an ability on its datasheet or from an Enhancement that says it can only be used Once per battle.
Auric Champions.effect: Your model can use its Once per battle’ ability one additional time during this battle (but not in the same phase).
Auric Champions.restrictions: You cannot use this Stratagem more than once per battle.

Auric Champions.name: SHOULDER THE MANTLE
Auric Champions.when: Your Movement phase, before the Reinforcements step.
Auric Champions.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER model from your army that is not leading a unit.
Auric Champions.effect: Select one friendly unit (excluding Battle-shocked and Attached units) within 2" horizontally and 5" vertically of your model that it could lead (as described in the Leader section of its datasheet). Your model attaches to that unit as a Leader. Change that unit’s Starting Strength accordingly.

Auric Champions.name: SLAYER OF CHAMPIONS
Auric Champions.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER unit from your army that has just destroyed the unit you selected at the start of your Command phase as the target of your Assemblage of Might ability.
Auric Champions.effect: Select one enemy unit on the battlefield Until the start of your next Command phase, each time an ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER model from your army makes an attack that target that enemy unit, add 1 to the Wound roll In addition, if the destroyed unit was a CHARACTER unit, gain 1CP.

Auric Champions.name: VIGIL UNENDING
Auric Champions.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER model from your army that was just destroyed and has not fought this phase. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
Auric Champions.effect: Do not remove your destroyed model from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making attacks, and is then removed from play.

Black Ship Guardians.name: FOCUSED FEAR
Black Ship Guardians.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Black Ship Guardians.target: One ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Black Ship Guardians.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Black Ship Guardians.name: BLADES OF THE VIGILATORS
Black Ship Guardians.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Black Ship Guardians.target: One VIGILATORS, ALEYA or KNIGHT-CENTURA equipped with an executioner greatblade unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Black Ship Guardians.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

Black Ship Guardians.name: PUNISHMENT OF THE PROSECUTORS
Black Ship Guardians.target: One PROSECUTORS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Black Ship Guardians.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1. In addition, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack, on a Critical Wound, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by an additional 1.

Black Ship Guardians.name: CORNERED PREY
Black Ship Guardians.when: Your Movement phase, just after an ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit from your army Falls Back.
Black Ship Guardians.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

Lions of the Emperor.name: PEERLESS WARRIOR
Lions of the Emperor.group: ADEPTUS CUSTODES – Lions of the Emperor
Lions of the Emperor.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Lions of the Emperor.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PRECISION] ability.

Lions of the Emperor.name: GILDED CHAMPION
Lions of the Emperor.group: ADEPTUS CUSTODES – Lions of the Emperor
Lions of the Emperor.when: Any phase, just after an ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER model from your army has used an ability on its datasheet that states it can only be used ‘once per battle’.
Lions of the Emperor.effect: Your model can use that ‘once per battle’ ability one additional time during the battle (but not in the same phase).
Lions of the Emperor.restrictions: You cannot use this Stratagem on the same ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER model more than once per battle.

Lions of the Emperor.name: DEFIANT TO THE LAST
Lions of the Emperor.group: ADEPTUS CUSTODES – Lions of the Emperor
Lions of the Emperor.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Lions of the Emperor.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Lions of the Emperor.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 2 to the result if that model has the CHARACTER keyword. On a 4+, do not remove it from play; the destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks (when doing so, it is treated as having 1 wound remaining), and is then removed from play.

Lions of the Emperor.name: MANOEUVRE AND FIRE
Lions of the Emperor.group: ADEPTUS CUSTODES – Lions of the Emperor
Lions of the Emperor.when: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army Falls Back.
Lions of the Emperor.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

Lions of the Emperor.name: UNLEASH THE LIONS
Lions of the Emperor.group: ADEPTUS CUSTODES – Lions of the Emperor
Lions of the Emperor.target: One ALLARUS CUSTODIANS or AQUILON CUSTODIANS unit from your army that is on the battlefield.
Lions of the Emperor.effect: That unit is split into separate units, each containing one model. These new units each have a Starting Strength of 1.

Lions of the Emperor.name: SWIFT AS THE EAGLE
Lions of the Emperor.group: ADEPTUS CUSTODES – Lions of the Emperor
Lions of the Emperor.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
Lions of the Emperor.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army (excluding VEHICLE units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Lions of the Emperor.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6".

Null Maiden Vigil.name: ANATHEMA BLADEMASTERY
Null Maiden Vigil.target: One VIGILATORS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Null Maiden Vigil.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a melee attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll If the target of that attack is Battle-shocked or a PSYKER, you can re-roll the Wound roll as well.

Null Maiden Vigil.name: PURGATION SWEEP
Null Maiden Vigil.target: One WITCHSEEKERS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Null Maiden Vigil.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of Torrent weapons equipped by models in your unit. If such a weapon targets a PSYKER or Battle-shocked unit this phase, add 2 to its Attacks characteristic instead.

Null Maiden Vigil.name: WITCH HUNTERS
Null Maiden Vigil.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Null Maiden Vigil.target: One ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Null Maiden Vigil.effect: Select either the [LETHAL HITS] or [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have the selected ability, but models in your unit can only target PSYKER units with their attacks.

Null Maiden Vigil.name: DESPERATION’S PRICE
Null Maiden Vigil.when: Any phase, just after an enemy PSYKER unit has either finished using a Psychic ability that targets a unit, or finished making Psychic Attacks.
Null Maiden Vigil.target: One ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit from your army within 18" of that enemy PSYKER unit.
Null Maiden Vigil.effect: That enemy PSYKER unit must take a Leadership test If the test is passed, that PSYKER unit is Battle-shocked; if the test is failed that PSYKER unit suffers 3 mortal wounds and is Battle-shocked.

Null Maiden Vigil.name: PSY-CHAFF VOLLEY
Null Maiden Vigil.target: One PROSECUTORS unit from your army that has just shot.
Null Maiden Vigil.effect: Select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next turn, while your unit is on the battlefield, that enemy unit is prosecuted. While a unit is prosecuted, each time an ANATHEMA PSYKANA model makes an attack against that unit, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1. While a PSYKER or Battle-shocked unit is prosecuted, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

Null Maiden Vigil.name: PSYCHIC ABOMINATIONS
Null Maiden Vigil.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Null Maiden Vigil.target: One ANATHEMA PSYKANA INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Null Maiden Vigil.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit has the Stealth ability, and Battle-shocked and PSYKER models can only select your unit as a target of a ranged attack if they are within 12".

Shield Host.name: ARCHEOTECH MUNITIONS
Shield Host.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army (excluding ANATHEMA PSYKANA units) that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Shield Host.effect: Select either the [LETHAL HITS] or [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. Until the end of the phase ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the selected ability.

Shield Host.name: ARCANE GENETIC ALCHEMY
Shield Host.when: Any phase, just after a mortal wound has been allocated to an ADEPTUS CUSTODES model from your army(excluding ANATHEMA PSYKANA models).
Shield Host.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against mortal wounds.

Shield Host.name: VIGILANCE ETERNAL
Shield Host.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES BATTLELINE unit from your army (excluding ANATHEMA PSYKANA units) within range of an objective marker you control.
Shield Host.effect: That objective marker remains under your control even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

Shield Host.name: MULTIPOTENTIALITY
Shield Host.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army that Fell Back this phase.
Shield Host.effect: Until the end of your turn, that unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

Shield Host.name: UNWAVERING SENTINELS
Shield Host.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Shield Host.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES INFANTRY unit from your army (excluding ANATHEMA PSYKANA units) that is within range of an objective marker you control and that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Shield Host.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a melee attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

Shield Host.name: AVENGE THE FALLEN
Shield Host.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army (excluding ANATHEMA PSYKANA units) that is below its Starting Strength.
Shield Host.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in that unit. If your unit is Below Half-strength, until the end of the phase, add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of those melee weapons instead.

Solar Spearhead.name: WRATHFUL ADVANCE
Solar Spearhead.when: Fight phase, just before an ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army Piles In.
Solar Spearhead.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile-in move, it can move up to D3+3" instead of up to 3".

Solar Spearhead.name: EMPEROR’S VENGEANCE
Solar Spearhead.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Solar Spearhead.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Solar Spearhead.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if your unit has the WALKER keyword. On a 4+, do not remove it from play; The destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks (when doing so, it is assumed to have 1 wound remaining), and is then removed from play.

Solar Spearhead.name: FLAWLESS CONSTRUCTION
Solar Spearhead.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Solar Spearhead.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES VEHICLE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Solar Spearhead.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets a model in your unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

Solar Spearhead.name: PUNISHMENT INESCAPABLE
Solar Spearhead.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Solar Spearhead.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability, and until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to that attack’s Ballistic Skill characteristic and/or any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

Solar Spearhead.name: UNSTOPPABLE
Solar Spearhead.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
Solar Spearhead.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES VEHICLE or ADEPTUS CUSTODES MOUNTED unit from your army.
Solar Spearhead.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a move, it can move through terrain features.

Solar Spearhead.name: RELENTLESS PERSECUTION
Solar Spearhead.when: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTUS CUSTODES VEHICLE unit from your army Advances.
Solar Spearhead.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Advanced. If your unit has the WALKER keyword, until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced instead.

Talons Of The Emperor.name: EMPYRIC SEVERANCE
Talons Of The Emperor.group: ADEPTUS CUSTODES – Talons Of The Emperor
Talons Of The Emperor.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Talons Of The Emperor.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks, and one friendly ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit within 6" of that ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit.
Talons Of The Emperor.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit has the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against Psychic attacks and mortal wounds.

Talons Of The Emperor.name: EMPEROR’S EXECUTIONERS
Talons Of The Emperor.group: ADEPTUS CUSTODES – Talons Of The Emperor
Talons Of The Emperor.target: Up to two ADEPTUS CUSTODES units from your army.
Talons Of The Emperor.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in one of your units targets an enemy unit that is below its Starting Strength, add 1 to the Wound roll.
Talons Of The Emperor.restrictions: You can only select two units if one (and only one) of them is an ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit and both are within 6" of each other.

Talons Of The Emperor.name: TALONED PINCER
Talons Of The Emperor.group: ADEPTUS CUSTODES – Talons Of The Emperor
Talons Of The Emperor.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
Talons Of The Emperor.target: Up to two ADEPTUS CUSTODES units from your army that are within 9" of that enemy unit.
Talons Of The Emperor.effect: Your units can make a Normal move of up to 6".
Talons Of The Emperor.restrictions: You cannot select units that are within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units. You can only select two units if one (and only one) of them is an ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit and both are within 6" of each other.

Talons Of The Emperor.name: TALONS INTERLOCKED
Talons Of The Emperor.group: ADEPTUS CUSTODES – Talons Of The Emperor
Talons Of The Emperor.target: Up to two ADEPTUS CUSTODES INFANTRY units from your army, and one enemy unit that is an eligible target for all of those units.
Talons Of The Emperor.effect: Until the end of the phase, your units can only target that enemy unit, but each time a model in one of your units makes a ranged attack, improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of that attack by 1.
Talons Of The Emperor.restrictions: You can only select two units if one (and only one) of them is an ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit and both are within 6" of each other.

Talons Of The Emperor.name: SHIELD OF HONOUR
Talons Of The Emperor.group: ADEPTUS CUSTODES – Talons Of The Emperor
Talons Of The Emperor.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Talons Of The Emperor.target: One ANATHEMA PSYKANA INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks, and one other friendly ADEPTUS CUSTODES INFANTRY unit (excluding ANATHEMA PSYKANA units) within 6" of that ANATHEMA PSYKANA INFANTRY unit.
Talons Of The Emperor.effect: Until the end of the phase, any attack that targets your ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit must instead target your other ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit (unless it is not an eligible target).

Talons Of The Emperor.name: HUNT AS ONE
Talons Of The Emperor.group: ADEPTUS CUSTODES – Talons Of The Emperor
Talons Of The Emperor.target: Up to two ADEPTUS CUSTODES units from your army.
Talons Of The Emperor.effect: Until the end of the turn, your units are eilgible to shoot and/or declare a charge in a turn in which they Fell Back.
Talons Of The Emperor.restrictions: You can only select two units if one (and only one) of them is an ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit and both are within 6" of each other.

Voyagers in Darkness.name: ARTIFICER ROUNDS
Voyagers in Darkness.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Voyagers in Darkness.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit (excluding ballistus grenade launchers) have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability while targeting units within 6".

Voyagers in Darkness.name: BREACHING BEHEMOTHS
Voyagers in Darkness.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army (excluding ANATHEMA PSYKANA units) that has not been selected to move this phase.
Voyagers in Darkness.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, models in your unit can move through other models as if they were not there. In addition, any Desperate Escape tests taken for models in your unit are automatically passed.

Voyagers in Darkness.name: INESCAPABLE VENGEANCE
Voyagers in Darkness.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army (excluding ANATHEMA PSYKANA units) that has not been selected to move this phase.
Voyagers in Darkness.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile-in or Consolidation move, it can ignore Walls and other models for the purposes of determining which enemy units are visible to its own.

Voyagers in Darkness.name: AURIC STORM
Voyagers in Darkness.when: Your Charge phase, just after an ALLARUS CUSTODIANS unit from your army ends a Charge move.
Voyagers in Darkness.effect: Each enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result.

Purge Corps Deltic-9.name: An Evaluation of Mettle
Purge Corps Deltic-9.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Purge Corps Deltic-9.target: One Adeptus Mechanicus unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Purge Corps Deltic-9.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

Purge Corps Deltic-9.name: Optimised Efficiency
Purge Corps Deltic-9.when: Your Movement phase, just after an Adeptus Mechanicus unit from your army Falls Back.
Purge Corps Deltic-9.effect: Until the end of the turn, that unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge this turn, even though it Fell Back.

Purge Corps Deltic-9.name: Acceptable Risk Ratio
Purge Corps Deltic-9.target: One Adeptus Mechanicus unit from your army.
Purge Corps Deltic-9.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1, and those weapons gain the [Hazardous] ability.

Cohort Cybernetica.name: BENEVOLENCE OF THE OMNISSIAH
Cohort Cybernetica.target: One LEGIO CYBERNETICA or ADEPTUS MECHANICUS VEHICLE unit from your army.
Cohort Cybernetica.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain  6+ ability, which is improved to Feel No Pain 5+ against mortal wounds.

Cohort Cybernetica.name: MOTIVE IMPERATIVE
Cohort Cybernetica.target: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS VEHICLE unit from your army.
Cohort Cybernetica.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, add 3" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit and add 1 to Advance and Charge rolls made for it.

Cohort Cybernetica.name: AUTO-DIVINATORY TARGETING
Cohort Cybernetica.target: One LEGIO CYBERNETICA or ADEPTUS MECHANICUS VEHICLE unit from your army, and one objective marker.
Cohort Cybernetica.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have a Ballistic Skill characteristic of 3+ and the [IGNORES COVER] ability, but they can only target units within range of the selected objective marker.

Cohort Cybernetica.name: MACHINE SPIRIT RESURGENT
Cohort Cybernetica.target: One LEGIO CYBERNETICA or ADEPTUS MECHANICUS VEHICLE unit from your army that is below its Starting Strength.
Cohort Cybernetica.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll. If your unit is Below Half-strength, you can re-roll the Wound roll as well.

Cohort Cybernetica.name: MACHINE SUPERIORITY
Cohort Cybernetica.target: One LEGIO CYBERNETICA or ADEPTUS MECHANICUS VEHICLE unit from your army.
Cohort Cybernetica.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back and you can ignore any or all modifiers to its characteristics and/or to any roll or test made for it (excluding modifiers to saving throws).

Cohort Cybernetica.name: TRANSCENDENT COGITATION
Cohort Cybernetica.target: One LEGIO CYBERNETICA or ADEPTUS MECHANICUS VEHICLE unit from your army.
Cohort Cybernetica.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, the Conqueror Imperative and Protector Imperative are both active for your unit.

Data-Psalm Conclave.name: LUMINESCENT BLESSING
Data-Psalm Conclave.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Data-Psalm Conclave.target: One CULT MECHANICUS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Data-Psalm Conclave.effect: Until the end of the phase, CULT MECHANICUS models in your unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.

Data-Psalm Conclave.name: CHANT OF THE REMORSELESS FIST
Data-Psalm Conclave.target: One CULT MECHANICUS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Data-Psalm Conclave.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a CULT MECHANICUS model in your unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

Data-Psalm Conclave.name: INCANTATION OF THE IRON SOUL
Data-Psalm Conclave.when: Any phase, just after you allocate a mortal wound to a CULT MECHANICUS model from your army.
Data-Psalm Conclave.effect: Until the end of the phase, CULT MECHANICUS models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against mortal wounds.

Data-Psalm Conclave.name: VERSE OF VENGEANCE
Data-Psalm Conclave.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Data-Psalm Conclave.target: One CULT MECHANICUS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Data-Psalm Conclave.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a CULT MECHANICUS model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model’s unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

Data-Psalm Conclave.name: LITANY OF THE ELECTROMANCER
Data-Psalm Conclave.target: One CULT MECHANICUS unit from your army.
Data-Psalm Conclave.effect: Roll one D6 for each enemy unit within 6" of one or more CULT MECHANICUS models in your unit, adding 1 to the result if that model is an ELECTRO-PRIEST. On a 5+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

Data-Psalm Conclave.name: TRIBUTE OF EMPHATIC VENERATION
Data-Psalm Conclave.target: One CULT MECHANICUS unit from your army and one enemy unit within 18" of it.
Data-Psalm Conclave.effect: That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test. If that test is failed, until the start of your next Command phase, each time a model in that enemy unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

Electromartyrs.name: OMNI-TARGETERS
Electromartyrs.target: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Electromartyrs.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PISTOL] ability. If one or more of those weapons already have this ability, then until the end of the phase, each time an attack is made with such a weapon that targets a unit within 6", add 1 to the Hit roll.

Electromartyrs.name: SAVIOUR SYSTEMS
Electromartyrs.target: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army (excluding KATAPHRON units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Electromartyrs.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

Electromartyrs.name: BALLISTIC SYNCHRONY
Electromartyrs.target: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Electromartyrs.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

Electromartyrs.name: AUTO-VENGEANCE
Electromartyrs.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Electromartyrs.target: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Electromartyrs.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 3+, do not remove it from play. That destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

Explorator Maniple.name: PRIORITY RECLAMATION
Explorator Maniple.when: Fight phase, just before an ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army Consolidates.
Explorator Maniple.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3", provided your unit ends that Consolidation move within range of your Acquisition objective marker.
Explorator Maniple.restrictions: You cannot target a unit with this Stratagem if it is within 3" of one or more enemy units.

Explorator Maniple.name: AUTO-ORACULAR RETRIEVAL
Explorator Maniple.target: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army that disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn.
Explorator Maniple.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit within range of your Acquisition objective marker, add 1 to the Wound roll.

Explorator Maniple.name: CACHED ACQUISITION
Explorator Maniple.target: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army that was just destroyed while it was within range of an objective marker you controlled. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
Explorator Maniple.effect: That objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

Explorator Maniple.name: REACTIVE SAFEGUARD
Explorator Maniple.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit has declared a charge.
Explorator Maniple.target: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS INFANTRY unit from your army within range of your Acquisition objective marker that was selected as a target of that charge, and one friendly ADEPTUS MECHANICUS TRANSPORT.
Explorator Maniple.effect: Your unit can embark within that TRANSPORT.
Explorator Maniple.restrictions: Every model in your unit must be within 3" of that TRANSPORT and there must be sufficient transport capacity to embark the entire unit.

Explorator Maniple.name: INCENSE EXHAUSTS
Explorator Maniple.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Explorator Maniple.target: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks, and one friendly ADEPTUS MECHANICUS SMOKE unit within 6" of it.
Explorator Maniple.effect: Until the end of the phase, both of those units have the Stealth ability and the Benefit of Cover.

Explorator Maniple.name: INFOSLAVE SKULL
Explorator Maniple.target: One TECH-PRIEST model from your army and one objective marker within 24" of that model (excluding your Acquisition objective marker].
Explorator Maniple.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, that objective marker is also considered to be one of your Acquisition objective markers for all rules purposes.

Haloscreed Battle Clade.name: ERADICATION PROTOCOLS
Haloscreed Battle Clade.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Haloscreed Battle Clade.target: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Haloscreed Battle Clade.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1, and, if it is a HALO OVERRIDE unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

Haloscreed Battle Clade.name: TARGETING OVERRIDE
Haloscreed Battle Clade.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Haloscreed Battle Clade.target: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Haloscreed Battle Clade.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

Haloscreed Battle Clade.name: NEURAL OVERLOAD
Haloscreed Battle Clade.target: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army.
Haloscreed Battle Clade.effect: If your unit is a HALO OVERRIDE unit, it suffers D3 mortal wounds. Select one Override ability. Until the start of your next Command phase, that ability is active for your unit. Designer’s Note: This means that if the targeted unit already has the HALO OVERRIDE keyword, it can be affected by multiple Override abilities at the same time, but suffers mortal wounds to do so. Alternatively, if your unit does not have the HALO OVERRIDE keyword, it instead has the chosen Override ability until the start of your next Command phase, but does not benefit from any other Override abilities that are active.

Haloscreed Battle Clade.name: AGGRESSIVE IMPULSE
Haloscreed Battle Clade.target: One SKORPIUS DUNERIDER model from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
Haloscreed Battle Clade.effect: Until the end of the turn, each time an ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit disembarks from that model after it has made a Normal move, that unit is still eligible to declare a charge this turn.

Haloscreed Battle Clade.name: GUIDED RETREAT
Haloscreed Battle Clade.when: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army makes a Fall Back move.
Haloscreed Battle Clade.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back, and, if it is a HALO OVERRIDE unit, you can re-roll Desperate Escape tests taken for it.

Haloscreed Battle Clade.name: ANALYTICAL DIVINATION
Haloscreed Battle Clade.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
Haloscreed Battle Clade.target: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS INFANTRY unit (excluding KATAPHRON units) from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Haloscreed Battle Clade.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6", or up to 6" instead if it is a HALO OVERRIDE unit.

Machine Cult.name: OMNISSIAH’S GUIDANCE
Machine Cult.target: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Machine Cult.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit can ignore other models in their unit for the purposes of determining visibility.

Machine Cult.name: TETHER-TENDRILS
Machine Cult.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit is selected to Fall Back.
Machine Cult.target: One TECH-PRIEST or ELECTRO-PRIESTS unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
Machine Cult.effect: Until the end of the phase, when that enemy unit Falls Back, models in it must take Desperate Escape tests as if their unit was Battle-shocked. When doing so, if that enemy unit is also Battle-shocked by other means, subtract 1 from each of those Desperate Escape tests.

Machine Cult.name: POWER OF THE MOTIVE FORCE
Machine Cult.target: One ELECTRO-PRIESTS unit from your army.
Machine Cult.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

Machine Cult.name: ELECTROGHEIST VISITATIONS
Machine Cult.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Machine Cult.target: One ELECTRO-PRIESTS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Machine Cult.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, if the attacking model is within 6” of your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

Rad-Zone Corps.name: AGGRESSOR IMPERATIVE
Rad-Zone Corps.target: One SKITARII unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase. If that unit is BATTLELINE, you can also target one friendly SKITARII unit (excluding BATTLELINE units) within 6" of it.
Rad-Zone Corps.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time one of those units Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in that unit.

Rad-Zone Corps.name: PRE-CALIBRATED PURGE SOLUTION
Rad-Zone Corps.target: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase. If that unit is BATTLELINE, you can also target one friendly SKITARII unit (excluding BATTLELINE units) within 6" of it.
Rad-Zone Corps.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in one of those units makes a ranged attack, if the target of that attack is within your opponent’s deployment zone, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

Rad-Zone Corps.name: BULWARK IMPERATIVE
Rad-Zone Corps.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Rad-Zone Corps.target: One SKITARII unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks. If that unit is BATTLELINE, you can also target one friendly SKITARII unit (excluding BATTLELINE units) within 6" of it.
Rad-Zone Corps.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in those units from your army have a 4+ invulnerable save.

Rad-Zone Corps.name: BALEFUL HALO
Rad-Zone Corps.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Rad-Zone Corps.target: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army (excluding VEHICLE units) that was selected as the target of one or more of that enemy unit’s attacks. If that unit is BATTLELINE, you can also target one friendly SKITARII unit (excluding BATTLELINE units) within 6" of it.
Rad-Zone Corps.effect: Until the end of the turn, each time an attack is made that targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

Rad-Zone Corps.name: EXTINCTION ORDER
Rad-Zone Corps.target: One TECH-PRIEST model from your army and one objective marker within 24" of that model.
Rad-Zone Corps.effect: Roll one D6 for each enemy unit within range of that objective marker. On a 4+, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound and it must take a Battle-shock test.

Rad-Zone Corps.name: LETHAL DOSAGE
Rad-Zone Corps.target: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Rad-Zone Corps.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

Response Clade.name: PRECOGNITATED FIREFIELDS
Response Clade.target: One SKITARII unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Response Clade.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. If your unit has the BATTLELINE keyword, those weapons have the [SUSTAINED HITS 2] ability instead.

Response Clade.name: ACCESS OVERRIDES
Response Clade.target: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase and is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Response Clade.effect: Select one closed Hatchway within 1" of your unit. Your unit can attempt to operate that Hatchway.
Response Clade.restrictions: Until the end of the turn, your unit cannot attempt to operate a Hatchway again.

Response Clade.name: INTEGRATIVE WITHDRAWAL
Response Clade.target: One SKITARII unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Response Clade.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back. In addition, after your unit has shot this phase, if it is within 1" of an open Hatchway and is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, you can close that Hatchway.

Response Clade.name: RESPONSIVE SHIELDING
Response Clade.when: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Response Clade.target: One SKITARII unit from your army that is within range of an objective marker and was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Response Clade.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.

Skitarii Hunter Cohort.name: SHROUD PROTOCOLS
Skitarii Hunter Cohort.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Skitarii Hunter Cohort.target: One SKITARII INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Skitarii Hunter Cohort.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 18".

Skitarii Hunter Cohort.name: BIONIC ENDURANCE
Skitarii Hunter Cohort.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase orthe Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Skitarii Hunter Cohort.target: One SICARIAN, PTERAXII or SYDONIAN unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Skitarii Hunter Cohort.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

Skitarii Hunter Cohort.name: ISOLATE AND DESTROY
Skitarii Hunter Cohort.target: One SICARIAN, PTERAXII, SYDONIAN, IRONSTRIDER BALLISTARII or SKITARII MOUNTED unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Skitarii Hunter Cohort.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, if there are no other enemy units within 6" of the unit targeted by that attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

Skitarii Hunter Cohort.name: EXPEDITED PURGE PROTOCOL
Skitarii Hunter Cohort.target: One SKITARII unit from your army.
Skitarii Hunter Cohort.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

Skitarii Hunter Cohort.name: BINHARIC OFFENCE
Skitarii Hunter Cohort.when: The start of your Shooting phase or the start of the Fight phase.
Skitarii Hunter Cohort.target: Two SKITARII units from your army that have not been selected to shoot or fight this phase, and one enemy unit.
Skitarii Hunter Cohort.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of weapons equipped by models in both of your units by 1.
Skitarii Hunter Cohort.restrictions: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in either of your units makes an attack, it can only target that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target].

Skitarii Hunter Cohort.name: PROGRAMMED WITHDRAWAL
Skitarii Hunter Cohort.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
Skitarii Hunter Cohort.target: Up to two SICARIAN units from your army, or one SKITARII INFANTRY or SKITARII MOUNTED unit from your army.
Skitarii Hunter Cohort.effect: Remove those units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves.
Skitarii Hunter Cohort.restrictions: Each unit targeted with this Stratagem must be more than 3" away from all enemy units.

The Fatebreakers.name: Whip-fast Reactions
The Fatebreakers.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
The Fatebreakers.target: One Aeldari Infantry or Aeldari Mounted unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
The Fatebreakers.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

The Fatebreakers.name: Storm of Shots
The Fatebreakers.target: Up to two Aeldari Mounted units from your army, or one Aeldari Infantry unit from your army.
The Fatebreakers.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in one of those units makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

The Fatebreakers.name: Zephyr-swift
The Fatebreakers.target: Up to two Aeldari Mounted units from your army that are not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, or one Aeldari Infantry unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
The Fatebreakers.effect: Each of those units can make a Normal move of up to 6".
The Fatebreakers.restrictions: Until the end of the turn, those units are not eligible to declare a charge.

Armoured Warhost.name: CLOUDSTRIKE
Armoured Warhost.when: Start of the Reinforcements step of your Movement phase.
Armoured Warhost.target: One AELDARI VEHICLE unit from your army that can FLY and is in Strategic Reserves.
Armoured Warhost.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit has the Deep Strike ability. When your unit is set up on the battlefield using the Deep Strike ability, it can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy units, but if it does, until the end of the turn, it is not eligible to declare a charge. In addition, if your unit is a TRANSPORT, each unit that disembarks from it this turn must be set up more than 6" horizontally from all enemy units and until the end of the turn, is not eligible to declare a charge.

Armoured Warhost.name: ANTI‑GRAV REPULSION
Armoured Warhost.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit has declared a charge.
Armoured Warhost.target: One AELDARI VEHICLE unit from your army that can FLY and was selected as a target of that charge.
Armoured Warhost.effect: Until the end of the phase, subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for that enemy unit.

Armoured Warhost.name: SOULSIGHT
Armoured Warhost.target: One AELDARI VEHICLE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Armoured Warhost.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit is selected to shoot, you can re-roll one Hit roll, one Wound roll and one Damage roll made for a model in your unit. If you are using fast dice rolling, you can select one of those rolls to re-roll before moving onto the next step of the attack sequence.

Armoured Warhost.name: VECTORED ENGINES
Armoured Warhost.when: Your Movement phase, just after an AELDARI VEHICLE unit from your army that can FLY Falls Back.
Armoured Warhost.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back.

Armoured Warhost.name: SWIFT DEPLOYMENT
Armoured Warhost.target: One AELDARI TRANSPORT unit from your army.
Armoured Warhost.effect: Until the end of the phase, units can disembark from your TRANSPORT after it has Advanced. Units that do so count as having made a Normal move that phase, and cannot declare a charge in the same turn, but can otherwise act normally.

Armoured Warhost.name: LAYERED WARDS
Armoured Warhost.when: Any phase, just after a mortal wound is allocated to an AELDARI VEHICLE unit from your army.
Armoured Warhost.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against mortal wounds.

Aspect Host.name: WARRIOR FOCUS
Aspect Host.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Aspect Host.target: One ASPECT WARRIORS or AVATAR OF KHAINE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Aspect Host.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to that attack’s Ballistic Skill, Weapon skill, Strength, Armour Penetration and Damage characteristics and/or any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

Aspect Host.name: DOOM INESCAPABLE
Aspect Host.target: One AVATAR OF KHAINE model from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Aspect Host.effect: Until the end of the phase, your model’s Wailing Doom ranged weapon has a Range characteristic of 18" and a Damage characteristic of 8.

Aspect Host.name: PRETERNATURAL PRECISION
Aspect Host.target: One ASPECT WARRIORS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Aspect Host.effect: Each time you use this Stratagem, you can remove one Aspect Shrine token your unit has (see datasheets). Then, select one of the following abilities, or select two of the following abilities if you removed an Aspect Shrine token during this usage of this Stratagem: [IGNORES COVER], [LETHAL HITS], [SUSTAINED HITS 1]. Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the selected abilities.

Aspect Host.name: SKYBORNE SANCTUARY
Aspect Host.target: One ASURYANI unit from your army and one friendly TRANSPORT it is able to embark within.
Aspect Host.effect: If your ASURYANI unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and is wholly within 6" of that TRANSPORT, it can embark within it.

Aspect Host.name: KHAINE’S VENGEANCE
Aspect Host.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) is selected to Fall Back.
Aspect Host.target: One ASPECT WARRIORS or AVATAR OF KHAINE unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
Aspect Host.effect: All models in that enemy unit must take a Desperate Escape test. When doing so, if that enemy unit is Battle-shocked, subtract 1 from each of those tests.

Aspect Host.name: TO THEIR FINAL BREATH
Aspect Host.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Aspect Host.target: One ASPECT WARRIORS or AVATAR OF KHAINE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Aspect Host.effect: Each time you use this Stratagem, you can remove one Aspect Shrine token your unit has (see datasheets). Then, until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if you removed an Aspect Shrine token during this usage of this Stratagem. On a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

Devoted of Ynnead.name: MACABRE RESILIENCE
Devoted of Ynnead.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Devoted of Ynnead.target: One YNNARI INFANTRY or YNNARI MOUNTED unit from your army (excluding WRAITH CONSTRUCT units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Devoted of Ynnead.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

Devoted of Ynnead.name: EMISSARIES OF YNNEAD
Devoted of Ynnead.when: Fight phase, just after a YNNARI INFANTRY unit from your army has selected its targets.
Devoted of Ynnead.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. If your unit is below its Starting Strength, you can re-roll the Hit roll instead.

Devoted of Ynnead.name: SOULSIGHT
Devoted of Ynnead.target: One YNNARI unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Devoted of Ynnead.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LETHAL HITS] and [IGNORES COVER] abilities.

Devoted of Ynnead.name: DEATH ANSWERS DEATH
Devoted of Ynnead.when: End of your opponent’s Shooting phase.
Devoted of Ynnead.target: One YNNARI unit from your army (excluding WRAITH CONSTRUCT units), if one or more models in that unit were destroyed this phase.
Devoted of Ynnead.effect: Your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase.

Devoted of Ynnead.name: PALL OF DREAD
Devoted of Ynnead.target: One YNNARI unit from your army that was just destroyed while it was within range of one or more objective markers you controlled at the end of the previous phase. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
Devoted of Ynnead.effect: Select one of those objective markers. That objective marker remains under your control until your opponent’s Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase.

Devoted of Ynnead.name: PARTING THE VEIL
Devoted of Ynnead.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Devoted of Ynnead.target: One YNNARI unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Devoted of Ynnead.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

Ghosts of the Webway.name: HEROES’ FALL
Ghosts of the Webway.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Ghosts of the Webway.target: One HARLEQUINS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Ghosts of the Webway.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6. On a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

Ghosts of the Webway.name: MOCKING FLIGHT
Ghosts of the Webway.when: Your Movement phase, just after a HARLEQUINS unit from your army Falls Back.
Ghosts of the Webway.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

Ghosts of the Webway.name: TRICKSTERS’ RETORT
Ghosts of the Webway.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
Ghosts of the Webway.target: One TROUPE unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit.
Ghosts of the Webway.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".

Ghosts of the Webway.name: BLOODY DANCE
Ghosts of the Webway.when: End of your opponent’s Charge phase.
Ghosts of the Webway.target: One HARLEQUINS INFANTRY or HARLEQUINS MOUNTED unit from your army that is within 6" of one or more enemy units and would be eligible to declare a charge against one or more of those enemy units if it were your Charge phase.
Ghosts of the Webway.effect: Your unit now declares a charge that only targets one or more of those enemy units, and you resolve that charge.
Ghosts of the Webway.restrictions: Note that even if this charge is successful, your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

Ghosts of the Webway.name: EXIT THE STAGE
Ghosts of the Webway.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
Ghosts of the Webway.target: One HARLEQUINS unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Ghosts of the Webway.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

Ghosts of the Webway.name: STAGED DEATH
Ghosts of the Webway.target: One HARLEQUINS CHARACTER model from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.
Ghosts of the Webway.effect: At the end of the phase, set your model back up on the battlefield as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with half of its starting number of wounds remaining.
Ghosts of the Webway.restrictions: Each model can only be targeted with this Stratagem once per battle.

Guardian Battlehost.name: WARDING SALVOES
Guardian Battlehost.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Guardian Battlehost.target: One DIRE AVENGERS or GUARDIANS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Guardian Battlehost.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets an enemy unit within range of one or more objective markers, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

Guardian Battlehost.name: SHIELD NODES
Guardian Battlehost.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Guardian Battlehost.target: One DIRE AVENGERS or GUARDIANS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Guardian Battlehost.effect: If your unit is within range of one or more objective markers, until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

Guardian Battlehost.name: VAUL’S VENGEANCE
Guardian Battlehost.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit destroys a DIRE AVENGERS or GUARDIANS unit from your army.
Guardian Battlehost.target: One WAR WALKERS unit from your army.
Guardian Battlehost.effect: After that enemy unit has finished making its attacks, your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but when resolving those attacks, it can only target that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target).
Guardian Battlehost.restrictions: You can only use this Stratagem once per battle round.

Guardian Battlehost.name: BLADES OF ASURYAN
Guardian Battlehost.target: One DIRE AVENGERS or GUARDIANS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Guardian Battlehost.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PISTOL] ability.

Guardian Battlehost.name: COST OF VICTORY
Guardian Battlehost.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
Guardian Battlehost.target: One GUARDIANS unit from your army.
Guardian Battlehost.effect: If your unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, remove it from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves. When doing so, return every destroyed GUARDIANS model to your unit.

Guardian Battlehost.name: TIME TO STRIKE
Guardian Battlehost.target: One STORM GUARDIANS unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
Guardian Battlehost.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit. Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

Khaine’s Arrow.name: AURIC STORM
Khaine’s Arrow.target: One DIRE AVENGERS, FIRE DRAGONS, SWOOPING HAWKS or WARP SPIDERS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Khaine’s Arrow.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

Khaine’s Arrow.name: VOID GHOSTS
Khaine’s Arrow.when: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Khaine’s Arrow.target: One AELDARI unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Khaine’s Arrow.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

Khaine’s Arrow.name: BLADEFOCUS
Khaine’s Arrow.target: One HOWLING BANSHEES or STRIKING SCORPIONS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Khaine’s Arrow.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, if it made a Charge move this turn, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

Khaine’s Arrow.name: ARTIFICER ROUNDS
Khaine’s Arrow.target: One AELDARI unit from your army (excluding CHARACTER units).
Khaine’s Arrow.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in your unit. In addition, at the end of your turn, select one objective marker you control that your unit is within range of. That objective marker is Secured by your army.

Protector Host.name: SHURIKEN STORM
Protector Host.target: One AELDARI unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Protector Host.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Strength characteristic of Avenger shuriken catapults, shuriken catapults, shuriken pistols and shuriken cannons equipped by models in your unit.

Protector Host.name: VOID GHOSTS
Protector Host.when: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Protector Host.target: One AELDARI unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Protector Host.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

Protector Host.name: SHIELD OF BLADES
Protector Host.when: Your opponent’s Movement or Charge phase.
Protector Host.target: One DIRE AVENGERS or GUARDIAN DEFENDERS unit from your army that has not fired Overwatch this phase.
Protector Host.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack while firing Overwatch, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ is required to score a hit, instead of an unmodified 6.

Protector Host.name: RAPID AMBUSH
Protector Host.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit opens a Hatchway.
Protector Host.target: One DIRE AVENGERS or GUARDIANS unit from your army that has not fired Overwatch this phase and is wholly on the opposite side of that Hatchway from that enemy unit.
Protector Host.effect: If that enemy unit is within 9" of and visible to your unit, roll one D6: on a 2-5, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound; on a 6, that enemy unit suffers 2 mortal wounds. If that enemy unit suffers one or more mortal wounds in this way, your unit can then make a Normal move of up to D6”.
Protector Host.restrictions: Until the end of the turn, your unit cannot fire Overwatch.

Seer Council.name: FATE INESCAPABLE
Seer Council.target: One ASURYANI INFANTRY unit from your army (excluding WRAITH CONSTRUCT units) that has not been selected to shoot this phase and is within 9" of one or more friendly ASURYANI PSYKER models.
Seer Council.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability and each time a model in your unit makes an attack, on a Critical Wound, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Seer Council.name: ISHA’S FURY
Seer Council.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
Seer Council.target: One ASURYANI PSYKER model from your army within 9" of that enemy unit.
Seer Council.effect: Roll six D6: for each 3+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

Seer Council.name: PRESENTIMENT OF DREAD
Seer Council.target: One ASURYANI PSYKER model from your army.
Seer Council.effect: Select one enemy unit within 18" of and visible to your model. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from that test.

Seer Council.name: FOREWARNED
Seer Council.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Seer Council.target: One ASURYANI INFANTRY unit from your army (excluding WRAITH CONSTRUCT units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks and is within 9" of one or more friendly ASURYANI PSYKER models.
Seer Council.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll and subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

Seer Council.name: UNSHROUDED TRUTH
Seer Council.target: One ASURYANI INFANTRY unit from your army (excluding WRAITH CONSTRUCT units) that has not been selected to move this phase, was not set up on the battlefield this phase, and is within 9" of one or more friendly ASURYANI PSYKER models.
Seer Council.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and set it up again anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models.
Seer Council.restrictions: Until the end of the phase, your unit is not eligible to be selected to move.

Seer Council.name: PSYCHIC SHIELD
Seer Council.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Seer Council.target: One ASURYANI INFANTRY unit from your army (excluding WRAITH CONSTRUCT units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks and is within 9" of one or more friendly ASURYANI PSYKER models.
Seer Council.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 18".

Spirit Conclave.name: BLADES FROM BEYOND
Spirit Conclave.target: One WRAITHBLADES, WRAITHLORD or WRAITHKNIGHT unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Spirit Conclave.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

Spirit Conclave.name: CRUSHING STRIDES
Spirit Conclave.when: Your Charge phase, just after a WRAITHBLADES, WRAITHLORD or WRAITHKNIGHT unit from your army ends a Charge move.
Spirit Conclave.target: That WRAITHBLADES, WRAITHLORD or WRAITHKNIGHT unit.
Spirit Conclave.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit and roll one D6 for each WRAITHBLADES model in your unit, or roll four D6 if your unit has the WRAITHLORD keyword, or roll six D6 if your unit has the WRAITHKNIGHT keyword: for each 3+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

Spirit Conclave.name: SEER’S EYE
Spirit Conclave.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Spirit Conclave.target: One AELDARI PSYKER model from your army and one friendly WRAITH CONSTRUCT unit within 12" of it that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Spirit Conclave.effect: Select one enemy unit visible to your PSYKER model. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your WRAITH CONSTRUCT unit makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Armour Penetration and/or Damage characteristics of that attack.

Spirit Conclave.name: WRAITHBONE ARMOUR
Spirit Conclave.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Spirit Conclave.target: One WRAITH CONSTRUCT unit from your army (excluding TITANIC units] that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Spirit Conclave.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to a model in your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

Spirit Conclave.name: SOUL BRIDGE
Spirit Conclave.target: One WRAITHBLADES, WRAITHGUARD or WRAITHLORD unit from your army and one ASURYANI PSYKER model from your army.
Spirit Conclave.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, your WRAITHBLADES, WRAITHGUARD or WRAITHLORD unit is considered to be within 12" of your PSYKER model for the purposes of the Psychic Guidance and Spirit Guides abilities.

Spirit Conclave.name: SPIRIT TOKEN
Spirit Conclave.target: One WRAITHBLADES or WRAITHGUARD unit from your army.
Spirit Conclave.effect: Select one objective marker you control that your unit is within range of. That objective marker remains under your control until your opponent’s Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase.

Star-dancer Masque.name: VOID GHOSTS
Star-dancer Masque.when: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Star-dancer Masque.target: One AELDARI unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Star-dancer Masque.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

Star-dancer Masque.name: DARTING STRIKES
Star-dancer Masque.target: One AELDARI unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Star-dancer Masque.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

Star-dancer Masque.name: ACROBATIC LEAPS
Star-dancer Masque.target: One AELDARI unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
Star-dancer Masque.effect: Until the end of the phase, Desperate Escape tests taken for models in your unit are automatically passed, and each time your unit makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, models in your unit can move through other models as if they were not there.

Star-dancer Masque.name: SERPENT STRIKE
Star-dancer Masque.when: Fight phase, just after an AELDARI unit from your army destroys an enemy unit.
Star-dancer Masque.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes a Consolidation move, it can move up to D3+3" instead of up to 3" and, if it cannot end that move within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units that are visible to it (and in Unit Coherency), it can still make that Consolidation move, and when doing so can move in any direction.

Warhost.name: LIGHTNING-FAST REACTIONS
Warhost.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Warhost.target: One ASURYANI unit from your army (excluding WRAITH CONSTRUCT units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Warhost.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

Warhost.name: BLITZING FIREPOWER
Warhost.target: One ASURYANI unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Warhost.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability while targeting an enemy unit within 12". If such a weapon already has that ability, until the end of the phase, each time an attack is made with that weapon, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

Warhost.name: WEBWAY TUNNEL
Warhost.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
Warhost.target: One ASURYANI INFANTRY unit from your army that is wholly within 9" of one or more battlefield edges.
Warhost.effect: If your unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, remove it from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

Warhost.name: SKYBORNE SANCTUARY
Warhost.target: One ASURYANI unit from your army and one friendly TRANSPORT it is able to embark within.
Warhost.effect: If your ASURYANI unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and is wholly within 6" of that TRANSPORT, it can embark within it.

Warhost.name: FEIGNED RETREAT
Warhost.when: Your Movement phase, just after an ASURYANI unit from your army Falls Back.
Warhost.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

Warhost.name: FIRE AND FADE
Warhost.when: Your Shooting phase, just after an ASURYANI INFANTRY unit from your army (excluding AIRCRAFT, ASURMEN and WRAITH CONSTRUCT units) has shot.
Warhost.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6+1".
Warhost.restrictions: Until the end of the turn, your unit is not eligible to declare a charge.

Windrider Host.name: SPIRALLING EVASION
Windrider Host.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Windrider Host.target: One ASURYANI MOUNTED or VYPER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Windrider Host.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.

Windrider Host.name: FOCUSED FIREPOWER
Windrider Host.target: One ASURYANI MOUNTED or VYPER unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Windrider Host.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Windrider Host.name: DEATH FROM ON HIGH
Windrider Host.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Windrider Host.target: One ASURYANI MOUNTED or VYPER unit from your army that was set upon the battlefield from Reserves this turn and has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Windrider Host.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

Windrider Host.name: DARING RIDERS
Windrider Host.when: The Reinforcements step of your Movement phase.
Windrider Host.target: One ASURYANI MOUNTED or VYPER unit from your army in Reserves.
Windrider Host.effect: Until the end of the phase, when setting up your unit on the battlefield from Reserves, it can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy units. When doing so, if your unit is set up within 9" horizontally of one or more enemy units, until the end of the turn, it is not eligible to declare a charge.

Windrider Host.name: WIND OF BLADES
Windrider Host.target: One ASURYANI MOUNTED or VYPER unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
Windrider Host.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back.

Windrider Host.name: OVERFLIGHT
