Windrider Host.when: End of your Shooting phase or the end of the Fight phase.
Windrider Host.target: One ASURYANI MOUNTED unit from your army that destroyed one or more enemy units this phase.
Windrider Host.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 7".

Wraiths of the Void.name: WRAITHSIGHT
Wraiths of the Void.target: One AELDARI unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Wraiths of the Void.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability. In addition, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to that attack's Ballistic Skill characteristic and/or to the Hit roll.

Wraiths of the Void.name: GUARDIAN CONSTRUCTS
Wraiths of the Void.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Wraiths of the Void.target: One WRAITH CONSTRUCT unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Wraiths of the Void.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, if the attacking model is wholly on the opposite side of a Hatchway from your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

Wraiths of the Void.name: UNFLINCHING FIRE
Wraiths of the Void.when: Your opponent's Movement or Charge phase.
Wraiths of the Void.target: One AELDARI unit from your army that has not fired Overwatch this phase.
Wraiths of the Void.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack while firing Overwatch, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ is required to score a hit, instead of an unmodified G.

Wraiths of the Void.name: D-STRIKE
Wraiths of the Void.target: One WRAITH CONSTRUCT unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Wraiths of the Void.effect: Select one closed Hatchway that is visible to and within range of one or more of the ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit. Open that Hatchway and, until the end of the battle, that Hatchway cannot be closed. For each enemy unit within 3" of that Hatchway and wholly on the opposite side of it from your unit, until the start of your next Shooting phase, that enemy unit is stunned. While a unit is stunned, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
Wraiths of the Void.restrictions: Until the end of the phase, your unit is not eligible to shoot.

Karsk’s Gunners.name: Send in the Next Wave
Karsk’s Gunners.when: Reinforcements step of your Movement phase, just after a Cadian Shock Troops unit from your army has been destroyed earlier in the battle.
Karsk’s Gunners.target: That destroyed Cadian Shock Troops unit.
Karsk’s Gunners.effect: Return that unit to the battlefield at its starting strength, with its models placed wholly within nine inches of your battlefield edge and more than nine inches from all enemy models.

Karsk’s Gunners.name: Bring It Down
Karsk’s Gunners.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an Astra Militarum unit from your army makes a ranged attack that targets that enemy unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

Karsk’s Gunners.name: Artillery Strike
Karsk’s Gunners.when: Start of your opponent’s Command phase.
Karsk’s Gunners.target: Select one point on the battlefield within 24 inches of a friendly Astra Militarum unit that is visible to it.
Karsk’s Gunners.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, enemy units within six inches of that point have their Move and Advance distances halved and cannot declare a charge. In addition, each time a model in those units makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
Karsk’s Gunners.restrictions: You can only use this Stratagem once per battle.

Bridgehead Strike.name: FIRING HOT
Bridgehead Strike.target: One MILITARUM TEMPESTUS or KASRKIN unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Bridgehead Strike.effect: Until the end of the phase, when targeting an enemy unit within 12", improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of hot-shot lascarbines, hot-shot lasguns, hot-shot laspistols, hot-shot marksman rifles, hot-shot volley guns and sentry hot-shot volley guns equipped by models in your unit by 1.

Bridgehead Strike.name: BELLICOSA DROP
Bridgehead Strike.when: The Reinforcements step of your Movement phase.
Bridgehead Strike.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY unit from your army that is in Reserves and has the Deep Strike ability.
Bridgehead Strike.effect: Until the end of the phase, when your unit is set up on the battlefield using the Deep Strike ability, it can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy units.
Bridgehead Strike.restrictions: Until the end of the turn, your unit is not eligible to declare a charge.

Bridgehead Strike.name: AERIAL EXTRACTION
Bridgehead Strike.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
Bridgehead Strike.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, if all of its models have the Deep Strike ability, or one VALKYRIE unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Bridgehead Strike.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

Bridgehead Strike.name: ON MY POSITION
Bridgehead Strike.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
Bridgehead Strike.target: One REGIMENT INFANTRY unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Bridgehead Strike.effect: Roll one D6 for each enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit: on a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D6 mortal wounds. Then, your unit suffers 3D3 mortal wounds.

Bridgehead Strike.name: FIRE AND RELOCATE
Bridgehead Strike.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM unit (excluding TITANIC units) from your army.
Bridgehead Strike.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Advanced.

Bridgehead Strike.name: SERVO‑DESIGNATORS
Bridgehead Strike.when: Your Shooting phase, just after an ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY unit from your army has shot.
Bridgehead Strike.effect: Select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks that is visible to your unit. Until the end of the phase, that enemy unit cannot have the Benefit of Cover.

Combined Arms.name: FIELDS OF FIRE
Combined Arms.target: One REGIMENT unit and one SQUADRON unit from your army that have not been selected to shoot this phase.
Combined Arms.effect: Select one enemy unit. Until the end of the phase, each time your selected REGIMENT and SQUADRON units make an attack that targets that enemy unit, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Combined Arms.name: COORDINATED ACTION
Combined Arms.target: One REGIMENT unit from your army and one SQUADRON unit from your army within 6" of and visible to that REGIMENT unit.
Combined Arms.effect: Until the end of the phase, Orders affecting one of your units affect the other, and vice versa.

Combined Arms.name: STALWART PROTECTOR
Combined Arms.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Combined Arms.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM VEHICLE unit from your army.
Combined Arms.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a ranged attack is allocated to an INFANTRY model from your army, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of your VEHICLE, that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

Combined Arms.name: INSPIRED COMMAND
Combined Arms.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM OFFICER unit from your army.
Combined Arms.effect: Your OFFICER can issue one Order as if it were your Command phase.

Combined Arms.name: REINFORCEMENTS!
Combined Arms.target: One INFANTRY REGIMENT unit from your army that was just destroyed. You can target that unit with this Stratagem even though it was just destroyed.
Combined Arms.effect: Add a new unit to your army identical to your destroyed unit, in Strategic Reserves, at its Starting Strength and with all of its wounds remaining.
Combined Arms.restrictions: This Stratagem cannot be used to return destroyed CHARACTER units to Attached units. You can only use this Stratagem once per battle.

Combined Arms.name: FLEXIBLE COMMAND
Combined Arms.target: Any number of ASTRA MILITARUM OFFICER units from your army.
Combined Arms.effect: Until the end of the phase, your Officers can issue Orders to REGIMENT units and SQUADRON units.

Embarked Regiment.name: DUCK AND COVER
Embarked Regiment.when: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Embarked Regiment.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM unit from your army (excluding OGRYN units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks and has one or more models on the opposite side of an open Hatchway from one or more models in the attacking unit.
Embarked Regiment.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

Embarked Regiment.name: AGAINST THE ODDS
Embarked Regiment.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Embarked Regiment.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM unit from your army (excluding OGRYN units) that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Embarked Regiment.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, on a Critical Wound, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 2.

Embarked Regiment.name: BRUTAL CHOKE POINT
Embarked Regiment.when: Your opponent's Movement or Charge phase.
Embarked Regiment.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM unit from your army (excluding OGRYN units) that has not fired Overwatch this phase.
Embarked Regiment.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack while firing Overwatch, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ is required to score a hit, instead of an unmodified 6.

Embarked Regiment.name: IDLE HANDS
Embarked Regiment.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase and is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Embarked Regiment.effect: Select one closed Hatchway within 1" of your unit. Your unit can operate that Hatchway.
Embarked Regiment.restrictions: Until the end of the turn, your unit cannot operate a Hatchway again.

Recon Element.name: SCOUTING OUTRIDERS
Recon Element.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM MOUNTED or ASTRA MILITARUM WALKER unit from your army that is wholly within 10" of one or more battlefield edges and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Recon Element.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

Recon Element.name: CRACK SHOTS
Recon Element.target: One PLATOON unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Recon Element.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PRECISION] ability.

Recon Element.name: COURAGEOUS DIVERSION
Recon Element.when: Start of your opponent’s Shooting phase.
Recon Element.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY or ASTRA MILITARUM MOUNTED unit from your army.
Recon Element.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit has the Feel No Pain 6+ ability, and each time an enemy model makes an attack, if your unit is the closest eligible target, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

Recon Element.name: DRAW THEM OUT
Recon Element.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
Recon Element.target: One PLATOON unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit, and is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Recon Element.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".

Recon Element.name: TANGLEFOOT GRENADES
Recon Element.when: Start of your opponent’s Charge phase.
Recon Element.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM GRENADES unit from your army.
Recon Element.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy unit selects your unit as the target of a charge, subtract 2 from the Charge roll (this is not cumulative with any other negative modifiers to that Charge roll).

Recon Element.name: SCRAMBLE FIELD
Recon Element.when: Start of your opponent’s Reinforcements step.
Recon Element.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY unit from your army.
Recon Element.effect: Until the end of the phase, enemy units that are set up on the battlefield as Reinforcements cannot be set up within 12" of your unit.

Hammer of the Emperor.name: BLAZING ADVANCE
Hammer of the Emperor.group: ASTRA MILITARUM – Hammer of the Emperor
Hammer of the Emperor.when: Your Movement phase, just after a SQUADRON unit from your army Advances.
Hammer of the Emperor.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Advanced.

Hammer of the Emperor.name: FURIOUS CANNONADE
Hammer of the Emperor.group: ASTRA MILITARUM – Hammer of the Emperor
Hammer of the Emperor.target: One SQUADRON unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Hammer of the Emperor.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit within 12", improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Hammer of the Emperor.name: FINAL HOUR
Hammer of the Emperor.group: ASTRA MILITARUM – Hammer of the Emperor
Hammer of the Emperor.target: One SQUADRON unit from your army that is Below Half-strength (excluding OFFICER units).
Hammer of the Emperor.effect: Until the end of the battle round, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit (excluding [ONE SHOT] weapons) have the [HAZARDOUS] ability, and each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to that attack’s Ballistic Skill characteristic and to the Hit roll.

Hammer of the Emperor.name: CRASH THROUGH
Hammer of the Emperor.group: ASTRA MILITARUM – Hammer of the Emperor
Hammer of the Emperor.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
Hammer of the Emperor.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM VEHICLE unit from your army that has not been selected to move or charge this phase.
Hammer of the Emperor.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes a Normal, Advance or Charge move, it can move horizontally through terrain features as if they were not there.

Hammer of the Emperor.name: TACTICAL WITHDRAWAL
Hammer of the Emperor.group: ASTRA MILITARUM – Hammer of the Emperor
Hammer of the Emperor.when: Your Movement phase, just after a SQUADRON unit from your army Falls Back.
Hammer of the Emperor.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back.

Hammer of the Emperor.name: ABLATIVE PLATING
Hammer of the Emperor.group: ASTRA MILITARUM – Hammer of the Emperor
Hammer of the Emperor.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Hammer of the Emperor.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM VEHICLE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Hammer of the Emperor.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

Mechanised Assault.name: HASTY EXTRACTION
Mechanised Assault.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, after an enemy unit has selected targets for its charge but before it makes a Charge move.
Mechanised Assault.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as a target of that charge.
Mechanised Assault.effect: Provided your unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and every model in your unit is within 3" of an ASTRA MILITARUM TRANSPORT from your army, it can embark within that TRANSPORT.

Mechanised Assault.name: CLEAR AND SECURE
Mechanised Assault.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM unit from your army that disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Mechanised Assault.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit within range of an objective marker, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

Mechanised Assault.name: SWIFT INTERCEPTION
Mechanised Assault.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
Mechanised Assault.target: One TRANSPORT unit from your army (excluding TITANIC units) that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, and is within 9" of the enemy unit that just ended that move.
Mechanised Assault.effect: Your TRANSPORT can make a Normal move of up to 6".

Mechanised Assault.name: MOVE OUT
Mechanised Assault.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM unit from your army.
Mechanised Assault.effect: Provided your unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and every model in your unit is within 3" of an ASTRA MILITARUM TRANSPORT from your army, it can embark within that TRANSPORT.

Mechanised Assault.name: RAPID DISPERSAL
Mechanised Assault.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY unit from your army that disembarked from a TRANSPORT this phase.
Mechanised Assault.effect: Your INFANTRY unit can make a Normal move of up to D6".

Mechanised Assault.name: VOX-RELAY
Mechanised Assault.target: One INFANTRY OFFICER unit from your army embarked within a TRANSPORT. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it is embarked within a TRANSPORT.
Mechanised Assault.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit can issue Orders even though it is not on the battlefield, and it can issue Orders to ASTRA MILITARUM TRANSPORT units from your army [excluding TITANIC units) regardless of the distance to and from your unit’s TRANSPORT.

Siege Regiment.name: TRENCH FIGHTERS
Siege Regiment.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Siege Regiment.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Siege Regiment.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 2 to the result if it is a REGIMENT model. On a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

Siege Regiment.name: CALLOUS SACRIFICE
Siege Regiment.target: One PLATOON unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Siege Regiment.effect: Until the end of the phase, enemy units are not considered to be within Engagement Range of your unit for the purposes of selecting targets of ranged weapons. Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy model loses a wound, while that model’s unit is within Engagement Range of your unit, roll one D6: on a 4+, one model from your unit is destroyed after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks.

Siege Regiment.name: OVER THE TOP
Siege Regiment.target: One INFANTRY OFFICER model from your army.
Siege Regiment.effect: Until the end of the phase, when your model issues the Move! Move! Move! Order, it can issue that Order to any number of eligible friendly INFANTRY REGIMENT units, regardless of range to your model.

Siege Regiment.name: FURIOUS FUSILLADE
Siege Regiment.target: One PLATOON unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Siege Regiment.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit while targeting an enemy unit within half range.

Siege Regiment.name: FLARE BURST
Siege Regiment.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM CHARACTER unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Siege Regiment.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes an attack that targets a visible enemy unit within 12", you can re-roll the Hit roll.

Siege Regiment.name: MINEFIELD
Siege Regiment.when: Start of your opponent’s Charge phase.
Siege Regiment.target: One PLATOON unit from your army.
Siege Regiment.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy unit ends a Charge move within Engagement Range of your unit, roll one D6 for each model in that enemy unit: for each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).

Tempestus Boarding Regiment.name: BRUTAL CHOKE POINT
Tempestus Boarding Regiment.when: Your Shooting phase, just after a MILITARUM TEMPESTUS unit from your army has shot.
Tempestus Boarding Regiment.effect: Select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next Shooting phase, subtract 2 from the Move characteristic of models in that enemy unit, and subtract 2 from Advance and Charge rolls made for it.

Tempestus Boarding Regiment.name: AGAINST THE ODDS
Tempestus Boarding Regiment.target: One MILITARUM TEMPESTUS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Tempestus Boarding Regiment.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks and Strength characteristics of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit.

Tempestus Boarding Regiment.name: DUCK AND COVER
Tempestus Boarding Regiment.target: One OFFICER model from your army.
Tempestus Boarding Regiment.effect: Select one Order your model can issue. Every ASTRA MILITARUM unit from your army is issued that Order (regardless of any keywords those units are normally required to have).
Tempestus Boarding Regiment.restrictions: Until the end of the turn, OFFICER models from your army cannot issue Orders. You can only use this Stratagem once.

Tempestus Boarding Regiment.name: IDLE HANDS
Tempestus Boarding Regiment.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
Tempestus Boarding Regiment.effect: Until the end of the phase, after your unit ends a move, you can select one open Hatchway it moved through during that move; close that Hatchway.

Ordo Xenos Alien Hunters.name: ARMOUR OF CONTEMPT
Ordo Xenos Alien Hunters.group: IMPERIAL AGENTS – Ordo Xenos Alien Hunters
Ordo Xenos Alien Hunters.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Ordo Xenos Alien Hunters.target: One DEATHWATCH unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Ordo Xenos Alien Hunters.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Ordo Xenos Alien Hunters.name: RAPID TACTICAL RELOCATION
Ordo Xenos Alien Hunters.group: IMPERIAL AGENTS – Ordo Xenos Alien Hunters
Ordo Xenos Alien Hunters.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
Ordo Xenos Alien Hunters.target: One INQUISITOR or DEATHWATCH INFANTRY unit from your army.
Ordo Xenos Alien Hunters.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield. In the Reinforcements step of your next Movement phase, set your unit up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9” horizontally away from all enemy models.
Ordo Xenos Alien Hunters.restrictions: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

Ordo Xenos Alien Hunters.name: ADAPTIVE TACTICS
Ordo Xenos Alien Hunters.group: IMPERIAL AGENTS – Ordo Xenos Alien Hunters
Ordo Xenos Alien Hunters.target: One DEATHWATCH unit from your army.
Ordo Xenos Alien Hunters.effect: Select the Furor Tactics, Malleus Tactics or Purgatus Tactics. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Deathwatch Mission Tactic is active for your unit instead of any other Deathwatch Mission Tactic that is active for your army, even if you have already selected that Deathwatch Mission Tactic this battle.

Ordo Xenos Alien Hunters.name: KRAKEN ROUNDS
Ordo Xenos Alien Hunters.group: IMPERIAL AGENTS – Ordo Xenos Alien Hunters
Ordo Xenos Alien Hunters.target: One DEATHWATCH INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Ordo Xenos Alien Hunters.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1 and improve the Range characteristic of those weapons by 6".
Ordo Xenos Alien Hunters.restrictions: You cannot select any units that have already been targeted with either the Dragonfire Rounds or Hellfire Rounds Stratagems this phase.

Ordo Xenos Alien Hunters.name: DRAGONFIRE ROUNDS
Ordo Xenos Alien Hunters.group: IMPERIAL AGENTS – Ordo Xenos Alien Hunters
Ordo Xenos Alien Hunters.target: One DEATHWATCH INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Ordo Xenos Alien Hunters.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [ASSAULT] and [IGNORES COVER] abilities.
Ordo Xenos Alien Hunters.restrictions: You cannot select any units that have already been targeted with either the Kraken Rounds or Hellfire Rounds Stratagems this phase.

Ordo Xenos Alien Hunters.name: HELLFIRE ROUNDS
Ordo Xenos Alien Hunters.group: IMPERIAL AGENTS – Ordo Xenos Alien Hunters
Ordo Xenos Alien Hunters.target: One DEATHWATCH INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Ordo Xenos Alien Hunters.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons (excluding Devastating Wounds weapons) equipped by models in your unit have the [ANTI-INFANTRY 2+] and [ANTI-MONSTER 5+] abilities.
Ordo Xenos Alien Hunters.restrictions: You cannot select any units that have already been targeted with either the Kraken Rounds or Dragonfire Rounds Stratagems this phase.

Ordo Malleus Daemon Hunters.name: RITUAL OF WARDING
Ordo Malleus Daemon Hunters.group: IMPERIAL AGENTS – Ordo Malleus Daemon Hunters
Ordo Malleus Daemon Hunters.target: One INQUISITOR, INQUISITORIAL AGENTS or ORDO MALLEUS unit from your army that is within range of an objective marker you control.
Ordo Malleus Daemon Hunters.effect: That objective marker is said to be Warded and remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn. While an objective marker is Warded and under your control, enemy DAEMON units cannot be set up on the battlefield within 6" of it.

Ordo Malleus Daemon Hunters.name: RITES OF EXORCISM
Ordo Malleus Daemon Hunters.group: IMPERIAL AGENTS – Ordo Malleus Daemon Hunters
Ordo Malleus Daemon Hunters.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Ordo Malleus Daemon Hunters.target: One INQUISITOR, INQUISITORIAL AGENTS or ORDO MALLEUS unit from your army.
Ordo Malleus Daemon Hunters.effect: Select one enemy DAEMON unit within 12" and visible to your unit. That unit must take a Battle-shock test. If that test is failed, then until the end of the phase, each time a friendly AGENTS OF THE IMPERIUM unit makes an attack that targets that DAEMON unit, that attack has the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

Ordo Malleus Daemon Hunters.name: STEEL HEART
Ordo Malleus Daemon Hunters.group: IMPERIAL AGENTS – Ordo Malleus Daemon Hunters
Ordo Malleus Daemon Hunters.when: Your Movement phase, just after a GREY KNIGHTS TERMINATOR SQUAD unit from your army Falls Back.
Ordo Malleus Daemon Hunters.target: That GREY KNIGHTS TERMINATOR SQUAD unit.
Ordo Malleus Daemon Hunters.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

Ordo Malleus Daemon Hunters.name: PSYBOLT AMMUNITION
Ordo Malleus Daemon Hunters.group: IMPERIAL AGENTS – Ordo Malleus Daemon Hunters
Ordo Malleus Daemon Hunters.target: One GREY KNIGHTS TERMINATOR SQUAD unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Ordo Malleus Daemon Hunters.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LETHAL HITS] and [PSYCHIC] abilities.

Ordo Malleus Daemon Hunters.name: HEXAGRAMMIC WARDS
Ordo Malleus Daemon Hunters.group: IMPERIAL AGENTS – Ordo Malleus Daemon Hunters
Ordo Malleus Daemon Hunters.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Ordo Malleus Daemon Hunters.target: One ORDO MALLEUS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Ordo Malleus Daemon Hunters.effect: Until the end of the phase, all Psychic weapons equipped by models in the attacking unit have the [HAZARDOUS] ability.

Ordo Malleus Daemon Hunters.name: TRUESILVER ARMOUR
Ordo Malleus Daemon Hunters.group: IMPERIAL AGENTS – Ordo Malleus Daemon Hunters
Ordo Malleus Daemon Hunters.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase orthe Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Ordo Malleus Daemon Hunters.target: One GREY KNIGHTS TERMINATOR SQUAD unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Ordo Malleus Daemon Hunters.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Imperialis Fleet.name: CLOSE-QUARTERS BARRAGE
Imperialis Fleet.target: One VOIDFARERS unit from your army.
Imperialis Fleet.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets a unit within 12", improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of that attack by 1.

Imperialis Fleet.name: SELFLESS BODYGUARD
Imperialis Fleet.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Imperialis Fleet.target: One AGENTS OF THE IMPERIUM Attached unit that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Imperialis Fleet.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack with the [PRECISION] ability is allocated to a CHARACTER model in your unit, if there are one or more Bodyguard models in your unit, roll one D6: on a 2+, that attack is allocated to a Bodyguard model of your choice in your unit instead.

Imperialis Fleet.name: VIOLENT ACQUISITION
Imperialis Fleet.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Imperialis Fleet.target: One AGENTS OF THE IMPERIUM unit from your army.
Imperialis Fleet.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets an enemy unit within range of an objective marker, that attack has the [SUSTAINED HITS 1], [LANCE] and [IGNORES COVER] abilities.

Imperialis Fleet.name: EMPEROR’S WILL
Imperialis Fleet.target: One AGENTS OF THE IMPERIUM unit from your army.
Imperialis Fleet.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back.

Imperialis Fleet.name: DISPLACER FIELD
Imperialis Fleet.when: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Imperialis Fleet.target: One AGENTS OF THE IMPERIUM CHARACTER unit from your army (excluding OFFICIO ASSASSINORUM units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
Imperialis Fleet.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a 4+ invulnerable save and, after the attacking unit has resolved its attacks, unless your unit is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 6" (when doing so, models in this unit move as if they have the Fly keyword).

Interdiction Team.name: CRACKDOWN
Interdiction Team.target: One ADEPTUS ARBITES unit from your army.
Interdiction Team.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

Interdiction Team.name: DUTY AND DEATH
Interdiction Team.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Interdiction Team.target: One ADEPTUS ARBITES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
Interdiction Team.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

Interdiction Team.name: INESCAPABLE JUDGEMENT
Interdiction Team.when: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit is selected to Fall Back.
Interdiction Team.target: One ADEPTUS ARBITES unit from your army within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
Interdiction Team.effect: Until the end of the phase, when that enemy unit Falls Back, models in it must take Desperate Escape tests as if their unit was Battle-shocked. When doing so, if that enemy unit is also Battle-shocked by other means, subtract 1 from each of those Desperate Escape tests.

Interdiction Team.name: ARBITRARY EXECUTION
Interdiction Team.target: One ADEPTUS ARBITES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Interdiction Team.effect: Until the end of the phase, Arbites shotpistols equipped by models in your unit have an Attacks characteristic of 2 and the [LETHAL HITS] ability, and models in your unit can target enemy units that are not within Engagement Range of them (provided they are otherwise eligible targets).

Ordo Hereticus Purgation Force.name: DISPENSE JUSTICE
Ordo Hereticus Purgation Force.group: IMPERIAL AGENTS – Ordo Hereticus Purgation Force
Ordo Hereticus Purgation Force.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Ordo Hereticus Purgation Force.target: One ADEPTUS ARBITES, INQUISITORIAL AGENTS or ORDO HERETICUS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Ordo Hereticus Purgation Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

Ordo Hereticus Purgation Force.name: EXECUTION ORDER
Ordo Hereticus Purgation Force.group: IMPERIAL AGENTS – Ordo Hereticus Purgation Force
Ordo Hereticus Purgation Force.target: One ADEPTUS ARBITES, INQUISITORIAL AGENTS or ORDO HERETICUS INFANTRY unit from your army.
Ordo Hereticus Purgation Force.effect: Select one enemy CHARACTER unit on the battlefield. Until the start of your next Command phase, each time a model in your unit targets that CHARACTER unit, its weapons have the [PRECISION] ability.

Ordo Hereticus Purgation Force.name: EXACT PUNISHMENT
Ordo Hereticus Purgation Force.group: IMPERIAL AGENTS – Ordo Hereticus Purgation Force
Ordo Hereticus Purgation Force.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an AGENTS OF THE IMPERIUM unit from your army is destroyed as the result of an enemy unit's attacks.
Ordo Hereticus Purgation Force.target: One ADEPTUS ARBITES, INQUISITORIAL AGENTS or ORDO HERETICUS unit from your army that was within 6" of the destroyed unit (you cannot target the destroyed unit with the Stratagem).
Ordo Hereticus Purgation Force.effect: After the attacking unit has shot, your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but when resolving those attacks it can only target that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target).

Ordo Hereticus Purgation Force.name: LINE OF FIRE
Ordo Hereticus Purgation Force.group: IMPERIAL AGENTS – Ordo Hereticus Purgation Force
Ordo Hereticus Purgation Force.target: One ADEPTUS ARBITES, INQUISITORIAL AGENTS or ORDO HERETICUS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Ordo Hereticus Purgation Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit can target enemy units that are within Engagement Range of one or more friendly units with ranged weapons (excluding Blast weapons), provided the target is within 12".

Ordo Hereticus Purgation Force.name: INVIOLATE JURISDICTION
Ordo Hereticus Purgation Force.group: IMPERIAL AGENTS – Ordo Hereticus Purgation Force
Ordo Hereticus Purgation Force.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Ordo Hereticus Purgation Force.target: One ADEPTUS ARBITES, INQUISITORIAL AGENTS or ORDO HERETICUS INFANTRY unit from your army within range of an objective marker and that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Ordo Hereticus Purgation Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

Ordo Hereticus Purgation Force.name: STUN GRENADES
Ordo Hereticus Purgation Force.group: IMPERIAL AGENTS – Ordo Hereticus Purgation Force
Ordo Hereticus Purgation Force.when: Start of any phase (excluding the Command phase).
Ordo Hereticus Purgation Force.target: One ADEPTUS ARBITES, INQUISITORIAL AGENTS or ORDO HERETICUS GRENADES unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Ordo Hereticus Purgation Force.effect: Select one enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS or VEHICLES) within 8" of and visible to your unit. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test and, until the end of the phase, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

Veiled Blade Elimination Force.name: PRIME TARGET
Veiled Blade Elimination Force.group: IMPERIAL AGENTS – Veiled Blade Elimination Force
Veiled Blade Elimination Force.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Veiled Blade Elimination Force.target: One AGENTS OF THE IMPERIUM unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Veiled Blade Elimination Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a CHARACTER unit, re-roll a Wound roll of 1. If that attack is made by an OFFICIO ASSASSINORUM model and it targets the enemy WARLORD, you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.

Veiled Blade Elimination Force.name: HYPERSTIMMS
Veiled Blade Elimination Force.group: IMPERIAL AGENTS – Veiled Blade Elimination Force
Veiled Blade Elimination Force.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Veiled Blade Elimination Force.target: One AGENTS OF THE IMPERIUM CHARACTER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Veiled Blade Elimination Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Toughness characteristic of models in your unit. In addition, if it is an EVERSOR ASSASSIN unit, until the end of the phase, it has the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

Veiled Blade Elimination Force.name: WILL‑SAPPING SALVO
Veiled Blade Elimination Force.group: IMPERIAL AGENTS – Veiled Blade Elimination Force
Veiled Blade Elimination Force.target: One AGENTS OF THE IMPERIUM INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Veiled Blade Elimination Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. In addition, if it is a CULEXUS ASSASSIN unit, until the end of the phase, change the Damage characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit to 3.

Veiled Blade Elimination Force.name: ORBITAL OVERSIGHT
Veiled Blade Elimination Force.group: IMPERIAL AGENTS – Veiled Blade Elimination Force
Veiled Blade Elimination Force.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Veiled Blade Elimination Force.target: One AGENTS OF THE IMPERIUM INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Veiled Blade Elimination Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 18", or, if your unit has the Lone Operative ability, if the attacking model is within 6".

Veiled Blade Elimination Force.name: BLIND GRENADES
Veiled Blade Elimination Force.group: IMPERIAL AGENTS – Veiled Blade Elimination Force
Veiled Blade Elimination Force.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit has declared a charge.
Veiled Blade Elimination Force.target: One AGENTS OF THE IMPERIUM GRENADES or VINDICARE ASSASSIN unit from your army that was selected as one of the targets of that charge and is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Veiled Blade Elimination Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, subtract 1 from Charge rolls made for that enemy unit, or, if your unit is a VINDICARE ASSASSIN, subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for that enemy unit instead.

Veiled Blade Elimination Force.name: ENSNARING TRAP
Veiled Blade Elimination Force.group: IMPERIAL AGENTS – Veiled Blade Elimination Force
Veiled Blade Elimination Force.when: End of your opponent’s Charge phase.
Veiled Blade Elimination Force.target: One AGENTS OF THE IMPERIUM INFANTRY unit from your army that is within 6" of one or more enemy units and would be eligible to declare a charge against one or more of those enemy units.
Veiled Blade Elimination Force.effect: Your unit can declare a charge. When doing so, you must select one or more of those enemy units as the targets of that charge, and your unit does not receive a Charge bonus this turn. In addition, if it is a CALLIDUS ASSASSIN unit and it makes a Charge move as a result of this Stratagem, until the end of the turn, each time a model in your unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

Voidship’s Company.name: BREACH AND CLEAR
Voidship’s Company.when: Your Movement phase, just after an IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHERS unit from yourarmy opens a Hatchway.
Voidship’s Company.effect: Until the end of the turn, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, if that model is on the opposite side of the Hatchway from the side it started the turn on, add 1 to the Hit roll and add 1 to the Wound roll.

Voidship’s Company.name: AMMO RATIONS
Voidship’s Company.target: One or more VOIDFARERS units from your army.
Voidship’s Company.effect: Select one enemy unit. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in one of your units makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Voidship’s Company.name: BOARDING DRILL
Voidship’s Company.target: One VOIDFARERS unit from your army.
Voidship’s Company.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to shoot or perform a Tactical Manoeuvre in a turn in which it Fell Back.

Voidship’s Company.name: SHIP’S WATCH
Voidship’s Company.when: Your opponent's Movement or Charge phase.
Voidship’s Company.target: Up to two VOIDSMEN-AT-ARMS units from your army that have not fired Overwatch this phase.
Voidship’s Company.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in one of your units makes an attack while firing Overwatch, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ is required to score a hit, instead of an unmodified 6. When doing so, models in your units can ignore other models in their unit for the purposes of visibility, and each time a model in one of your units makes an attack, if that unit contains a Canid model, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

Sanctuary Guardians.name: Ascetic Discipline
Sanctuary Guardians.when: Your Shooting or Fight phase, when an Adepta Sororitas unit that has not shot or fought this phase is selected to shoot or fight.
Sanctuary Guardians.target: That Adepta Sororitas unit from your army.
Sanctuary Guardians.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit scores a Critical Wound, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 2.

Sanctuary Guardians.name: A Martyr’s Death
Sanctuary Guardians.when: Your opponent’s Shooting or Fight phase, after an enemy unit selects its targets.
Sanctuary Guardians.target: One Adepta Sororitas unit from your army.
Sanctuary Guardians.effect: You may discard one Miracle dice. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, roll one D6: on a 4+, that model can shoot or fight after its destruction. If you discarded a miracle dice, destroyed models can shoot or fight on a 3+ instead.

Sanctuary Guardians.name: Holy Radiance
Sanctuary Guardians.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, after an enemy unit selects its targets.
Sanctuary Guardians.target: One Adepta Sororitas unit from your army.
Sanctuary Guardians.effect: Until the end of the phase, subtract 1 from Hit rolls that target your unit and models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

Army of Faith.name: LIGHT OF THE EMPEROR
Army of Faith.target: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army.
Army of Faith.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is blessed. While a unit is blessed, it can ignore any or all modifiers to the following: the profile characteristics of its models; the Weapon Skill or Ballistic Skill characteristics of weapons equipped by its models; any roll or test made for it (excluding modifiers to saving throws). If your unit has the JUMP PACK keyword, until the end of the turn, while a friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS unit is within 3" of your unit, that friendly unit is also blessed.

Army of Faith.name: SHIELD OF FAITH
Army of Faith.when: Any phase, just after an ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army suffers a mortal wound.
Army of Faith.target: That ADEPTA SORORITAS unit, or one friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS JUMP PACK unit within 3" of it.
Army of Faith.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against mortal wounds. If you targeted an ADEPTA SORORITAS JUMP PACK unit from your army with this Stratagem, then until the end of the phase, while a friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS unit is unit is within 3" of your unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against mortal wounds.

Army of Faith.name: DIVINE GUIDANCE
Army of Faith.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Army of Faith.target: That ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Army of Faith.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as the result of any of those attacks, you gain 1 Miracle dice.

Army of Faith.name: FAITH AND FURY
Army of Faith.target: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Army of Faith.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LANCE] ability. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as the result of your unit's attacks this phase, you gain 1 Miracle dice.

Army of Faith.name: ANGELIC DESCENT
Army of Faith.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
Army of Faith.target: One ADEPTA SORORITAS JUMP PACK unit from your army.
Army of Faith.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.
Army of Faith.restrictions: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

Army of Faith.name: BLINDING RADIANCE
Army of Faith.when: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Army of Faith.target: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks, or one friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS JUMP PACK unit within 3" of such a unit.
Army of Faith.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll. If you targeted an ADEPTA SORORITAS JUMP PACK unit from your army with this Stratagem, then until the end of the phase, while a friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS unit is unit is within 3" of your unit, each time an attack targets that unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

Bringers of Flame.name: RITES OF FIRE
Bringers of Flame.target: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Bringers of Flame.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit within 6" that is also within range of an objective marker, add 1 to the Wound roll. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as the result of those attacks, select one of those destroyed models; that destroyed model’s unit must take a Battle-shock test.

Bringers of Flame.name: BLAZING IRE
Bringers of Flame.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
Bringers of Flame.target: One ADEPTA SORORITAS TRANSPORT unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
Bringers of Flame.effect: One unit embarked within your TRANSPORT can disembark as if it were your Movement phase, and can then shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

Bringers of Flame.name: CLEANSING FLAMES
Bringers of Flame.target: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Bringers of Flame.effect: Until the end of the phase, Torrent weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability

Bringers of Flame.name: SHIELD OF AVERSION
Bringers of Flame.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Bringers of Flame.target: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Bringers of Flame.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Bringers of Flame.name: RIGHTEOUS BLOWS
Bringers of Flame.target: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Bringers of Flame.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as the result of attacks made by those weapons this phase, select one of those destroyed models; that destroyed model’s unit must take a Battle-shock test.

Bringers of Flame.name: CARRY FORTH THE FAITHFUL
Bringers of Flame.when: Your Movement phase, just before an ADEPTA SORORITAS TRANSPORT model from your army Advances.
Bringers of Flame.effect: Until the end of the turn, you can re-roll Advance rolls made for your TRANSPORT, and units can disembark from your TRANSPORT even though it Advanced. Units that do so count as having made a Normal move, and cannot declare a charge this turn

Champions of Faith.name: SHIELD OF DENIAL
Champions of Faith.when: Any phase, just after a mortal wound is allocated to an ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army.
Champions of Faith.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability against mortal wounds. If your unit is Righteous, until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against mortal wounds instead.

Champions of Faith.name: TO THE HEART OF HERESY
Champions of Faith.target: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Champions of Faith.effect: Until the end of the turn, improve the Strength characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1. If your unit is Righteous, until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1 as well.

Champions of Faith.name: PATH OF THE RIGHTEOUS
Champions of Faith.target: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Champions of Faith.effect: Until the end of the turn, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile-in or Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3". When doing so, if your unit is Righteous, it does not need to end that move closer to the closest enemy model, provided it ends that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit.

Champions of Faith.name: BASTION OF FAITH
Champions of Faith.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Champions of Faith.target: One CELESTIAN SACRESANTS unit that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Champions of Faith.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll. In addition, if your unit is Righteous, you can select one other CELESTIAN SACRESANTS unit from your army that is not Battle-shocked and is within 6" of your unit. Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets that CELESTIAN SACRESANTS unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll as well.

Champions of Faith.name: INDEFATIGABLE DEDICATION
Champions of Faith.when: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army Falls Back.
Champions of Faith.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back. If your unit is Righteous, until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back instead.

Champions of Faith.name: SUFFER NOT THE UNFAITHFUL
Champions of Faith.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Champions of Faith.target: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that is Righteous and that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Champions of Faith.effect: Select either the [LETHAL HITS] or [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have the selected ability.

Hallowed Martyrs.name: RIGHTEOUS VENGEANCE
Hallowed Martyrs.target: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Hallowed Martyrs.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a melee attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll and, if your unit is Below Half-strength, you can re-roll the Wound roll as well.

Hallowed Martyrs.name: DIVINE INTERVENTION
Hallowed Martyrs.target: One ADEPTA SORORITAS CHARACTER unit from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
Hallowed Martyrs.effect: You can discard 1-3 Miracle dice. At the end of the phase, set the last destroyed model from your unit back up on the battlefield, as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy models. Roll one D3, adding 1 to the result for each Miracle dice you discarded. That model is set back up with that number of wounds remaining (up to its starting number of wounds).
Hallowed Martyrs.restrictions: You cannot select SAINT CELESTINE as the target of this Stratagem. You cannot select the same CHARACTER as the target of this Stratagem more than once per battle.

Hallowed Martyrs.name: PRAISE THE FALLEN
Hallowed Martyrs.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
Hallowed Martyrs.target: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that had one or more of its models destroyed as a result of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Hallowed Martyrs.effect: Your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but it must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

Hallowed Martyrs.name: SPIRIT OF THE MARTYR
Hallowed Martyrs.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Hallowed Martyrs.target: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Hallowed Martyrs.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

Hallowed Martyrs.name: SANCTIFIED IMMOLATION
Hallowed Martyrs.target: One ADEPTA SORORITAS VEHICLE model from your army with the Deadly Demise ability that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though It was just destroyed.
Hallowed Martyrs.effect: Do not roll one D6 to determine whether mortal wounds are inflicted by your model's Deadly Demise ability. Instead, mortal wounds are automatically inflicted.

Hallowed Martyrs.name: SUFFERING AND SACRIFICE
Hallowed Martyrs.target: One ADEPTA SORORITAS INFANTRY or ADEPTA SORORITAS WALKER unit from your army.
Hallowed Martyrs.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy model within Engagement Range of your unit selects its targets, it must select your unit as the target of its attacks.

Penitent Host.name: PASSION OF THE PENITENT
Penitent Host.target: One PENITENT unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Penitent Host.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a PENITENT model in your unit makes a melee attack, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

Penitent Host.name: PURITY OF SUFFERING
Penitent Host.when: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Penitent Host.target: One PENITENT unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
Penitent Host.effect: Until the end of the phase, PENITENT models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

Penitent Host.name: LASH OF GUILT
Penitent Host.when: Your Movement phase, just before a PENITENT unit from your army Advances.
Penitent Host.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced. If your unit has the PENITENT ENGINES keyword, do not make an Advance roll for it; instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.

Penitent Host.name: FINAL REDEMPTION
Penitent Host.target: One PENITENT unit from your army that was just destroyed while it was within range of an objective marker you controlled. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
Penitent Host.effect: That objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

Penitent Host.name: DEVOUT FANATICISM
Penitent Host.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
Penitent Host.target: One PENITENT unit from your army that was selected as the target as one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Penitent Host.effect: Roll one D6: your unit can be moved a distance in inches up to the result, but it must end that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit (excluding AIRCRAFT). When doing so, models in your unit can be moved within Engagement Range of enemy units.

Penitent Host.name: BOUNDLESS ZEAL
Penitent Host.when: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army Falls Back.
Penitent Host.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot or declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back. If your unit has the PENITENT keyword, it is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back instead.

Penitents and Pilgrims.name: SLICK WITH GORE
Penitents and Pilgrims.when: Fight phase, just after an ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army destroys an enemy unit.
Penitents and Pilgrims.effect: Until the end of the battle, your unit is slick with gore. In the Battle-shock step of your opponent's Command phase, if an enemy unit that is below its Starting Strength is within 6" of and visible to a unit from your army that is slick with gore, that enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test. If that enemy unit is also Below Half-strength, subtract 1 from that test. This cannot cause a unit to take two Battle-shock tests in the same phase.
Penitents and Pilgrims.restrictions: You cannot use this Stratagem while a unit from your army that is slick with gore is on the battlefield.

Penitents and Pilgrims.name: CONTEMPT FOR DEATH
Penitents and Pilgrims.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Penitents and Pilgrims.target: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Penitents and Pilgrims.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

Penitents and Pilgrims.name: SAVAGE FRENZY
Penitents and Pilgrims.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit is selected to Fall Back.
Penitents and Pilgrims.target: One ARCO-FLAGELLANTS or REPENTIA SQUAD unit from your army within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
Penitents and Pilgrims.effect: Until the end of the phase, when that enemy unit Falls Back, models in it must take Desperate Escape tests as if their unit was Battle-shocked. When doing so, if that enemy unit is also Battle-shocked by other means, subtract 1 from each of those Desperate Escape tests.

Penitents and Pilgrims.name: FEVERED ZEALOTS
Penitents and Pilgrims.when: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army opens a Hatchway.
Penitents and Pilgrims.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit has the Fights First ability.

Pious Protectors.name: FINAL TESTAMENT
Pious Protectors.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Pious Protectors.target: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Pious Protectors.effect: You can discard 1 Miracle dice. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if you discarded a Miracle dice: on a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

Pious Protectors.name: PRAYER OF PRECISION
Pious Protectors.target: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Pious Protectors.effect: You can discard 1 Miracle dice. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. If you discarded a Miracle dice, you can re-roll the Hit roll instead.

Pious Protectors.name: REPEL BOARDERS
Pious Protectors.when: Your opponent’s Movement or Charge phase.
Pious Protectors.target: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that has not fired Overwatch this phase.
Pious Protectors.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack while firing Overwatch, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ is required to score a hit, instead of an unmodified 6. In addition, until the end of the phase, each time you roll to determine the number of attacks made with a weapon equipped by a model in your unit, you can re-roll the result.

Pious Protectors.name: RADIANT ILLUMINATION
Pious Protectors.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit has declared a charge.
Pious Protectors.target: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army (excluding ARCO-FLAGELLANTS and REPENTIA SQUAD units) that was selected as a target of that charge.
Pious Protectors.effect: You can discard 1 Miracle dice. Until the end of the phase, subtract 1 from Charge rolls made for that enemy unit. If you discarded a Miracle dice, subtract 2 from Charge rolls made forthat enemy unit instead.

Butchers of Hyporia.name: Blood‑Maddened Banishment
Butchers of Hyporia.when: Fight phase, when a Bloodletters unit from your army is selected to fight.
Butchers of Hyporia.target: That Bloodletters unit from your army.
Butchers of Hyporia.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, roll one D6: on a 4+, that model can fight after its destruction.

Butchers of Hyporia.name: Empyric Predators
Butchers of Hyporia.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move within six inches of a Flesh Hounds unit from your army.
Butchers of Hyporia.target: One Flesh Hounds unit from your army that is within six inches of that enemy unit.
Butchers of Hyporia.effect: Your unit can immediately make a Normal move of up to six inches. It cannot end this move within Engagement Range of any enemy units and cannot be targeted by the Fire Overwatch Stratagem this phase.

Butchers of Hyporia.name: Manifest Hate
Butchers of Hyporia.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, after an enemy unit selects its targets.
Butchers of Hyporia.target: One Legiones Daemonica unit from your army.
Butchers of Hyporia.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.

Blood Legion.name: SHEATHED IN BRASS
Blood Legion.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Blood Legion.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Blood Legion.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a Save characteristic of 3+.

Blood Legion.name: FOOLS’ FLIGHT
Blood Legion.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit Falls Back.
Blood Legion.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE unit from your army that is within 6" of that enemy unit and would be eligible to declare a charge against that enemy unit.
Blood Legion.effect: Your unit now declares a charge that targets only that enemy unit, and you resolve that charge. Note that even if that charge is successful, your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

Blood Legion.name: BLOOD BEGETS SKULLS
Blood Legion.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE unit from your army that has not been selected to charge this phase.
Blood Legion.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

Blood Legion.name: SKULLS BEGET BLOOD
Blood Legion.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE INFANTRY or LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE MOUNTED unit from your army (excluding units that Fell Back this turn) that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Blood Legion.effect: Select one enemy unit that is not within Engagement Range of one or more units from your army and is within 8" of and visible to your unit. Roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

Blood Legion.name: WRATH UNDENIABLE
Blood Legion.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Blood Legion.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Blood Legion.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed by a melee attack, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

Blood Legion.name: GORE‑HUNGRY ONSLAUGHT
Blood Legion.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
Blood Legion.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE unit from your army.
Blood Legion.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a move, it can move through terrain features.

Daemonic Incursion.name: INCORPOREAL TERRORS
Daemonic Incursion.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Daemonic Incursion.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
Daemonic Incursion.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

Daemonic Incursion.name: PARTING BLOWS
Daemonic Incursion.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Daemonic Incursion.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
Daemonic Incursion.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. That destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

Daemonic Incursion.name: UNREAL SPEED
Daemonic Incursion.target: One INFANTRY LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army.
Daemonic Incursion.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back.

Daemonic Incursion.name: INSUBSTANTIAL ENTITIES
Daemonic Incursion.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
Daemonic Incursion.effect: The next time your unit is selected to move this phase, models in that unit can move through Walls and closed Hatchways as if they were not there, but when doing so, no model can move more than 6".
Daemonic Incursion.restrictions: You can only use this Stratagem once.

Daemonic Incursion.name: THE REALM OF CHAOS
Daemonic Incursion.target: Up to two LEGIONES DAEMONICA units from your army that are within your army’s Shadow of Chaos, or one other LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army.
Daemonic Incursion.effect: Remove the targeted units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves. They will arrive back on the battlefield in the Reinforcements step of your next Movement phase using the Deep Strike ability.
Daemonic Incursion.restrictions: You cannot target units that are within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units with this Stratagem.

Daemonic Incursion.name: DAEMONIC INVULNERABILITY
Daemonic Incursion.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Daemonic Incursion.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of that enemy unit’s attacks.
Daemonic Incursion.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an invulnerable saving throw is made for a model in your unit, re-roll a saving throw of 1.

Daemonic Incursion.name: DRAUGHT OF TERROR
Daemonic Incursion.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Daemonic Incursion.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Daemonic Incursion.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of weapons equipped by models in that unit by 1. In addition, until the end of the phase, each time such a weapon targets a unit that is Battle-shocked, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

Daemonic Incursion.name: DENIZENS OF THE WARP
Daemonic Incursion.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that is arriving using the Deep Strike ability this phase.
Daemonic Incursion.effect: Your unit can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy models.

Daemonic Incursion.name: WARP SURGE
Daemonic Incursion.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that is within your army’s Shadow of Chaos.
Daemonic Incursion.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

Daemonic Incursion.name: CORRUPT REALSPACE
Daemonic Incursion.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that is within range of an objective marker you control.
Daemonic Incursion.effect: That objective marker is said to be Corrupted and remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn. In addition, while an objective marker is Corrupted and under your control, the area of the battlefield within 6" of that objective marker is considered to be within your army’s Shadow of Chaos.

Dread Carnival.name: SOPORIFIC SCENT
Dread Carnival.target: One SLAANESH LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
Dread Carnival.effect: Until the end of the phase, Desperate Escape tests taken for models in your unit are automatically passed and your unit does not suffer mortal wounds from the Lithe Killers Detachment rule.

Dread Carnival.name: SEDUCTIVE WHISPERS
Dread Carnival.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Dread Carnival.target: One SLAANESH LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Dread Carnival.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

Dread Carnival.name: DANCE OF DEATH
Dread Carnival.when: Your Movement phase, just after a SLAANESH LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army Falls Back.
Dread Carnival.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

Dread Carnival.name: INSUBSTANTIAL ENTITIES
Dread Carnival.target: One SLAANESH LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
Dread Carnival.effect: The next time your unit is selected to move this phase, models in that unit can move through Walls and closed Hatchways as if they were not there, but when doing so, no model can move more than 6".
Dread Carnival.restrictions: You can only use this Stratagem once.

Infernal Onslaught.name: INSUBSTANTIAL ENTITIES
Infernal Onslaught.target: One KHORNE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
Infernal Onslaught.effect: The next time your unit is selected to move this phase, models in that unit can move through Walls and closed Hatchways as if they were not there, but when doing so, no model can move more than 6".
Infernal Onslaught.restrictions: You can only use this Stratagem once.

Infernal Onslaught.name: ABJECT HORROR
Infernal Onslaught.target: One KHORNE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army.
Infernal Onslaught.effect: Each enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result.

Infernal Onslaught.name: UNSTOPPABLE SLAUGHTERERS
Infernal Onslaught.target: One KHORNE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Infernal Onslaught.effect: Select one closed Hatchway within 1" of your unit. Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to be selected to fight as if that Hatchway was open. When doing so, that unit can select targets as if that Hatchway was open (that Hatchway is only considered to be open for your unit, not for any other units).

Infernal Onslaught.name: SWIFT AS MURDER
Infernal Onslaught.target: One KHORNE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
Infernal Onslaught.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 2" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.

Legion of Excess.name: OVERWHELMING EXCESS
Legion of Excess.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Legion of Excess.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Legion of Excess.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

Legion of Excess.name: ARCHAGONISTS
Legion of Excess.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH MONSTER unit or up to two LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH units (excluding MONSTERS) from your army that have not been selected to fight this phase.
Legion of Excess.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in one of those units makes an attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

Legion of Excess.name: CAVALCADE OF BLADES
Legion of Excess.when: Your Charge phase, just after a LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit from your army ends a Charge move.
Legion of Excess.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit, then roll one D6 for each model in your unit that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit, or roll six D6 instead if your unit is a MONSTER unit: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

Legion of Excess.name: THIEVES OF PAIN
Legion of Excess.when: Any phase, just after an attack or mortal wound is allocated to a model in a LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit from your army (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES).
Legion of Excess.effect: Select one other friendly LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit that is within 9" of and visible to your unit. Until the end of the phase, while the selected unit is on the battlefield, each time a model in your unit would lose a wound, inflict 1 mortal wound on the selected unit instead.

Legion of Excess.name: PHANTASMAL LONGING
Legion of Excess.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
Legion of Excess.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit from your army.
Legion of Excess.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a move, it can move through terrain features.

Legion of Excess.name: SENSORY EXCRUCIATION
Legion of Excess.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH MONSTER unit from your army that is on the battlefield.
Legion of Excess.effect: Each unit on the battlefield that is within your army’s Shadow of Chaos must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from that test if they are Below Half-strength. Designer’s Note: This Stratagem forces all friendly and enemy units alike within your army’s Shadow of Chaos to take a Battle-shock test. This can allow a Chaos Daemons player to heal units from their army through the Daemonic Terror army rule, at the risk of causing some of their own units to become Battle-shocked.

Pandaemoniac Inferno.name: FATE SYPHONING
Pandaemoniac Inferno.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Pandaemoniac Inferno.target: One TZEENTCH LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that is within range of an objective marker and was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Pandaemoniac Inferno.effect: Until the end of the phase, you can re-roll saving throws of 1 made for models in your unit.

Pandaemoniac Inferno.name: ILLUSORY PRESENCE
Pandaemoniac Inferno.when: Your Shooting phase, just after a TZEENTCH LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army has shot.
Pandaemoniac Inferno.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6".
Pandaemoniac Inferno.restrictions: Until the end of the turn, your unit is not eligible to declare a charge.

Pandaemoniac Inferno.name: INSUBSTANTIAL ENTITIES
Pandaemoniac Inferno.target: One TZEENTCH LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
Pandaemoniac Inferno.effect: The next time your unit is selected to move this phase, models in that unit can move through Walls and closed Hatchways as if they were not there, but when doing so, no model can move more than 6".
Pandaemoniac Inferno.restrictions: You can only use this Stratagem once.

Pandaemoniac Inferno.name: FICKLE BLESSINGS
Pandaemoniac Inferno.target: One HORRORS unit from your army.
Pandaemoniac Inferno.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PISTOL] and [HAZARDOUS] abilities.

Plague Legion.name: FEVER VISIONS
Plague Legion.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Plague Legion.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA NURGLE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Plague Legion.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll. After your unit has finished making its attacks, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks; that enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test.

Plague Legion.name: MURKSHADOWS
Plague Legion.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA NURGLE INFANTRY unit from your army.
Plague Legion.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes a Normal move, add 5" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.

Plague Legion.name: SEEPING VIRULENCE
Plague Legion.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA NURGLE unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
