Plague Legion.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

Plague Legion.name: PLAGUE OF WOES
Plague Legion.when: Your opponent’s Command phase, before selecting any targets for the Melancholic Miasma Detachment rule.
Plague Legion.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA NURGLE unit from your army.
Plague Legion.effect: Until the end of the phase, after an enemy unit takes a Battle-shock test as a result of the Melancholic Miasma Detachment rule, select one other enemy unit within 9" of your unit; that enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test.

Plague Legion.name: ROT AND RENEWAL
Plague Legion.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
Plague Legion.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA NURGLE unit from your army.
Plague Legion.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a move, it can move through terrain features.

Plague Legion.name: FOETID RESURGENCE
Plague Legion.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA NURGLE unit from your army that is on the battlefield.
Plague Legion.effect: Return up to 1 destroyed model to your unit, or up to D3 destroyed models instead if your unit is a BATTLELINE unit, with their full wounds remaining. If it is a MONSTER unit, one model in your unit regains up to D3+1 lost wounds instead.

Rotten and Rusted.name: FOUL RESILIENCE
Rotten and Rusted.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Rotten and Rusted.target: One NURGLE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army (excluding NURGLINGS units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Rotten and Rusted.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

Rotten and Rusted.name: INSUBSTANTIAL ENTITIES
Rotten and Rusted.target: One NURGLE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
Rotten and Rusted.effect: The next time your unit is selected to move this phase, models in that unit can move through Walls and closed Hatchways as if they were not there, but when doing so, no model can move more than 6".
Rotten and Rusted.restrictions: You can only use this Stratagem once.

Rotten and Rusted.name: SICKLY CONTAMINANTS
Rotten and Rusted.when: End of the Fight phase, or your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Rotten and Rusted.target: One NURGLE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army. If this Stratagem is used in your opponent’s Shooting phase, it must target a unit that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Rotten and Rusted.effect: Select one objective marker your unit is within range of. Your unit suffers D3 mortal wounds and that objective marker is Secured by your army. If your unit is a PLAGUEBEARERS unit, it only suffers 1 mortal wound, instead of D3.

Rotten and Rusted.name: GLEEFUL INVASION
Rotten and Rusted.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has shot or fought.
Rotten and Rusted.target: One NURGLINGS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one of more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Rotten and Rusted.effect: Your unit can make a Normal or Fall Back move of up to D6".

Scintillating Legion.name: PYROGENESIS
Scintillating Legion.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Scintillating Legion.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA TZEENTCH unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight that phase.
Scintillating Legion.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 2 to the Strength characteristic of weapons equipped by models in your unit, or spend one Flux token and add 3 to the Strength characteristic of those weapons and improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of those weapons by 1 instead.

Scintillating Legion.name: FLICKERING REALITY
Scintillating Legion.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Scintillating Legion.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA TZEENTCH unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Scintillating Legion.effect: Roll one D6, then you can spend one Flux token to re-roll the result: until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, on an unmodified Hit roll (after any re-roll) of that result, the attack sequence ends, even if the original Hit roll would have been a Critical Hit. Example: If you roll a 2 and choose to spend one Flux token to re-roll the result, and the re-roll is a 6, then until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, on an unmodified Hit roll of 6 the attack sequence ends, that attack fails to hit and no Critical Hit effects (e.g. Lethal Hits) are resolved.

Scintillating Legion.name: IMPOSSIBLE ECLIPSE
Scintillating Legion.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA TZEENTCH MONSTER unit from your army that is on the battlefield.
Scintillating Legion.effect: Select No Man’s Land or your opponent’s deployment zone, or spend one Flux token and select both. Until the end of the phase, the selected areas of the battlefield are within your army’s Shadow of Chaos.

Scintillating Legion.name: DELIRIUM UNMADE
Scintillating Legion.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
Scintillating Legion.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA TZEENTCH unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units. Alternatively, you can spend one Flux token when you use this Stratagem and target up to two LEGIONES DAEMONICA TZEENTCH units from your army instead (including those within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units).
Scintillating Legion.effect: Remove your units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves.

Scintillating Legion.name: FATEBORNE NIGHTMARES
Scintillating Legion.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
Scintillating Legion.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA TZEENTCH unit from your army.
Scintillating Legion.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a move, it can move through terrain features.

Scintillating Legion.name: FICKLEFIRE
Scintillating Legion.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA TZEENTCH unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Scintillating Legion.effect: Until the end of the phase, enemy units are not considered to be within Engagement Range of your unit for the purposes of selecting targets for, and resolving attacks with, ranged weapons. Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy model is destroyed while its unit is within Engagement Range of your unit, roll one D6: on a 5+, your unit suffers 1 mortal wound after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks.

Shadow Legion.name: DEATH DENIED
Shadow Legion.target: One SHADOW LEGION unit from your army.
Shadow Legion.effect: One model in your unit regains up to 3 lost wounds. In addition, If your unit has the TZEENTCH keyword, return up to one destroyed model (excluding CHARACTER models) to your unit with its full wounds remaining.

Shadow Legion.name: ENCROACHING DARKNESS
Shadow Legion.target: Up to one SHADOW LEGION HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army and up to one SHADOW LEGION LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army. You can only select units that arrived from Reserves this turn.
Shadow Legion.effect: Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your selected units have the [IGNORES COVER] ability.

Shadow Legion.name: SHADE PATH
Shadow Legion.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit declares a charge.
Shadow Legion.target: One SHADOW LEGION unit from your army that was selected as a target of that charge.
Shadow Legion.effect: Until the end of the phase, subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for that enemy unit. In addition, if your unit has the NURGLE keyword, that enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test.

Shadow Legion.name: SPITEFUL DEMISE
Shadow Legion.when: Any phase, just after a SHADOW LEGION unit from your army is destroyed, before removing the last model in that unit from the battlefield and before rolling any dice for the Deadly Demise ability.
Shadow Legion.target: That SHADOW LEGION unit. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
Shadow Legion.effect: Roll one D6 for each enemy unit that is within Engagement Range of the last model in your unit, adding 2 to the result if your unit has the SLAANESH keyword: on a 4-5, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6+, that enemy unit suffers 3 mortal wounds.

Shadow Legion.name: BINDING SHADOW
Shadow Legion.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
Shadow Legion.target: Up to one SHADOW LEGION HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army and up to one SHADOW LEGION LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army. You can only select units that are not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Shadow Legion.effect: Remove those selected units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves.

Shadow Legion.name: CHANNELLED WRATH
Shadow Legion.target: One SHADOW LEGION unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Shadow Legion.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LANCE] ability. If your unit has the KHORNE keyword, until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of those weapons by 1 as well.

Dark Zealots.name: Empyric Rites
Dark Zealots.when: Your opponent’s Shooting or Fight phase, after an enemy unit selects its targets.
Dark Zealots.target: One Heretic Astartes Infantry unit from your army.
Dark Zealots.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.

Dark Zealots.name: Bitter Blows
Dark Zealots.when: Fight phase, when a Heretic Astartes unit from your army is selected to fight.
Dark Zealots.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, roll one D6: on a 4+, that model can fight after its destruction.

Dark Zealots.name: Malicious Volleys
Dark Zealots.when: Your Shooting phase, when a Heretic Astartes Infantry unit from your army is selected to shoot.
Dark Zealots.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack, re‑roll Hit rolls of 1. If the enemy unit targeted by those attacks is below half-strength, you can re‑roll the Hit roll instead.

Cabal of Chaos.name: SHROUD OF CHAOS
Cabal of Chaos.group: CHAOS SPACE MARINES – Cabal of Chaos
Cabal of Chaos.when: Start of your opponent’s Shooting phase.
Cabal of Chaos.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES PSYKER, HERETIC ASTARTES DAEMON PRINCE or HERETIC ASTARTES DAEMON PRINCE WITH WINGS unit from your army.
Cabal of Chaos.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit has the following ability: Shroud of Chaos (Aura): Models in friendly HERETIC ASTARTES units within 6" of this unit have the Stealth ability.

Cabal of Chaos.name: BALEFUL BLESSING
Cabal of Chaos.group: CHAOS SPACE MARINES – Cabal of Chaos
Cabal of Chaos.when: Any phase, just after a HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army has a mortal wound allocated to it.
Cabal of Chaos.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against mortal wounds.

Cabal of Chaos.name: UNHOLY HASTE
Cabal of Chaos.group: CHAOS SPACE MARINES – Cabal of Chaos
Cabal of Chaos.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to charge that phase.
Cabal of Chaos.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

Cabal of Chaos.name: NO REST IN DEATH
Cabal of Chaos.group: CHAOS SPACE MARINES – Cabal of Chaos
Cabal of Chaos.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army within 9" of a HERETIC ASTARTES PSYKER, HERETIC ASTARTES DAEMON PRINCE or HERETIC ASTARTES DAEMON PRINCE WITH WINGS unit from your army.
Cabal of Chaos.effect: One model in your unit regains up to D3+1 lost wounds. If your unit has the BATTLELINE keyword, you can return up to D3 destroyed models (excluding CHARACTER models) to your unit with their full wounds remaining, instead.

Cabal of Chaos.name: MUTATION’S CURSE
Cabal of Chaos.group: CHAOS SPACE MARINES – Cabal of Chaos
Cabal of Chaos.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES PSYKER unit from your army.
Cabal of Chaos.effect: Select one visible enemy unit within 12" of your unit. Roll one D6: on a 1, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound; on a 2-4, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 5-6, that enemy unit suffers 2D3 mortal wounds.

Cabal of Chaos.name: SOULSEEKERS
Cabal of Chaos.group: CHAOS SPACE MARINES – Cabal of Chaos
Cabal of Chaos.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot that phase.
Cabal of Chaos.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability.

Champions of Chaos.name: IMPERIOUS ADVANCE
Champions of Chaos.group: CHAOS SPACE MARINES – Champions of Chaos
Champions of Chaos.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES TERMINATOR unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Champions of Chaos.effect: Select any number of models in your unit. Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by the selected models, and each time you select targets for attacks made by those models, they must target an enemy unit that is wholly on the opposite side of a Hatchway from them.

Champions of Chaos.name: MALIGN WILL
Champions of Chaos.group: CHAOS SPACE MARINES – Champions of Chaos
Champions of Chaos.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Champions of Chaos.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Champions of Chaos.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit takes a Leadership test for the Dark Pacts ability, subtract 1 from the result and, if passed, select one objective marker within 6" of your unit. If there are no enemy units within range of that objective marker (excluding Battle-shocked units], that objective marker is Secured by your army.

Champions of Chaos.name: INFERNAL PATRONS
Champions of Chaos.group: CHAOS SPACE MARINES – Champions of Chaos
Champions of Chaos.when: Any phase, just after your opponent targets a unit from their army with a Stratagem.
Champions of Chaos.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army within 3" of and visible to that enemy unit.
Champions of Chaos.effect: That enemy unit must take a Leadership test; if failed, that usage of that Stratagem has no effect (your opponent cannot use that Stratagem again this phase).

Champions of Chaos.name: AGGRESSIVE STRIKE
Champions of Chaos.group: CHAOS SPACE MARINES – Champions of Chaos
Champions of Chaos.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that arrived using the Deep Strike ability this turn.
Champions of Chaos.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".
Champions of Chaos.restrictions: Until the end of the turn, your unit is not eligible to declare a charge.

Chaos Cult.name: CRAZED FOCUS
Chaos Cult.target: One DAMNED unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Chaos Cult.effect: Your unit can make a Desperate Pact. If it does, until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1, and if your unit did not fail the resulting Leadership test when making that Desperate Pact, improve the Strength characteristic of that attack by 1 as well.

Chaos Cult.name: INFERNAL SACRIFICE
Chaos Cult.target: One DAMNED unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Chaos Cult.effect: Your unit can make a Desperate Pact. If it does, your unit suffers D3 mortal wounds (in  addition to any suffered for failing the resulting Leadership test), and until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the melee weapons equipped by models in your unit, and if your unit did not fail the resulting Leadership test when making that Desperate Pact, until the end of the  phase, improve the Strength characteristic of those  weapons by 1 as well.

Chaos Cult.name: CHOSEN FOR GLORY
Chaos Cult.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Chaos Cult.target: One DAMNED unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Chaos Cult.effect: Your unit can make a Desperate Pact. If it does, until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll, and if your unit did not fail the resulting Leadership test when making that Desperate Pact, you can re-roll the Wound roll as well.

Chaos Cult.name: MORTAL THRALLS
Chaos Cult.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected ts targets.
Chaos Cult.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking units attacks, and one friendly DAMNED unit within 3" of your unit and visible to both your unit and the attacking unit.
Chaos Cult.effect: Until the end of the phase, while your DAMNED unit is on the battlefield, each time your opponent would make a Wound roll for an attack that targets your HERETIC ASTARTES unit, if your DAMNED unit is visible to the attacking model and is an eligible target for that attack, no roll is made; instead, your DAMNED unit suffers a number of mortal wounds equal to the Damage characteristic of that attack.

Chaos Cult.name: RECKLESS HASTE
Chaos Cult.target: One DAMNED unit from your army.
Chaos Cult.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

Chaos Cult.name: SELFLESS DEMISE
Chaos Cult.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Chaos Cult.target: One DAMNED unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Chaos Cult.effect: Until the attacking unit has resolved all of its attacks, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, roll one D6 on a 6, the attacking unit suffers 1 mortal wound after all of its attacks have been resolved.

Creations of Bile.name: SPECIMENS FOR THE SPIDER
Creations of Bile.group: CHAOS SPACE MARINES – Creations of Bile
Creations of Bile.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Creations of Bile.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a melee attack that targets a CHARACTER unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll. After your unit has fought, if one or more enemy CHARACTER models were destroyed as a result of those attacks, select one enemy unit within 6" of your unit. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test. If the enemy WARLORD was destroyed as a result of those attacks, each enemy unit within 6" of your unit must take a Battle-shock test instead.

Creations of Bile.name: AUTOSTIMULANTS
Creations of Bile.group: CHAOS SPACE MARINES – Creations of Bile
Creations of Bile.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army.
Creations of Bile.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

Creations of Bile.name: DIABOLIC REGENERATION
Creations of Bile.group: CHAOS SPACE MARINES – Creations of Bile
Creations of Bile.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit (excluding DAMNED units) from your army.
Creations of Bile.effect: One destroyed model (excluding CHARACTER models) is returned to your unit. If your unit is a BATTLELINE unit, D3 destroyed models (excluding CHARACTER models) are returned to your unit instead.

Creations of Bile.name: MONSTROUS VISAGES
Creations of Bile.group: CHAOS SPACE MARINES – Creations of Bile
Creations of Bile.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Creations of Bile.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Creations of Bile.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

Creations of Bile.name: MASTERS ARE WATCHING
Creations of Bile.group: CHAOS SPACE MARINES – Creations of Bile
Creations of Bile.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Creations of Bile.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Creations of Bile.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, subtracting 1 from the result if it is a DAMNED unit: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. That destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

Creations of Bile.name: DELAYED MUTATIONS
Creations of Bile.group: CHAOS SPACE MARINES – Creations of Bile
Creations of Bile.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit (excluding DAMNED units) from your army.
Creations of Bile.effect: Your unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. Then select one augmentation (see Experimental Augmentations). Until the start of your next Command phase, models in your unit have the selected augmentation in addition to any other augmentations they have.

Deceptors.name: PICK THEM OFF
Deceptors.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Deceptors.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit that is below its Starting Strength, you can re-roll the Hit roll. If the target is Below Half-strength, you can re-roll the Wound roll as well.

Deceptors.name: FROM ALL SIDES
Deceptors.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army.
Deceptors.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to Charge rolls made for your unit for each other HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that made a Charge move this phase (to a maximum of +3)

Deceptors.name: SCRAMBLED COORDINATES
Deceptors.when: Start of the Reinforcements step of your opponent’s Movement phase.
Deceptors.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army.
Deceptors.effect: Until the end of the phase, enemy units that are set up on the battlefield from Reserves cannot be set up within 12" horizontally of your unit.

Deceptors.name: COILS OF DECEPTION
Deceptors.when: Your Movement phase, just after a HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army Falls Back.
Deceptors.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back

Deceptors.name: RELENTLESS PURSUIT
Deceptors.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
Deceptors.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY or HERETIC ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Deceptors.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".

Deceptors.name: DETONATOR
Deceptors.when: Any phase, just after an enemy model with the Deadly Demise ability (excluding TITANIC models) is destroyed
Deceptors.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES CHARACTER unit from your army that was within 18" of that enemy model when it was destroyed.
Deceptors.effect: Your opponent does not roll to determine whether mortal wounds are inflicted by their model’s Deadly Demise ability. Instead, mortal wounds are automatically inflicted (if that ability inflicts a random number of mortal wounds, your opponent rolls to determine that number as normal).

Dread Talons.name: PITILESS HUNTERS
Dread Talons.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from  your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Dread Talons.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit that is Battle-shocked and/or Below Half-strength, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

Dread Talons.name: DEPTHLESS CRUELTY
Dread Talons.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Dread Talons.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit that is Battle-shocked and/or Below Half-strength, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Dread Talons.name: BLOODY EXAMPLE
Dread Talons.when: Fight phase, just after a HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army destroys a CHARACTER unit.
Dread Talons.effect: Each enemy unit within 12" of and visible to your unit must take a Battle-shock test.

Dread Talons.name: MERCILESS PURSUIT
Dread Talons.when: End of your opponent’s Movement phase.
Dread Talons.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that is not within Engagement range of one or more enemy units.
Dread Talons.effect: Select one enemy unit that Fell Back this turn and is within 6" of your unit. Your unit can  declare a charge as if it were your Charge phase. When doing so, you can only select that enemy  unit as the target of that charge (and only if it is an eligible target). Note that even if this charge is successful, your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

Dread Talons.name: RELENTLESS TERROR
Dread Talons.when: Your Movement phase, just after a HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army Falls Back.
Dread Talons.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

Dread Talons.name: SCREAMING DESCENT
Dread Talons.when: Reinforcements step of your Movement phase, from the second battle round onwards.
Dread Talons.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES JUMP PACK unit from your army that is in Reserves.
Dread Talons.effect: Set your unit up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all  enemy units, but until the end of the turn, it is not eligible to declare a charge. Then select one enemy INFANTRY or MOUNTED unit within 9" of and visible to your unit: that unit must take a Battle-shock test.

Fellhammer Siege-host.name: PERSISTENT ASSAILANTS
Fellhammer Siege-host.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more attacks this phase and has not been selected to fight this phase.
Fellhammer Siege-host.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll, and if your unit is Below Half-strength you can re-roll the Wound roll as well.

Fellhammer Siege-host.name: PITILESS CANNONADE
Fellhammer Siege-host.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Fellhammer Siege-host.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit  that is Below Half-strength, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit

Fellhammer Siege-host.name: POINT-BLANK DESTRUCTION
Fellhammer Siege-host.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Fellhammer Siege-host.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit’s ranged weapons (excluding Blast weapons) have the  [PISTOL] ability.

Fellhammer Siege-host.name: BRUTAL ATTRITION
Fellhammer Siege-host.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Fellhammer Siege-host.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army (excluding DAMNED units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Fellhammer Siege-host.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a melee attack is allocated to your unit, after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, roll one D6 (to maximum of six D6 per attacking unit): for each 4+, the attacking unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

Fellhammer Siege-host.name: STEADFAST DETERMINATION
Fellhammer Siege-host.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Fellhammer Siege-host.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army (excluding DAMNED units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Fellhammer Siege-host.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

Fellhammer Siege-host.name: SIEGECRAFT
Fellhammer Siege-host.when: Start of your opponents Charge phase.
Fellhammer Siege-host.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army.
Fellhammer Siege-host.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy unit selects your unit as a target of a charge,  subtract 2 from the Charge roll (this is not cumulative with any other negative modifiers to that Charge roll).

Infernal Reavers.name: INVETERATE MURDERERS
Infernal Reavers.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army (excluding DAMNED units) that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Infernal Reavers.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is less than or equal to the Toughness characteristic of the target, add 1 to the Wound roll.

Infernal Reavers.name: LOW CUNNING
Infernal Reavers.when: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Infernal Reavers.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army (excluding DAMNED units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
Infernal Reavers.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

Infernal Reavers.name: CRUEL EXECUTION
Infernal Reavers.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army (excluding DAMNED units).
Infernal Reavers.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back.

Infernal Reavers.name: NEXT PRIZE
Infernal Reavers.when: Your Command phase, just after a HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army has Secured an objective marker, or your Movement phase, just after a HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army has opened a Hatchway.
Infernal Reavers.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 3". If this Stratagem is used in your Movement phase, at least one model from your unit must end that move on the opposite side of the Hatchway from the one it started the phase on.

Pactbound Zealots.name: PROFANE ZEAL
Pactbound Zealots.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Pactbound Zealots.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES CHAOS UNDIVIDED unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Pactbound Zealots.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

Pactbound Zealots.name: SKINSHIFT
Pactbound Zealots.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army.
Pactbound Zealots.effect: One model in your unit regains up to 3 lost wounds. In addition, if your unit is a TZEENTCH unit below its Starting Strength, one destroyed model (excluding CHARACTER models) is returned to your unit with its full wounds remaining.

Pactbound Zealots.name: EYE OF THE GODS
Pactbound Zealots.when: Fight phase, just after a HERETIC ASTARTES CHARACTER unit from your army (excluding  DAMNED, DAEMON and EPIC HERO units) destroys a enemy unit.
Pactbound Zealots.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES CHARACTER model in that unit.
Pactbound Zealots.effect: Until the end of the battle, add 1 to the Move, Toughness and Wounds characteristics of that  CHARACTER model, and add 1 to the Attacks. Strength and Damage characteristics of that CHARACTER model’s melee weapons.

Pactbound Zealots.name: TORPEFYING REFRAIN
Pactbound Zealots.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army.
Pactbound Zealots.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back. If your unit is a SLAANESH unit, until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back.

Pactbound Zealots.name: FESTERING MIASMA
Pactbound Zealots.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Pactbound Zealots.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Pactbound Zealots.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit has the Stealth ability. In addition, if your unit is a NURGLE unit, it can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 18".

Pactbound Zealots.name: ETERNAL HATE
Pactbound Zealots.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Pactbound Zealots.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Pactbound Zealots.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if it is a KHORNE unit: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. That destroyed model can fight after the attacking model’s unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

Renegade Raiders.name: RUINOUS RAID
Renegade Raiders.when: Your Shooting phase or your Fight phase
Renegade Raiders.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn and has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Renegade Raiders.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a  model in your unit makes an attack, if the target of that attack is within range of an objective marker, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

Renegade Raiders.name: SCOUR AND SEIZE
Renegade Raiders.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Renegade Raiders.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit within range of an objective marker, that attack has the [PRECISION] ability.

Renegade Raiders.name: UNFAILINGLY OBDURATE
Renegade Raiders.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Renegade Raiders.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army (excluding DAMNED units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Renegade Raiders.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Renegade Raiders.name: OPPORTUNISTIC RAIDERS
Renegade Raiders.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that was eligible to fight this phase.
Renegade Raiders.effect: If your unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 6", or up to 12" if it is a MOUNTED unit. Otherwise, your unit can make a Fall Back move. It cannot embark within a TRANSPORT at the end of this move if it disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn.

Renegade Raiders.name: REAVERS’ HASTE
Renegade Raiders.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY or HERETIC ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army.
Renegade Raiders.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it  Advanced. If you select one or more units within range of an objective marker as a target of that charge, add 1 to the Charge roll.

Renegade Raiders.name: WARPCHARGED ENGINES
Renegade Raiders.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES TRANSPORT or HERETIC ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
Renegade Raiders.effect: Until the end of the phase, if your unit  Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.

Soulforged Warpack.name: DESPERATE PLEDGE
Soulforged Warpack.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Soulforged Warpack.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES DAEMON VEHICLE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Soulforged Warpack.effect: Until the end of the phase, if your unit invokes its contract, each time it makes an attack, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Soulforged Warpack.name: DAEMONIC POSSESION
Soulforged Warpack.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES VEHICLE unit from your army (excluding DAEMON units).
Soulforged Warpack.effect: Until the end of the battle, your unit has the DAEMON keyword.

Soulforged Warpack.name: UNSTOPPABLE RAMPAGE
Soulforged Warpack.when: Your Movement phase or Charge phase.
Soulforged Warpack.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES VEHICLE or VASHTORR THE ARKIFANE unit from your army that has not been selected to move or charge this phase.
Soulforged Warpack.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes Normal, Advance or charge move, it can move horizontally through terrain features as if they were not there.

Soulforged Warpack.name: GLUT OF SOULS
Soulforged Warpack.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES DAEMON VEHICLE unit from your army (excluding TITANIC units) that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Soulforged Warpack.effect: Until the end of the phase, if your unit invokes its contract, each time it makes an attack that destroys an enemy model, roll one D6: on 5+, your unit regains 1 lost wound after all of its attacks have been resolved (to a maximum of 6 wound).

Soulforged Warpack.name: FEEDING FRENZY
Soulforged Warpack.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, when an enemy unit (excluding MONSTER and VEHICLES) is selected to Fall Back.
Soulforged Warpack.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES DAEMON VEHICLE or VASHTORR THE ARKIFANE unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
Soulforged Warpack.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) that is within Engagement Range of your units Falls Back, all models in that enemy unit must take a Desperate Escape test. When doing so, of that enemy unit is Battle-shocked, substract 1 from each of those tests.

Soulforged Warpack.name: PREDATORY PURSUIT
Soulforged Warpack.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall back move.
Soulforged Warpack.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES VEHICLE or VASHTORR THE ARKIFANE unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Soulforged Warpack.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6", but must end that move as close as possible to that enemy unit.

Underdeck Uprising.name: FLEETING MIGHT
Underdeck Uprising.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after a DAMNED unit from your army makes a Dark Pact.
Underdeck Uprising.effect: Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

Underdeck Uprising.name: INFERNAL ALTARS
Underdeck Uprising.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Underdeck Uprising.target: One DAMNED unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
Underdeck Uprising.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, if your unit is within range of an objective marker, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against that attack. If your unit has the CULTIST MOB keyword, models in it have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against that attack instead.

Underdeck Uprising.name: CRUDE SABOTAGE
Underdeck Uprising.target: One CULTIST MOB or DAMNED CHARACTER unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase and is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Underdeck Uprising.effect: Select one closed Hatchway within 1“ of your unit. Your unit can attempt to operate that Hatchway.
Underdeck Uprising.restrictions: Until the end of the turn, your unit cannot attempt to operate a Hatchway again.

Underdeck Uprising.name: STORM THE BRIDGE!
Underdeck Uprising.target: One DAMNED or CHAOS SPAWN unit from your army.
Underdeck Uprising.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

Veterans of the Long War.name: CONTEMPTUOUS DISREGARD
Veterans of the Long War.group: CHAOS SPACE MARINES – Veterans of the Long War
Veterans of the Long War.when: Your opponents Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Veterans of the Long War.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army (excluding DAMNED units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Veterans of the Long War.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Veterans of the Long War.name: LET THE GALAXY BURN
Veterans of the Long War.group: CHAOS SPACE MARINES – Veterans of the Long War
Veterans of the Long War.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army (excluding TZEENTCH units) that has not been selected to shoot this phase
Veterans of the Long War.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability, and change the Attacks characteristic of Torrent weapons equipped by models in your unit to 6.

Veterans of the Long War.name: BRINGERS OF DESPAIR
Veterans of the Long War.group: CHAOS SPACE MARINES – Veterans of the Long War
Veterans of the Long War.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army (excluding DAMNED units) that is within Engagement Range of your focus of hatred.
Veterans of the Long War.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit has the Fights First ability.

Veterans of the Long War.name: ENDLESS IRE
Veterans of the Long War.group: CHAOS SPACE MARINES – Veterans of the Long War
Veterans of the Long War.when: Any phase, just after your focus of hatred is destroyed.
Veterans of the Long War.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES CHARACTER unit from  your army (excluding DAMNED units)
Veterans of the Long War.effect: Select one enemy unit within 12" of and visible to your unit. Until the start of your next Command phase, that enemy unit is considered to be your focus of hatred.

Veterans of the Long War.name: BLACK CRUSADE
Veterans of the Long War.group: CHAOS SPACE MARINES – Veterans of the Long War
Veterans of the Long War.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit or HERETIC ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army  (excluding DAMNED units).
Veterans of the Long War.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is  eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Advanced  or Fell Back, and bolt pistols, boltguns and combi-bolters equipped by models in your unit have  the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability while your unit has not already inflicted 6 wounds this turn using that ability.

Veterans of the Long War.name: MILLENNIA OF EXPERIENCE
Veterans of the Long War.group: CHAOS SPACE MARINES – Veterans of the Long War
Veterans of the Long War.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
Veterans of the Long War.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY or HERETIC ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army (excluding  DAMNED units) that is within 9" of that enemy unit and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Veterans of the Long War.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".

The Shambling Horde.name: Corrosive Effluents
The Shambling Horde.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
The Shambling Horde.target: One Death Guard unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
The Shambling Horde.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

The Shambling Horde.name: Harbingers of Despair
The Shambling Horde.target: One Death Guard unit from your army.
The Shambling Horde.effect: Each enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit must take a Battle-shock test.

The Shambling Horde.name: Disgustingly Resilient
The Shambling Horde.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
The Shambling Horde.target: One Death Guard unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
The Shambling Horde.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to a model in your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

Arch-Contaminators.name: CLOUD OF FLIES
Arch-Contaminators.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Arch-Contaminators.target: One DEATH GUARD unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
Arch-Contaminators.effect: Until the end of the turn, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

Arch-Contaminators.name: CORROSIVE CURSE
Arch-Contaminators.target: One DEATH GUARD TERMINATOR unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Arch-Contaminators.effect: Select one objective marker within Contagion Range of and visible to your unit. That objective marker is Secured by your army.
Arch-Contaminators.restrictions: You can only use this Stratagem once and, until the end of the turn, your unit is not eligible to shoot or declare a charge.

Arch-Contaminators.name: ALLIES OF ENTROPY
Arch-Contaminators.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Arch-Contaminators.target: One DEATH GUARD unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Arch-Contaminators.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

Arch-Contaminators.name: SEED OF CORRUPTION
Arch-Contaminators.target: One DEATH GUARD TERMINATOR unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Arch-Contaminators.effect: If your unit was set up on the battlefield this turn, it can perform a Tactical Manoeuvre this phase as if it was not set up on the battlefield this turn.

Champions of Contagion.name: GROTESQUE FORTITUDE
Champions of Contagion.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Champions of Contagion.target: One DEATH GUARD Attached unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Champions of Contagion.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 2 to the Toughness characteristic of models in your unit.

Champions of Contagion.name: MALIGNANCE MAGNIFIED
Champions of Contagion.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Champions of Contagion.target: One DEATH GUARD Attached unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Champions of Contagion.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit that is below its Starting Strength, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

Champions of Contagion.name: BLESSINGS OF FILTH
Champions of Contagion.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Champions of Contagion.target: One DEATH GUARD Attached unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Champions of Contagion.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

Champions of Contagion.name: MOBILE VECTOR
Champions of Contagion.when: Your Movement phase, before the Reinforcements step.
Champions of Contagion.target: One DEATH GUARD CHARACTER unit from your army that is not leading a unit.
Champions of Contagion.effect: Select one other friendly DEATH GUARD unit (excluding Battle-shocked units and Attached units that already have two Leader units or one of your CHARACTER units leading it] within 2" horizontally and 5" vertically of your unit that your unit can lead (as described in the Leader section of its datasheet]. Your unit attaches to that unit as a Leader. Change that unit’s Starting Strength accordingly.

Champions of Contagion.name: RABID INFUSION
Champions of Contagion.target: One DEATH GUARD unit from your army that includes two CHARACTER models.
Champions of Contagion.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit has the Fights First ability.

Champions of Contagion.name: DEATH’S HEADS
Champions of Contagion.target: One BIOLOGUS PUTRIFIER unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Champions of Contagion.effect: Select one enemy unit (excluding VEHICLES) that is within 8" of and visible to your unit. Until the start of your next turn, that unit has the effect of all Plagues (see Nurgle’s Gift).

Death Lord’s Chosen.name: GRIM REAPERS
Death Lord’s Chosen.target: One TERMINATOR unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Death Lord’s Chosen.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets an enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) you can re-roll the Hit roll.

Death Lord’s Chosen.name: SIGNAL POX
Death Lord’s Chosen.target: One LORD OF VIRULENCE model from your army.
Death Lord’s Chosen.effect: Select one objective marker within 30" of and visible to your model. Until the start of your next turn, while an enemy unit is within range of that objective marker, that unit is Afflicted.

Death Lord’s Chosen.name: BLOOMING PESTILENCE
Death Lord’s Chosen.target: One TERMINATOR unit from your army.
Death Lord’s Chosen.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 3" to the Contagion Range of models in your unit.

Death Lord’s Chosen.name: UNDYING SPITE
Death Lord’s Chosen.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Death Lord’s Chosen.target: One TERMINATOR unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Death Lord’s Chosen.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6. On a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

Death Lord’s Chosen.name: MORTARION'S TEACHINGS
Death Lord’s Chosen.target: One TERMINATOR unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Death Lord’s Chosen.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [ASSAULT] and [HEAVY] abilities.

Death Lord’s Chosen.name: SICKENING IMPACT
Death Lord’s Chosen.when: Your Charge phase, just after a TERMINATOR unit from your army ends a Charge move.
Death Lord’s Chosen.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit, then roll one D6 for each model in your unit that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit: for each 2+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).

Vectors of Decay.name: INFESTATION
Vectors of Decay.when: Start or end of any turn, when an enemy unit attempts to Seize an objective marker you have Secured.
Vectors of Decay.target: One DEATH GUARD unit from your army (excluding CULTISTS and POXWALKERS units) within Contagion Range of that objective marker.
Vectors of Decay.effect: Roll one D6: on a 5+, until the end of your next turn, that objective marker remains Secured by your army and you are considered to control it, regardless of how many enemy models are within range of it.
Vectors of Decay.restrictions: You can only use this Stratagem once per battle round.

Vectors of Decay.name: CHINKS IN THE ARMOUR
Vectors of Decay.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Vectors of Decay.target: One DEATH GUARD unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Vectors of Decay.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit within Contagion Range of one or more units from your army, a Critical Hit is scored on an unmodified Hit roll of 5+, instead of only a 6.

Vectors of Decay.name: GROTESQUE DEMISE
Vectors of Decay.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after a DEATH GUARD unit from your army (excluding CULTISTS and POXWALKERS units) has shot or fought.
Vectors of Decay.effect: Select one enemy unit that had one or more models destroyed as a result of those attacks. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test.

Vectors of Decay.name: SEEPING CORROSION
Vectors of Decay.when: Your Movement phase, when a DEATH GUARD unit from your army (excluding CULTISTS and POXWALKERS units) attempts to open a Hatchway.
Vectors of Decay.effect: Select one enemy unit within 1" of your unit and on the opposite side of that Hatchway from your unit, and roll one D6: on a 2-4, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound; on a 5+, that enemy unit suffers 2 mortal wounds. Until the end of the phase, if an enemy unit attempts to prevent that Hatchway from being opened, when rolling off, you can re-roll your result.

Flyblown Host.name: MYPHITIC INVIGORATION
Flyblown Host.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Flyblown Host.target: One DEATH GUARD INFANTRY unit from your army that is within 6" of one or more friendly MYPHITIC BLIGHT-HAULER units and that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Flyblown Host.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of this unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

Flyblown Host.name: DRONING HORROR
Flyblown Host.target: One DEATH GUARD INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Flyblown Host.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. If that attack targets a unit within half range, you can re-roll the Hit roll instead.

Flyblown Host.name: VERMIN CLOUD
Flyblown Host.target: One DEATH GUARD INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Flyblown Host.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in this unit makes a Pile-in or Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3".

Flyblown Host.name: NAUSEATING PAROXYSMS
Flyblown Host.target: One DEATH GUARD INFANTRY unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Flyblown Host.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit. That unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result.

Flyblown Host.name: EYE OF THE SWARM
Flyblown Host.target: One DEATH GUARD INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Flyblown Host.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit (excluding Blast weapons) have the [PISTOL] ability.

Flyblown Host.name: ENERVATING ONSLAUGHT
Flyblown Host.when: Your Charge phase, just after a DEATH GUARD INFANTRY unit from your army makes a Charge move.
Flyblown Host.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES). Roll one D6 for each model in your unit that is within Engagement Range of that unit, adding 1 to the result if that model is not a CULTIST or POXWALKER model: for each 5+, the selected enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).

Mortarion’s Hammer.name: DRAWN TO DESPAIR
Mortarion’s Hammer.target: One DEATH GUARD unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Mortarion’s Hammer.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a visible enemy unit (excluding AIRCRAFT) within your opponent’s deployment zone, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

Mortarion’s Hammer.name: STINKING MIRE
Mortarion’s Hammer.when: Start of your opponent’s Charge phase.
Mortarion’s Hammer.target: One DEATH GUARD VEHICLE unit from your army.
Mortarion’s Hammer.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy unit selects your unit as the target of a charge, subtract 2 from the Charge roll (this is not cumulative with any other negative modifiers to that Charge roll).

Mortarion’s Hammer.name: EYESTINGER STORM
Mortarion’s Hammer.target: One DEATH GUARD VEHICLE unit from your army.
Mortarion’s Hammer.effect: Select one objective marker visible to one or more models in your unit. Each Afflicted enemy unit within range of that objective marker must take a Battle-shock test. Enemy units affected by this Stratagem do not need to take any other Battle-shock tests in the same phase.

Mortarion’s Hammer.name: FONT OF FILTH
Mortarion’s Hammer.target: One DEATH GUARD VEHICLE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Mortarion’s Hammer.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [ASSAULT] ability.

Mortarion’s Hammer.name: RELENTLESS GRIND
Mortarion’s Hammer.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
Mortarion’s Hammer.target: One DEATH GUARD VEHICLE unit from your army that has not been selected to move or charge this phase.
Mortarion’s Hammer.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes a Normal, Advance or Charge move, it can move horizontally through terrain features.

Mortarion’s Hammer.name: BLIGHTED LAND
Mortarion’s Hammer.target: One DEATH GUARD VEHICLE unit from your army.
Mortarion’s Hammer.effect: Select one terrain feature within 24" of and visible to your unit. Until the start of your next turn, enemy units are Afflicted while they are within 3" of that terrain feature.

Shamblerot Vectorium.name: GNAWING HUNGER
Shamblerot Vectorium.target: One POXWALKERS unit from your army.
Shamblerot Vectorium.effect: Until the end of the turn, add 1 to the Move characteristic of models in your unit, and add 1 to the Attacks and Strength characteristics of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit.

Shamblerot Vectorium.name: HIDDEN AMONGST THE DEAD
Shamblerot Vectorium.when: The Reinforcements step of your Movement phase.
Shamblerot Vectorium.target: One POXWALKERS unit from your army that is in Strategic Reserves and that is not an Attached unit.
Shamblerot Vectorium.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in that unit have the Deep Strike ability.

Shamblerot Vectorium.name: GRIP OF THE WALKING POX
Shamblerot Vectorium.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Shamblerot Vectorium.target: One POXWALKERS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Shamblerot Vectorium.effect: After the attacking unit has fought, roll one D6 for each model from your unit that was destroyed as a result of those attacks: on a 6, the attacking unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If your unit is not destroyed after the attacking unit has fought, enemy models destroyed as a result of this Stratagem count as enemy models destroyed by an attack made by a model in your unit for the purposes of the Curse of the Walking Pox ability.

Shamblerot Vectorium.name: SMEARED WITH FILTH
Shamblerot Vectorium.target: One POXWALKERS unit from your army that was just destroyed. You can target that unit with this Stratagem even though it was just destroyed.
Shamblerot Vectorium.effect: Select one enemy unit that made one or more attacks that targeted your unit this phase. Until the end of the battle, that enemy unit is Afflicted.

Shamblerot Vectorium.name: SHAMBLING WALL
Shamblerot Vectorium.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Shamblerot Vectorium.target: One DEATH GUARD unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks, and one friendly POXWALKERS unit within 3" of your unit and visible to both your unit and the attacking unit.
Shamblerot Vectorium.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time you would allocate an attack to a model in your DEATH GUARD unit, if your POXWALKERS unit is visible to the attacking model and is an eligible target for that attack, no saving throw is made for that attack; instead a number of POXWALKERS from your POXWALKERS unit equal to the Damage characteristic of that attack are destroyed.

Shamblerot Vectorium.name: SHOCK AND HORROR
Shamblerot Vectorium.when: Your Charge phase, just after a DEATH GUARD unit from your army ends a Charge move.
Shamblerot Vectorium.effect: Each enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from that test.

Tallyband Summoners.name: CLUTCHING CORRUPTION
Tallyband Summoners.target: One DEATH GUARD unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Tallyband Summoners.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets an enemy unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more PLAGUE LEGIONS units from your army, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

Tallyband Summoners.name: AVATARS OF DECAY
Tallyband Summoners.target: One PLAGUE LEGIONS unit from your army.
Tallyband Summoners.effect: Until the end of the phase, while an enemy unit is within 6" of your unit, that enemy unit is Afflicted.

Tallyband Summoners.name: FLESHY AVALANCHE
Tallyband Summoners.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
Tallyband Summoners.target: One PLAGUE LEGIONS MONSTER unit from your army that has not been selected to move or charge this phase.
Tallyband Summoners.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes a Normal, Advance or Charge move, it can move horizontally through terrain features.

Tallyband Summoners.name: ALL IS ROT
Tallyband Summoners.target: One PLAGUE LEGIONS unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Tallyband Summoners.effect: Until the end of the phase, enemy units are not considered to be within Engagement Range of your unit for the purposes of selecting targets of ranged weapons. Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy model loses a wound, while that model’s unit is within Engagement Range of your unit, roll one D6: on a 5+, your unit suffers 1 mortal wound after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks.

Tallyband Summoners.name: PERSISTENT PESTS
Tallyband Summoners.target: One NURGLINGS unit from your army that was just destroyed. You can target that unit with this Stratagem even though it was just destroyed.
Tallyband Summoners.effect: Add a new unit to your army identical to your destroyed unit, in Strategic Reserves, at its Starting Strength and with its full wounds remaining.

Tallyband Summoners.name: MIRESLICK
Tallyband Summoners.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, when an enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) is selected to Fall Back.
Tallyband Summoners.target: One PLAGUE LEGIONS unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
Tallyband Summoners.effect: Until the end of the phase, while an enemy unit is within Engagement Range of your unit, each time that unit is selected to Fall Back, it must take a Leadership test. If that test is failed, that unit must Remain Stationary this phase instead.

Unclean Uprising.name: POX FLARE
Unclean Uprising.target: One POXWALKERS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Unclean Uprising.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1.

Unclean Uprising.name: PATH OF PESTILENCE
Unclean Uprising.target: One DEATH GUARD CULTISTS unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase and is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Unclean Uprising.effect: Select one closed Hatchway within 1” of your unit. Your unit can attempt to operate that Hatchway.
Unclean Uprising.restrictions: Until the end of the turn, your unit cannot attempt to operate a Hatchway again.

Unclean Uprising.name: SHAMBLING ONSLAUGHT
Unclean Uprising.when: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit is selected to Fall Back.
Unclean Uprising.target: One POXWALKERS unit from your army within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
Unclean Uprising.effect: After that enemy unit ends that Fall Back move, if your unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, your unit can make a Normal move.

Unclean Uprising.name: THE DEAD RISE
Unclean Uprising.when: Your Movement phase, at the start of the Reinforcements step.
Unclean Uprising.target: One POXWALKERS unit from your army that is in Reserves.
Unclean Uprising.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit has the Deep Strike ability.
Unclean Uprising.restrictions: You can only use this Stratagem once.

Virulent Vectorium.name: DISGUSTINGLY RESILIENT
Virulent Vectorium.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Virulent Vectorium.target: One DEATH GUARD unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Virulent Vectorium.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to a model in your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

Virulent Vectorium.name: PLAGUESURGE
Virulent Vectorium.target: Your DEATH GUARD WARLORD that is on the battlefield.
Virulent Vectorium.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, add 3" to the Contagion Range of models from your army.

Virulent Vectorium.name: LEECHSPORE ERUPTION
Virulent Vectorium.target: One DEATH GUARD model your army that has lost one or more wounds.
Virulent Vectorium.effect: Select one enemy unit within 3" of your model. Roll a number of D6 equal to the number of wounds your model has lost: for each 5+, that enemy unit suffers one mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds) and your model regains 1 lost wound (to a maximum of 6 lost wounds).

Virulent Vectorium.name: PUTRID DETONATION
Virulent Vectorium.target: One DEATH GUARD VEHICLE or DEATH GUARD MONSTER model from your army with the Deadly Demise ability that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.
Virulent Vectorium.effect: Do not roll one D6 to determine whether mortal wounds are inflicted by your model’s Deadly Demise ability. Instead, mortal wounds are automatically inflicted. In addition, any enemy units that suffer mortal wounds as a result of this Stratagem are Afflicted until the start of your next turn.

Virulent Vectorium.name: CREEPING BLIGHT
Virulent Vectorium.target: One DEATH GUARD INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Virulent Vectorium.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets an Afflicted unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

Virulent Vectorium.name: OVERWHELMING GENEROSITY
Virulent Vectorium.target: One DEATH GUARD CHARACTER unit from your army.
Virulent Vectorium.effect: Select one enemy unit visible to your unit. Until the end of the phase, each time a DEATH GUARD unit from your army selects that enemy unit as the target of any ranged attacks, you can re-roll the dice to determine how many attacks a weapon equipped by a model in that unit makes.

The Blades of Torment.name: Quicksilver Reactions
The Blades of Torment.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
The Blades of Torment.target: One Drukhari Infantry unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
The Blades of Torment.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

The Blades of Torment.name: Many Cuts
The Blades of Torment.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
The Blades of Torment.target: One Drukhari Infantry unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
The Blades of Torment.effect: Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability while targeting a unit that is below its Starting Strength.

The Blades of Torment.name: There and Gone
The Blades of Torment.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
The Blades of Torment.target: One Drukhari Infantry unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, and one friendly Transport model.
The Blades of Torment.effect: Your Infantry unit can embark within that Transport model.
The Blades of Torment.restrictions: Every model in your Infantry unit must be within 3" of that Transport model and there must be sufficient transport capacity to embark the entire unit.

Kabalite Corsairs.name: DECKPLATE SWEEPERS
Kabalite Corsairs.target: One KABAL unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Kabalite Corsairs.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of splinter cannons, splinter rifles and splinter pistols equipped by models in your unit by 1.

Kabalite Corsairs.name: ELUSIVE DUELLISTS
Kabalite Corsairs.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Kabalite Corsairs.target: One DRUKHARI unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Kabalite Corsairs.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll and, if your unit has the INCUBI keyword, models in your unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.

Kabalite Corsairs.name: TAKE THEM ALIVE
Kabalite Corsairs.when: Your Shooting phase, just after a KABAL unit from your army has shot.
Kabalite Corsairs.effect: Select one enemy unit hit by one or more of your unit’s attacks this phase (excluding those made with Pistols). That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result if your unit is within 6” of it.

Kabalite Corsairs.name: OPPORTUNISTIC THIEVES
Kabalite Corsairs.target: One KABAL unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Kabalite Corsairs.effect: Select one objective marker you do not control that is visible to your unit. Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6", but if it does, every model in that unit must end that move as close as possible to that objective marker.

Painbringers.name: MOULDED MUSCULATURE
Painbringers.target: One HAEMONCULUS COVENS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Painbringers.effect: Select any number of models in your unit. Until the end of the phase, improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of melee weapons equipped by the selected models by 1, and each time you select targets for attacks made by those models, they must target an enemy unit that is wholly on the opposite side of a Hatchway from them.

Painbringers.name: UNFEELING ABOMINATIONS
Painbringers.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Painbringers.target: One HAEMONCULUS COVENS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
Painbringers.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 if your unit has the GROTESQUES keyword: on a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.
Painbringers.restrictions: If your unit has the GROTESQUES keyword, until the end of the phase, it loses the Mindless Killing Machines ability.

Painbringers.name: HORRIFYING FORM
Painbringers.when: End of any phase, when an objective marker Secured by your army would be Seized by an enemy unit.
Painbringers.target: One HAEMONCULUS COVENS unit from your army within range of that objective marker.
Painbringers.effect: Until the end of your next turn, while you have one or more DRUKHARI units within range of that objective marker (excluding Battle-shocked units), that objective marker remains Secured by your army and cannot be Seized by enemy units.
Painbringers.restrictions: You can only use this Stratagem once per battle round.

Painbringers.name: TERRIFYING AURA
Painbringers.when: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Painbringers.target: One HAEMONCULUS COVENS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks and is within 6" of the attacking unit.
Painbringers.effect: That enemy unit must take a Leadership test, subtracting 1 if it is within 3" of your unit: if failed, until the end of the phase, each time a model in that enemy unit makes an attack that targets your unit, an unmodified Hit roll of 6 is required to score a hit, irrespective of the attacking weapon’s Ballistic Skill or any modifiers.

Realspace Raiders.name: PREY ON THE WEAK
Realspace Raiders.target: One KABAL unit from your army and one enemy unit that is Below Half-strength.
Realspace Raiders.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

Realspace Raiders.name: INSENSIBLE TO PAIN
Realspace Raiders.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Realspace Raiders.target: One HAEMONCULUS COVENS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Realspace Raiders.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

Realspace Raiders.name: ALLIANCE OF AGONY
Realspace Raiders.target: One ARCHON, one SUCCUBUS and one HAEMONCULUS from your army.
Realspace Raiders.effect: Discard one Pain token from your Pain token pool. Until the end of the phase, all three of those models’ units are Empowered.
Realspace Raiders.restrictions: You can only use this Stratagem if you are able to select all three of the target models stated above.

Realspace Raiders.name: QUICKSILVER REACTIONS
Realspace Raiders.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Realspace Raiders.target: One DRUKHARI unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Realspace Raiders.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack that targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
Realspace Raiders.restrictions: You cannot target a HAEMONCULUS COVENS unit from your army for this Stratagem.

Realspace Raiders.name: STRIKE AND FADE
Realspace Raiders.target: One DRUKHARI unit from your army (excluding AIRCRAFT).
Realspace Raiders.effect: Your unit can immediately make a Normal move.
Realspace Raiders.restrictions: Until the end of the turn, your unit is not eligible to declare a charge and that unit cannot embark within a TRANSPORT at the end of this move.

Realspace Raiders.name: ACROBATIC DISPLAY
Realspace Raiders.target: One WYCH CULT unit from your army.
Realspace Raiders.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge even if it Fell Back or Advanced this turn.

Reaper’s Wager.name: MURDERER’S CIRCUS
Reaper’s Wager.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Reaper’s Wager.target: One DRUKHARI or HARLEQUINS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Reaper’s Wager.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

Reaper’s Wager.name: MALICIOUS FRENZY
Reaper’s Wager.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Reaper’s Wager.target: One DRUKHARI or HARLEQUINS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Reaper’s Wager.effect: Select [LETHAL HITS] or [SUSTAINED HITS 1]. Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have the selected ability.

Reaper’s Wager.name: FATEFUL ROLE
Reaper’s Wager.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Reaper’s Wager.target: One DRUKHARI or HARLEQUINS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Reaper’s Wager.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if that unit is losing the wager: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. That destroyed model can fight after the attacking model’s unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

Reaper’s Wager.name: SHORTEN THE ODDS
Reaper’s Wager.when: Your Movement phase, just after a DRUKHARI or HARLEQUINS unit from your army has Advanced.
Reaper’s Wager.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

Reaper’s Wager.name: DANCE MACABRE
Reaper’s Wager.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
Reaper’s Wager.target: One DRUKHARI INFANTRY or HARLEQUINS INFANTRY unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit.
Reaper’s Wager.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6". If your unit is currently losing the wager, it can make a Normal move of up to 6" instead.

Reaper’s Wager.name: SCINTILLATING TEMPO
Reaper’s Wager.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase, just after a DRUKHARI or HARLEQUINS unit from your army is selected to make a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, is set up on the battlefield, or declares a charge.
Reaper’s Wager.effect: Until the end of the turn, enemy units cannot use the Fire Overwatch Stratagem to shoot at your unit.

Ship-killer Cult.name: HYPERAGILITY
Ship-killer Cult.when: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Ship-killer Cult.target: One WYCH CULT unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Ship-killer Cult.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll and subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

Ship-killer Cult.name: TOYING WITH THE PREY
Ship-killer Cult.when: Fight phase, just after a WYCH CULT unit from your army has fought.
Ship-killer Cult.effect: If your unit destroyed one or more enemy models this phase, select one of those enemy models. Until the end of your opponent’s next turn, subtract 1 from the Objective Control characteristic of models in that enemy model's unit (to a minimum of l).

Ship-killer Cult.name: NO OBSTACLE
Ship-killer Cult.target: One WYCH CULT unit from your army that opened a Hatchway this turn.
Ship-killer Cult.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit can declare a charge that includes one or more targets that are not visible to it, provided each of those units that are not visible to it are wholly on the opposite side of that Hatchway from your unit.

Ship-killer Cult.name: PHANTASM GRENADES
Ship-killer Cult.when: Your Movement phase, just after a WYCH CULT unit from your army ends a Normal move, before any enemy units fire Overwatch.
