Ship-killer Cult.effect: Select one enemy unit within 9" of and visible to your unit. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result: if failed, until the end of the turn, that enemy unit cannot fire Overwatch.

Skysplinter Assault.name: SKYBORNE ANNIHILATION
Skysplinter Assault.target: One DRUKHARI unit from your army that disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Skysplinter Assault.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability, or the [SUSTAINED HITS 2] ability instead if it is a KABALITE WARRIORS unit.

Skysplinter Assault.name: POUNCE ON THE PREY
Skysplinter Assault.when: Your Movement phase, just after a DRUKHARI INFANTRY unit from your army disembarks from a TRANSPORT that made a Normal move this phase.
Skysplinter Assault.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to declare a charge.

Skysplinter Assault.name: WRAITHLIKE RETREAT
Skysplinter Assault.target: One DRUKHARI INFANTRY unit from your army that fought this phase.
Skysplinter Assault.effect: Your unit can make a Normal or Fall Back move, but unless it is a WYCHES unit, it must end that move wholly within 3" horizontally and 5" vertically of a friendly DRUKHARI TRANSPORT and must embark within that TRANSPORT at the end of that move.

Skysplinter Assault.name: VICIOUS BLADES
Skysplinter Assault.when: Fight phase, just after a DRUKHARI TRANSPORT from your army has selected its targets.
Skysplinter Assault.effect: After your TRANSPORT has fought, select one enemy unit that was the target of one or more of those attacks and roll one D6 for each model embarked within your TRANSPORT, adding 1 to the result if that embarked model is a WRACKS model: for each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).

Skysplinter Assault.name: SWOOPING MOCKERY
Skysplinter Assault.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
Skysplinter Assault.target: One DRUKHARI TRANSPORT from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and is within 9" of the enemy unit that just ended that move.
Skysplinter Assault.effect: Your TRANSPORT can make a Normal move of up to 6".

Skysplinter Assault.name: NIGHT SHIELD
Skysplinter Assault.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Skysplinter Assault.target: One DRUKHARI VEHICLE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Skysplinter Assault.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit has a 4+ invulnerable save.

Space Lane Raiders.name: CREW-THIEVES
Space Lane Raiders.target: One WRACKS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Space Lane Raiders.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [ANTI-INFANTRY 3+] ability.

Space Lane Raiders.name: SHIPBOARD SHADES
Space Lane Raiders.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Space Lane Raiders.target: One DRUKHARI unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Space Lane Raiders.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

Space Lane Raiders.name: VOIDSHIP GLADIATORS
Space Lane Raiders.target: One WYCHES unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
Space Lane Raiders.effect: Roll one D6: on a 2+, until the end of the turn, enemy units cannot fire Overwatch at your unit.

Space Lane Raiders.name: VETERAN PIRATES
Space Lane Raiders.when: Your Shooting phase, just after a KABALITE WARRIORS unit from your army has shot.
Space Lane Raiders.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 3".

Carnival of Excess.name: UNCANNY REACTIONS
Carnival of Excess.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Carnival of Excess.target: One SLAANESH unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Carnival of Excess.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

Carnival of Excess.name: SYCOPHANTIC SURGE
Carnival of Excess.target: One LEGIONS OF EXCESS unit from your army.
Carnival of Excess.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back, provided at least one of the targets of that charge is within Engagement Range of one or more EMPEROR’S CHILDREN units from your army.

Carnival of Excess.name: SUSTAINED BY AGONY
Carnival of Excess.when: Fight phase, just after an EMPEROR’S CHILDREN unit from your army destroys an enemy unit.
Carnival of Excess.effect: Select one friendly LEGIONS OF EXCESS unit within 6" of your unit. One model in that LEGIONS OF EXCESS unit recovers up to 3 lost wounds or, if it is a DAEMONETTES unit, return upto D3+3 destroyed models to it instead.

Carnival of Excess.name: VIOLENT CRESCENDO
Carnival of Excess.target: One SLAANESH BEASTS, SLAANESH INFANTRY or SLAANESH MOUNTED unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Carnival of Excess.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile-in or Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3". When doing so, it does not need to end that move closer to the closest enemy model, provided it ends that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit.

Carnival of Excess.name: DARK APPARITIONS
Carnival of Excess.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
Carnival of Excess.target: One DAEMONETTES unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Carnival of Excess.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves. If it arrives back on the battlefield in the Reinforcements step of your next Movement phase using the Deep Strike ability, it can be set up anywhere that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy units (instead of more than 9"), provided it is also set up wholly within 9" of one or more friendly EMPEROR’S CHILDREN units.

Carnival of Excess.name: ECSTATIC SLAUGHTER
Carnival of Excess.when: Fight phase, just after a LEGIONS OF EXCESS unit from your army destroys an enemy unit.
Carnival of Excess.target: That LEGIONS OF EXCESS unit and one friendly EMPEROR’S CHILDREN unit within 6" of it that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Carnival of Excess.effect: Your EMPEROR’S CHILDREN unit can declare a charge. If it does so and it has already been selected to fight this phase, it cannot fight again this phase.

Coterie of the Conceited.name: MARTIAL PERFECTION
Coterie of the Conceited.group: EMPEROR’S CHILDREN – Coterie of the Conceited
Coterie of the Conceited.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Coterie of the Conceited.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

Coterie of the Conceited.name: UNBOUND ARROGANCE
Coterie of the Conceited.group: EMPEROR’S CHILDREN – Coterie of the Conceited
Coterie of the Conceited.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an EMPEROR’S CHILDREN unit from your army destroys an enemy unit.
Coterie of the Conceited.effect: Increase your pledge to Slaanesh by 1.
Coterie of the Conceited.restrictions: You can only use this Stratagem once per battle round.

Coterie of the Conceited.name: UNSHAKEABLE OPPONENTS
Coterie of the Conceited.group: EMPEROR’S CHILDREN – Coterie of the Conceited
Coterie of the Conceited.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN unit from your army.
Coterie of the Conceited.effect: Until the end of the turn, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the following: that attack’s Ballistic Skill or Weapon Skill characteristic; the Hit roll; the Wound roll.

Coterie of the Conceited.name: PROTECTION OF THE DARK PRINCE
Coterie of the Conceited.group: EMPEROR’S CHILDREN – Coterie of the Conceited
Coterie of the Conceited.when: Any phase, just after a mortal wound or attack is allocated to a model in an EMPEROR’S CHILDREN unit from your army.
Coterie of the Conceited.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability, and the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against mortal wounds.

Coterie of the Conceited.name: EMBRACE THE PAIN
Coterie of the Conceited.group: EMPEROR’S CHILDREN – Coterie of the Conceited
Coterie of the Conceited.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN INFANTRY unit from your army.
Coterie of the Conceited.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy model within Engagement Range of your unit selects targets, it must select your unit as the target of its attacks.

Coterie of the Conceited.name: ARMOUR OF ABHORRENCE
Coterie of the Conceited.group: EMPEROR’S CHILDREN – Coterie of the Conceited
Coterie of the Conceited.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Coterie of the Conceited.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Coterie of the Conceited.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets a model in your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Mercurial Host.name: CAPRICIOUS REACTIONS
Mercurial Host.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Mercurial Host.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Mercurial Host.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

Mercurial Host.name: HONOUR THE PRINCE
Mercurial Host.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
Mercurial Host.effect: Until the end of the phase, if your unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.

Mercurial Host.name: COMBAT STIMMS
Mercurial Host.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Mercurial Host.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Mercurial Host.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

Mercurial Host.name: VIOLENT EXCESS
Mercurial Host.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Mercurial Host.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

Mercurial Host.name: CRUEL RAIDERS
Mercurial Host.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
Mercurial Host.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN unit from your army that is wholly within 9" of one or more battlefield edges and not within 3" horizontally of one or more enemy units.
Mercurial Host.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

Mercurial Host.name: DARK VIGOUR
Mercurial Host.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
Mercurial Host.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN unit from your army (excluding BEASTS and VEHICLES) that is within 9" of the enemy unit that just ended that move.
Mercurial Host.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".

Peerless Bladesmen.name: CRUEL BLADESMAN
Peerless Bladesmen.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN unit from your army that made a Charge move this turn and has not been selected to fight this phase.
Peerless Bladesmen.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1.

Peerless Bladesmen.name: INCESSANT VIOLENCE
Peerless Bladesmen.when: Fight phase, just before an EMPEROR’S CHILDREN unit from your army Consolidates.
Peerless Bladesmen.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3", provided your unit ends that Consolidation move within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

Peerless Bladesmen.name: DEFT PARRY
Peerless Bladesmen.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Peerless Bladesmen.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Peerless Bladesmen.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

Peerless Bladesmen.name: DEATH ECSTASY
Peerless Bladesmen.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Peerless Bladesmen.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Peerless Bladesmen.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

Peerless Bladesmen.name: CUT DOWN THE WEAK
Peerless Bladesmen.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit Falls Back.
Peerless Bladesmen.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN unit from your army (you can only select a VEHICLE if it is a WALKER) that is within 6" of that enemy unit and would be eligible to declare a charge against that enemy unit if it were your Charge phase.
Peerless Bladesmen.effect: Your unit can declare a charge. When doing so, you must select that enemy unit as a target of that charge, and your unit does not receive a Charge bonus this turn.

Peerless Bladesmen.name: TERRIFYING SPECTACLE
Peerless Bladesmen.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN unit from your army that made a Charge move in the previous turn and destroyed one or more enemy units in the previous Fight phase.
Peerless Bladesmen.effect: Each enemy unit within 6" of your unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from that test if they are Below Half-strength. Enemy units affected by this Stratagem do not need to take any other Battle-shock tests in the same phase.

Rapid Evisceration.name: DYNAMIC BREAKTHROUGH
Rapid Evisceration.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN VEHICLE unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
Rapid Evisceration.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a move, it can move through enemy models (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES). When doing so, it can move within Engagement Range of such models but cannot end that move within Engagement Range of them, and any Desperate Escape test is automatically passed.

Rapid Evisceration.name: ADVANCE AND CLAIM
Rapid Evisceration.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN TRANSPORT from your army that has one or more TORMENTORS units embarked within it (excluding Battle-shocked units).
Rapid Evisceration.effect: Select one objective marker you control that your TRANSPORT is within range of. That objective marker remains under your control until your opponent’s Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase.

Rapid Evisceration.name: OUTFLANKING STRIKE
Rapid Evisceration.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
Rapid Evisceration.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN TRANSPORT from your army, or up to two EMPEROR’S CHILDREN DEDICATED TRANSPORTS from your army.
Rapid Evisceration.effect: For each of those TRANSPORTS wholly within 9" of one or more battlefield edges, remove it from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

Rapid Evisceration.name: REACTIVE DISEMBARKATION
Rapid Evisceration.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Rapid Evisceration.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN TRANSPORT from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Rapid Evisceration.effect: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN unit embarked within your TRANSPORT can disembark. When doing so, models in that unit can be set up anywhere on the battlefield wholly within 6" of that TRANSPORT and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

Rapid Evisceration.name: CEASELESS ONSLAUGHT
Rapid Evisceration.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN unit from your army that disembarked from a TRANSPORT that made a Normal move this turn.
Rapid Evisceration.effect: Until the end of the phase, your EMPEROR’S CHILDREN unit is eligible to declare a charge.

Rapid Evisceration.name: ONTO THE NEXT
Rapid Evisceration.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN unit from your army that destroyed an enemy unit this phase, and one friendly TRANSPORT it is able to embark within.
Rapid Evisceration.effect: If your EMPEROR’S CHILDREN unit is wholly within 6" of that TRANSPORT, it can embark within it.

Slaanesh’s Chosen.name: REFUSAL TO BE OUTDONE
Slaanesh’s Chosen.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN CHARACTER unit from your army.
Slaanesh’s Chosen.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of one or more units from your army. Until the end of the phase, each time your unit declares a charge, if that enemy unit is one of the targets of that charge, add 2 to the Charge roll.

Slaanesh’s Chosen.name: HEIGHTENED JEALOUSY
Slaanesh’s Chosen.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an EMPEROR’S CHILDREN CHARACTER unit becomes your army’s Favoured Champions, or just after your army’s Favoured Champions unit destroys an enemy unit.
Slaanesh’s Chosen.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in an EMPEROR’S CHILDREN CHARACTER unit from your army that is not your army’s Favoured Champions makes an attack, add 1 to the Strength characteristic of that attack.

Slaanesh’s Chosen.name: DEVOTED DUELLISTS
Slaanesh’s Chosen.target: One or more EMPEROR’S CHILDREN CHARACTER units from your army that have not been selected to fight this phase.
Slaanesh’s Chosen.effect: Select one enemy unit. Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in those CHARACTER units have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability while targeting that enemy unit.

Slaanesh’s Chosen.name: DIABOLIC MAJESTY
Slaanesh’s Chosen.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an EMPEROR’S CHILDREN CHARACTER unit becomes your army’s Favoured Champions.
Slaanesh’s Chosen.effect: Each enemy unit within 6" of your unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result.
Slaanesh’s Chosen.restrictions: You can only use this Stratagem once per battle round.

Slaanesh’s Chosen.name: BEAUTIFUL DEATH
Slaanesh’s Chosen.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Slaanesh’s Chosen.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN CHARACTER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Slaanesh’s Chosen.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if your unit is your army’s Favoured Champions. On a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

Slaanesh’s Chosen.name: VENGEFUL SURGE
Slaanesh’s Chosen.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Slaanesh’s Chosen.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN CHARACTER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Slaanesh’s Chosen.effect: After the attacking unit has shot, your unit can make a Surge move. To do so, roll one D6: each model in your unit can move a distance in inches up to the result, but your unit must end that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit. When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit. If your unit is not your army’s Favoured Champions, you can re-roll the dice to determine the distance of its Surge move.

Hand of the Magus.name: Defend the Magus
Hand of the Magus.when: Start of your Shooting phase or start of the Fight phase.
Hand of the Magus.target: One Magus unit from your army and one enemy unit within Engagement Range of that Magus unit.
Hand of the Magus.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a Genestealer Cults model from your army makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and re-roll a Wound roll of 1.
Hand of the Magus.group: GENESTEALER CULTS – Hand of the Magus

Hand of the Magus.name: Lurking Killers
Hand of the Magus.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Hand of the Magus.target: One Genestealer Cults Infantry unit from your army (excluding Aberrant units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Hand of the Magus.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
Hand of the Magus.group: GENESTEALER CULTS – Hand of the Magus

Hand of the Magus.name: Return to the Shadows
Hand of the Magus.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
Hand of the Magus.target: One Genestealer Cults Infantry unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit.
Hand of the Magus.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6". If your unit has the Magus keyword, it can make a Normal move of up to 6" instead.
Hand of the Magus.group: GENESTEALER CULTS – Hand of the Magus

Biosanctic Broodsurge.name: STIMULATED BIO-SURGE
Biosanctic Broodsurge.target: One ABERRANTS, BIOPHAGUS or PURESTRAIN GENESTEALERS unit from your army that has not declared a charge this phase.
Biosanctic Broodsurge.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit declares a charge, if the closest eligible enemy unit is selected as one of the targets of that charge, add 1 to the Charge roll for each selected target of that charge (including the closest eligible enemy unit), to a maximum of +3.

Biosanctic Broodsurge.name: HYPER-METABOLIC VIGOUR
Biosanctic Broodsurge.target: One ABERRANTS, BIOPHAGUS or PURESTRAIN GENESTEALERS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Biosanctic Broodsurge.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile-in or Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3". In addition, it does not need to end that move closer to the closest enemy model, provided it ends it as close as possible to the closest enemy unit.

Biosanctic Broodsurge.name: GENE-TWISTED MUSCLE
Biosanctic Broodsurge.target: One ABERRANTS, BIOPHAGUS or PURESTRAIN GENESTEALERS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Biosanctic Broodsurge.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE, add 1 to the Wound roll.

Biosanctic Broodsurge.name: SAINTLY PAROXYSM
Biosanctic Broodsurge.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit destroys a GENESTEALER CULTS CHARACTER model from your army.
Biosanctic Broodsurge.target: That destroyed CHARACTER model. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.
Biosanctic Broodsurge.effect: Roll one D6: on a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. If that Character model is an ABOMINANT or PATRIARCH, that enemy unit suffers 2D3 mortal wounds instead.

Biosanctic Broodsurge.name: BIO-HORROR REVELATION
Biosanctic Broodsurge.when: Start of your opponent's Shooting phase.
Biosanctic Broodsurge.target: One ABERRANTS, BIOPHAGUS or PURESTRAIN GENESTEALERS unit from your army.
Biosanctic Broodsurge.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy unit within 9" of your unit is selected to shoot, it must take a Leadership test, subtracting 1 from the result. If that test is failed, until the end of the phase, each time a model in that enemy unit makes an attack that targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

Biosanctic Broodsurge.name: EVASIVE VANGUARD
Biosanctic Broodsurge.when: Any phase, just after an enemy unit ends a move within 9" of one or more of your Cult Ambush markers, before removing those markers from the battlefield.
Biosanctic Broodsurge.target: One PURESTRAIN GENESTEALERS unit from your army in Cult Ambush.
Biosanctic Broodsurge.effect: Select one of those Cult Ambush markers. You can move that Cult Ambush marker up to 6". If that marker is still within 9" of one or more enemy units, it is removed from the battlefield; otherwise, until the end of the battle, you can only select PURESTRAIN GENESTEALERS units from your army to be set up using that Cult Ambush marker.

Brood Brother Auxilia.name: SYMBIOTIC DESTRUCTION
Brood Brother Auxilia.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM and one GENESTEALER CULTS unit from your army that have not been selected to shoot this phase.
Brood Brother Auxilia.effect: Select one enemy unit that is visible to both of those selected units and within range of at least one ranged weapon from each of those units. Until the end of the phase, models in those units can only make attacks that target that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target). When doing so, each time such a model makes an attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1.

Brood Brother Auxilia.name: IN THE SHADOW OF IRON
Brood Brother Auxilia.when: Any phase, just after an enemy unit ends a move within 9” of one or more of your Cult Ambush markers.
Brood Brother Auxilia.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM VEHICLE unit from your army.
Brood Brother Auxilia.effect: Select one of those Cult Ambush markers. You can set up that Cult Ambush marker anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy units and wholly within 6" of your unit.

Brood Brother Auxilia.name: A DARK NETWORK
Brood Brother Auxilia.when: Reinforcements step of your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit is set up on the battlefield from Reserves.
Brood Brother Auxilia.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM or GENESTEALER CULTS unit from your army (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) within 12" of that enemy unit.
Brood Brother Auxilia.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".

Brood Brother Auxilia.name: REGIMENTAL REINFORCEMENTS
Brood Brother Auxilia.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY REGIMENT unit from your army (excluding ARTILLERY and CHARACTER units) is destroyed.
Brood Brother Auxilia.target: That INFANTRY unit. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
Brood Brother Auxilia.effect: Roll one D6: on a 3+, place one Cult Ambush marker anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy units (if this is not possible, no marker is placed) and add a new unit to your army identical to your destroyed unit, in Cult Ambush, at its Starting Strength, with all of its wounds remaining and any [ONE SHOT] weapons those models are equipped with considered as not having been shot.
Brood Brother Auxilia.restrictions: You can only use this Stratagem once per battle.

Brood Brother Auxilia.name: SUPPRESS AND OVERWHELM
Brood Brother Auxilia.when: Your Shooting phase, just after an ASTRA MILITARUM unit from your army has shot.
Brood Brother Auxilia.effect: Select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the turn, that enemy unit cannot be targeted with the Fire Overwatch Stratagem and each time a GENESTEALER CULTS unit from your army selects that enemy unit as a target of a charge, you can re-roll the Charge roll.

Brood Brother Auxilia.name: ACCEPTABLE LOSSES
Brood Brother Auxilia.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM unit from your army.
Brood Brother Auxilia.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of one or more GENESTEALER CULTS units from your army. Until the end of the phase, your unit can make ranged attacks that target that enemy unit. If it does, after it has resolved those attacks, roll one D6 for each of those GENESTEALER CULTS units: on a 5+, the unit being rolled for suffers D3+1 mortal wounds.

Cult Unveiled.name: LURKING MENACE
Cult Unveiled.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Cult Unveiled.target: One GENESTEALER CULTS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
Cult Unveiled.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, if the attacking model is not within 3", subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

Cult Unveiled.name: FOR THE BROOD
Cult Unveiled.target: One GENESTEALER CULTS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Cult Unveiled.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of one or more friendly GENESTEALER CULTS units. Until the end of the phase, your unit can make ranged attacks that target that enemy unit. If it does, after your unit has finished making those attacks, roll one D6 for each of those friendly units: on a 2-4, that friendly unit suffers 1 mortal wound; on a 5+, that friendly unit suffers 2 mortal wounds.

Cult Unveiled.name: PLANNED EXTRACTION
Cult Unveiled.target: One GENESTEALER CULTS unit from your army.
Cult Unveiled.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back.

Cult Unveiled.name: OUT OF HIDING
Cult Unveiled.when: Your Movement phase, at the start of the Reinforcements step.
Cult Unveiled.target: One NEOPHYTE HYBRIDS unit from your army that is in Reserves.
Cult Unveiled.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Deep Strike ability.
Cult Unveiled.restrictions: You can only use this Stratagem once.

Final Day.name: AVENGE THE STAR CHILDREN
Final Day.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has shot or fought.
Final Day.target: One TYRANIDS CHARACTER unit from your army that was destroyed by that enemy unit this phase. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
Final Day.effect: Until the end of the battle, each time a GENESTEALER CULTS model from your army makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, add 1 to the Hit roll and add 1 to the Wound roll.

Final Day.name: DIVINE IMPERATIVE
Final Day.target: One GENESTEALER CULTS unit from your army that has not declared a charge this phase.
Final Day.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of one or more TYRANIDS units from your army. Until the end of the phase, each time your GENESTEALER CULTS unit declares a charge, if that enemy unit is one of the targets of that charge, add 1 to Charge rolls made for your unit and you can re-roll the Charge roll.

Final Day.name: HYPERFEROCITY
Final Day.target: One GENESTEALER CULTS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Final Day.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets an enemy unit, re-roll a Wound roll of 1. If one or more friendly TYRANIDS units are within 6" of that enemy unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.

Final Day.name: RESISTANCE TUNNELS
Final Day.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
Final Day.target: One GENESTEALER CULTS or TYRANIDS unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Final Day.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

Final Day.name: PSI SURGE
Final Day.target: One TYRANIDS unit from your army.
Final Day.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, increase the range of your unit’s Catalyst ability by 3".
Final Day.restrictions: Each time you use this Stratagem, until the end of your next Command phase, you cannot use this Stratagem again.

Final Day.name: DARTING ATTACKS
Final Day.when: Your Shooting phase or your Charge phase.
Final Day.target: One TYRANIDS unit from your army.
Final Day.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

Genespawn Onslaught.name: GROWING DREAD
Genespawn Onslaught.when: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit is selected to perform a Tactical Manoeuvre.
Genespawn Onslaught.target: One GENESTEALER CULTS unit from your army that is within 9" of and visible to that enemy unit.
Genespawn Onslaught.effect: That enemy unit must take a Leadership test, subtracting 1 from the result: if failed, that enemy unit does not perform that Tactical Manoeuvre and it cannot perform anotherTactical Manoeuvre this turn (but can otherwise act normally).

Genespawn Onslaught.name: SOLDIERS OF THE STAR CHILDREN
Genespawn Onslaught.when: Your Shooting phase, just after a HYBRID METAMORPHS unit from your army is selected to perform the Set Overwatch Tactical Manoeuvre.
Genespawn Onslaught.effect: Select one objective marker you control that your unit is within range of. That objective marker is Secured by your army.

Genespawn Onslaught.name: MONSTROUS MOMENTUM
Genespawn Onslaught.when: Fight phase, just after a GENESTEALER CULTS unit from your army destroys an enemy unit.
Genespawn Onslaught.effect: If your unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, until the end of the phase, each time your unit Consolidates, models in your unit can end that move as close as possible to the nearest Hatchway instead of the nearest visible enemy unit. Your unit can then attempt to operate that Hatchway.

Genespawn Onslaught.name: UNSTOPPABLE BRUTES
Genespawn Onslaught.target: One ABOMINANT or ABERRANTS unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase and has not declared a charge this phase.
Genespawn Onslaught.effect: Until the end of the phase, when makinga Normal, Advance or Charge move, your unit can move through a single closed Hatchway as if it was open. When doing so, that Hatchway is opened and cannot be closed for the rest of the battle. This can allow that unit to declare a charge against enemy units that are not visible to it, but to do so those enemy units must be within 1" of that Hatchway and wholly on the opposite side of it from your unit.
Genespawn Onslaught.restrictions: You can only use this Stratagem once per turn.

Host of Ascension.name: PRIMED AND READIED
Host of Ascension.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Host of Ascension.target: One GENESTEALER CULTS units from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Host of Ascension.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, a Critical Hit is scored on an unmodified Hit roll of 5+, instead of only a 6.

Host of Ascension.name: COORDINATED TRAP
Host of Ascension.when: The start of your Shooting phase or the start of the Fight phase.
Host of Ascension.target: Two GENESTEALER CULTS units from your army that have not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Host of Ascension.effect: Select one enemy unit (if this Stratagem is used in the Fight phase, that enemy unit must be within Engagement Range of both of your units). Until the end of the phase, each time a model in either of your units makes an attack, it can only target that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target for that attack), and when resolving that attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

Host of Ascension.name: A DEADLY SNARE
Host of Ascension.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit declares a charge.
Host of Ascension.target: One GENESTEALER CULTS INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as a target of that charge.
Host of Ascension.effect: Roll one D6: on a 2-4, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 5+, that enemy unit suffers 3 mortal wounds.

Host of Ascension.name: RETURN TO THE SHADOWS
Host of Ascension.when: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
Host of Ascension.target: One GENESTEALER CULTS INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
Host of Ascension.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

Host of Ascension.name: LYING IN WAIT
Host of Ascension.target: One GENESTEALER CULTS BATTLELINE unit from your army in Cult Ambush.
Host of Ascension.effect: Until the end of the phase, when setting your unit up using a Cult Ambush marker, set your unit up anywhere on the battlefield wholly within 6" of that Cult Ambush marker and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

Host of Ascension.name: TUNNEL CRAWLERS
Host of Ascension.target: One GENESTEALER CULTS unit from your army that is arriving using the Deep Strike ability this phase.
Host of Ascension.effect: Your unit can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy units.
Host of Ascension.restrictions: A unit targeted by this Stratagem is not eligible to declare a charge in the same turn.

Infestation Swarm.name: HYPERADRENAL REFLEXES
Infestation Swarm.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Infestation Swarm.target: One GREAT DEVOURER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Infestation Swarm.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.

Infestation Swarm.name: OUTFLANK
Infestation Swarm.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
Infestation Swarm.target: One GENESTEALERS or PURESTRAIN GENESTEALERS unit from your army that is wholly within an Entry Zone.
Infestation Swarm.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves. It will arrive back on the battlefield in the Reinforcements step of your next Movement phase. When doing so, if it was within one of your Entry Zones when it was removed, it must be set up wholly within another one of your Entry Zones. If it was within one of your opponent’s Entry Zones when it was removed, it must be set up wholly within another one of your opponent’s Entry Zones instead. If this is not possible, your unit is destroyed.

Infestation Swarm.name: HUNTING GROUNDS
Infestation Swarm.when: Your Movement phase, just after a GREAT DEVOURER unit from your army opens a Hatchway.
Infestation Swarm.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 3", provided at least one of its models ends that move on the opposite side of that Hatchway from when your unit opened it.

Infestation Swarm.name: PERVASIVE DREAD
Infestation Swarm.when: Fight phase, just after the enemy WARLORD is destroyed (and is not returned to the battlefield) by a GREAT DEVOURER unit from your army.
Infestation Swarm.effect: In your opponent’s next Command phase, each enemy unit on the battlefield must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result. This Stratagem cannot cause a unit to take two Battle-shock tests in the same phase.

Outlander Claw.name: DEFT MANOEUVRING
Outlander Claw.when: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Outlander Claw.target: One ACHILLES RIDGERUNNERS or ATALAN JACKALS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Outlander Claw.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.

Outlander Claw.name: CLOSE-RANGE SHOOT-OUT
Outlander Claw.target: One GENESTEALER CULTS MOUNTED or GENESTEALER CULTS VEHICLE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Outlander Claw.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability while targeting an enemy unit within 18".

Outlander Claw.name: DEVOTED CREW
Outlander Claw.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Outlander Claw.target: One GOLIATH ROCKGRINDER or GOLIATH TRUCK unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Outlander Claw.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

Outlander Claw.name: RAPID FEINT
Outlander Claw.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
Outlander Claw.target: One ACHILLES RIDGERUNNERS or ATALAN JACKALS unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit.
Outlander Claw.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".

Outlander Claw.name: ALONG SHADOWED TRAILS
Outlander Claw.when: Any phase, just after an enemy unit ends a move within 9" of one or more of your Cult Ambush markers.
Outlander Claw.target: One ATALAN JACKALS unit from your army in Cult Ambush.
Outlander Claw.effect: Select one of those Cult Ambush markers. You can set up that Cult Ambush marker anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9” horizontally away from all enemy units and wholly within 6" of one or more battlefield edges. Until the end of the battle, you can only select ATALAN JACKALS units from your army to set up using that Cult Ambush marker.

Outlander Claw.name: ENCIRCLING THE PREY
Outlander Claw.when: End of your opponent's Fight phase.
Outlander Claw.target: One GENESTEALER CULTS MOUNTED or GENESTEALER CULTS VEHICLE unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and is wholly within 9" of one or more battlefield edges.
Outlander Claw.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

Xenocreed Congregation.name: FRENZIED DEVOTION
Xenocreed Congregation.target: One ACOLYTE HYBRIDS, HYBRID METAMORPHS or NEOPHYTE HYBRIDS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Xenocreed Congregation.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Attacks and Weapon Skill characteristics of melee weapons equipped by models (excluding CHARACTERS) in your unit by 1 and those weapons have the [HAZARDOUS] ability.

Xenocreed Congregation.name: VENGEANCE FOR THE MARTYR!
Xenocreed Congregation.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit destroys a GENESTEALER CULTS CHARACTER model from your army.
Xenocreed Congregation.target: One other GENESTEALER CULTS CHARACTER model from your army.
Xenocreed Congregation.effect: Until the end of the battle, each time a friendly ACOLYTE HYBRIDS, Hybrid Metamorphs or Neophyte Hybrids model makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. If the destroyed model was a MAGUS, PRIMUS or ACOLYTE ICONWARD, you can re-roll the Hit roll instead.

Xenocreed Congregation.name: THE PATH OF ANGUISH
Xenocreed Congregation.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
Xenocreed Congregation.target: One ACOLYTE HYBRIDS or NEOPHYTE HYBRIDS unit from your army that had one or more of its models destroyed as a result of the attacking unit's attacks.
Xenocreed Congregation.effect: Your unit can make a move of up to D6", but it unit must end that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit (excluding AIRCRAFT), When doing so, models in your unit can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.

Xenocreed Congregation.name: THE DOWNTRODDEN RISE
Xenocreed Congregation.when: End of the Reinforcements step of your opponent’s Movement phase, if you have no Cult Ambush markers on the battlefield.
Xenocreed Congregation.target: One ACOLYTE HYBRIDS, HYBRID METAMORPHS or NEOPHYTE HYBRIDS unit from your army in Cult Ambush.
Xenocreed Congregation.effect: This phase, you can set up your unit on the battlefield without using a Cult Ambush marker. When doing so, set up your unit anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy units, not within your opponent’s deployment zone, and wholly within 9" of one or more battlefield edges.

Xenocreed Congregation.name: TRANSCENDENT CELERITY
Xenocreed Congregation.target: One ACOLYTE HYBRIDS, HYBRID METAMORPHS or NEOPHYTE HYBRIDS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Xenocreed Congregation.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [ASSAULT] ability.

Xenocreed Congregation.name: TIRELESS FERVOUR
Xenocreed Congregation.target: One ACOLYTE HYBRIDS, HYBRID METAMORPHS or NEOPHYTE HYBRIDS unit from your army that has not declared a charge this phase.
Xenocreed Congregation.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back. When doing so, if it targets an enemy unit within Engagement Range of one or more friendly CHARACTER units, you can re-roll the Charge roll.

Aurellios’ Banishers.name: Warded Plate
Aurellios’ Banishers.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, after an enemy unit selects its targets.
Aurellios’ Banishers.target: One Grey Knights unit from your army.
Aurellios’ Banishers.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack with a Strength characteristic that exceeds your unit’s Toughness characteristic targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

Aurellios’ Banishers.name: Unyielding to the Last
Aurellios’ Banishers.when: Fight phase, when a Grey Knights unit from your army is selected to fight.
Aurellios’ Banishers.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, roll one D6: on a 4+, that model can fight after its destruction.

Aurellios’ Banishers.name: Emergency Teleport
Aurellios’ Banishers.when: Your opponent’s Fight phase, after an enemy unit ends a Consolidation move within Engagement Range of a Grey Knights unit from your army with the Teleport Strike ability.
Aurellios’ Banishers.effect: Your unit can use its Teleport Assault ability as if it were your Movement phase: remove it from the battlefield and then, in your next Movement phase, set it up again anywhere on the battlefield more than nine inches from all enemy models. Your unit cannot declare a charge in the turn it returns to the battlefield.

Augurium Task Force.name: AGGRESSIVE ANTICIPATION
Augurium Task Force.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Augurium Task Force.target: One GREY KNIGHTS PSYKER unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Augurium Task Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to that attack’s Weapon Skill or Ballistic Skill characteristics and/or any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

Augurium Task Force.name: APPOINTED HOUR
Augurium Task Force.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Augurium Task Force.target: One GREY KNIGHTS PSYKER unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Augurium Task Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

Augurium Task Force.name: FOREWARNED EVASION
Augurium Task Force.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Augurium Task Force.target: One GREY KNIGHTS WALKER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Augurium Task Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

Augurium Task Force.name: NECESSARY END
Augurium Task Force.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Augurium Task Force.target: One GREY KNIGHTS INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Augurium Task Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6. If the result is greater than the current battle round number, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

Augurium Task Force.name: REDIRECTED STRIKE
Augurium Task Force.target: One GREY KNIGHTS PSYKER unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Augurium Task Force.effect: If your unit has the Deep Strike ability, it can be placed into Strategic Reserves. Designer’s Note: This Stratagem lets players utilise abilities that retain control of objective markers and react to their missions and objectives with this unit.

Augurium Task Force.name: MIRAGE OF ECHOES
Augurium Task Force.when: The Reinforcements step of your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit is set up.
Augurium Task Force.target: One GREY KNIGHTS PSYKER unit from your army that is within 12" of that enemy unit and is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Augurium Task Force.effect: If your unit has the Deep Strike ability, it can be placed into Strategic Reserves.

Baneslayer Strike.name: ARMOURED AEGIS
Baneslayer Strike.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Baneslayer Strike.target: One GREY KNIGHTS CHARACTER model from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Baneslayer Strike.effect: Until the end of the phase, your model has the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

Baneslayer Strike.name: SANCTIC CIRCLE
Baneslayer Strike.target: One GREY KNIGHTS CHARACTER or PALADIN SQUAD unit from your army.
Baneslayer Strike.effect: Select one objective marker within 9” of and visible to your unit. If that objective marker does not have any enemy models within range of it (excluding Battle-shocked models), your unit must take a Leadership test, subtracting 1 from the result if that objective marker is Secured by your opponent’s army. If that test is passed, that objective marker is no longer considered Secured by your opponent’s army and is Secured by your army.

Baneslayer Strike.name: RELENTLESS BOARDERS
Baneslayer Strike.target: One GREY KNIGHTS unit from your army that has not been selected to charge this phase.
Baneslayer Strike.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

Baneslayer Strike.name: PSYBOLT AMMUNITION
Baneslayer Strike.target: One GREY KNIGHTS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Baneslayer Strike.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of storm bolters equipped by models in your unit by 1.

Banishers.name: HEXWROUGHT REPRISAL
Banishers.target: One GREY KNIGHTS PSYKER unit from your army that is on the battlefield and suffered one or more mortal wounds this phase.
Banishers.effect: Select one enemy unit which inflicted one or more mortal wounds on your unit this phase, then roll a number of dice equal to the number of mortal wounds your unit suffered this phase: for each 2+, that enemy unit suffers one mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds). These mortal wounds are Psychic Attacks.

Banishers.name: WARDING CHANT
Banishers.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Banishers.target: One GREY KNIGHTS PSYKER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Banishers.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against attacks with an unmodified Damage characteristic of 1.

Banishers.name: CIRCLE OF SANCTUARY
Banishers.when: Start of your opponent’s Movement phase.
Banishers.target: One GREY KNIGHTS CHARACTER model from your army.
Banishers.effect: Until the end of the phase, enemy units that are set up on the battlefield as Reinforcements cannot be set up within 12" horizontally of your model.

Banishers.name: SHADOW OF ANARCH
Banishers.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
Banishers.target: One GREY KNIGHTS PSYKER unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit and is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Banishers.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6" or, if it has the Deep Strike ability, it can be placed into Strategic Reserves.

Banishers.name: CHAOS BANE
Banishers.target: One GREY KNIGHTS PSYKER unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Banishers.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [ANTI-CHAOS 4+] ability.

Banishers.name: CELERITY
Banishers.target: One GREY KNIGHTS PSYKER INFANTRY unit from your army.
Banishers.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

Brotherhood Strike.name: PURGATION PATTERN
Brotherhood Strike.target: One GREY KNIGHTS unit from your army that was set up using the Deep Strike ability this turn and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Brotherhood Strike.effect: Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

Brotherhood Strike.name: SHINING VEIL
Brotherhood Strike.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Brotherhood Strike.target: One GREY KNIGHTS unit that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Brotherhood Strike.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit has the Stealth ability.

Brotherhood Strike.name: COMBAT MANIFESTATION
Brotherhood Strike.target: One GREY KNIGHTS unit from your army that is arriving using the Deep Strike ability this phase.
Brotherhood Strike.effect: Set your unit up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy units, but until the end of the turn, it is not eligible to declare a charge.

Brotherhood Strike.name: EXPEDITIOUS EXIT
Brotherhood Strike.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
Brotherhood Strike.target: One GREY KNIGHTS PSYKER INFANTRY unit from your army.
Brotherhood Strike.effect: If every model in your unit has the Deep Strike ability, remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves. Designer’s Note: This Stratagem allows you to remove a unit in addition to those removed using the Gate of Infinity rule, and it allows you to remove a unit within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

Brotherhood Strike.name: TRUESILVER CHANNELLING
Brotherhood Strike.target: One GREY KNIGHTS INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Brotherhood Strike.effect: Until the end of the phase, Psychic weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

Brotherhood Strike.name: DUTY UNENDING
Brotherhood Strike.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit within Engagement Range of one or more GREY KNIGHTS units from your army Falls Back.
Brotherhood Strike.target: One of those GREY KNIGHTS units that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Brotherhood Strike.effect: If your unit has the Deep Strike ability, it can be placed into Strategic Reserves.

Hallowed Conclave.name: GIANTS OF THE BATTLEFIELD
Hallowed Conclave.target: One GREY KNIGHTS TERMINATOR unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Hallowed Conclave.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit.

Hallowed Conclave.name: GRIND THEM UNDERFOOT
Hallowed Conclave.when: Your Charge phase, just after a GREY KNIGHTS TERMINATOR unit from your army ends a Charge move.
Hallowed Conclave.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit, then roll one D6 for each model in your unit that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).

Hallowed Conclave.name: POINT-BLANK PURGATION
Hallowed Conclave.target: One GREY KNIGHTS INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Hallowed Conclave.effect: Until the end of the phase, storm bolter weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PISTOL] and [TWIN-LINKED] abilities.

Hallowed Conclave.name: UNENDING FIDELITY
Hallowed Conclave.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Hallowed Conclave.target: One GREY KNIGHTS INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Hallowed Conclave.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not shot or fought this phase, roll one D6. On a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can shoot or fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

Hallowed Conclave.name: PRECOGNITIVE STRATEGIES
Hallowed Conclave.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
Hallowed Conclave.target: One GREY KNIGHTS INFANTRY unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Hallowed Conclave.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6".

Hallowed Conclave.name: SHINING RESOLVE
Hallowed Conclave.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Hallowed Conclave.target: One GREY KNIGHTS INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Hallowed Conclave.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

Sanctic Spearhead.name: ABOMINUS-CLASS TARGETS
Sanctic Spearhead.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Sanctic Spearhead.target: One GREY KNIGHTS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Sanctic Spearhead.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, add 1 to the Wound roll.

Sanctic Spearhead.name: TRUESILVER WILL
Sanctic Spearhead.when: Any phase, just after a GREY KNIGHTS PSYKER VEHICLE unit from your army suffers a mortal wound.
Sanctic Spearhead.target: That GREY KNIGHTS PSYKER VEHICLE unit.
Sanctic Spearhead.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against mortal wounds.

Sanctic Spearhead.name: ARMOURED AEGIS
Sanctic Spearhead.target: One GREY KNIGHTS PSYKER VEHICLE unit from your army.
Sanctic Spearhead.effect: One model in your unit regains up to 3 lost wounds.

Sanctic Spearhead.name: REDOUBLED ASSAULT
Sanctic Spearhead.when: Your Movement phase, just after a GREY KNIGHTS VEHICLE unit from your army Falls Back.
Sanctic Spearhead.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

Sanctic Spearhead.name: FORCE WAVE
Sanctic Spearhead.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
Sanctic Spearhead.target: One GREY KNIGHTS VEHICLE unit from your army that has not been selected to move or charge this phase.
Sanctic Spearhead.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes a Normal, Advance or Charge move, it can move horizontally through terrain features.

Sanctic Spearhead.name: ARGENT WRATH
Sanctic Spearhead.when: Your Charge phase, just after a GREY KNIGHTS VEHICLE unit from your army ends a Charge move.
Sanctic Spearhead.effect: Each enemy unit within 3" of your unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from that test.

Void Purge Force.name: HEXBANE WARDS
Void Purge Force.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Void Purge Force.target: One GREY KNIGHTS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Void Purge Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in that enemy unit have the [HAZARDOUS] ability.

Void Purge Force.name: SANCTIFIED SLAUGHTER
Void Purge Force.target: One GREY KNIGHTS unit from your army that charged this turn.
Void Purge Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. If such a weapon already has that ability, until the end of the phase, each time an attack is made with that weapon, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

Void Purge Force.name: BREACH-SHOCK
Void Purge Force.target: One GREY KNIGHTS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Void Purge Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile-in or Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3".

Void Purge Force.name: TRANSLOCATION
Void Purge Force.target: One INTERCEPTOR SQUAD or GREY KNIGHTS CHARACTER unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
Void Purge Force.effect: The next time your unit is selected to move this phase, models in that unit can move through Walls and closed Hatchways as if they were not there, but when doing so, no model can move more than 6".
Void Purge Force.restrictions: You can only use this Stratagem once.

Warpbane Task Force.name: AEGIS ETERNAL
Warpbane Task Force.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Warpbane Task Force.target: One GREY KNIGHTS INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Warpbane Task Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit that are wholly within your Hallowed Ground have a 4+ invulnerable save.

Warpbane Task Force.name: REPELLING SPHERE
Warpbane Task Force.when: Start of your opponent’s Charge phase.
Warpbane Task Force.target: One GREY KNIGHTS INFANTRY unit from your army.
Warpbane Task Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy unit declares a charge and your unit is one of the targets of that charge, subtract 1 from the Charge roll, or subtract 2 instead if your unit is wholly within your army’s Hallowed Ground.

Warpbane Task Force.name: FIRES OF COVENANT
Warpbane Task Force.when: Start of your opponent’s Movement phase.
Warpbane Task Force.target: One GREY KNIGHTS INFANTRY unit from your army.
Warpbane Task Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy unit is set up or ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move within 6" of your unit, roll one D6, adding 2 to the result if your unit is wholly within your army’s Hallowed Ground: on a 4+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

Warpbane Task Force.name: HALLOWED BEACON
Warpbane Task Force.when: Reinforcements step of your Movement phase.
Warpbane Task Force.target: One GREY KNIGHTS INFANTRY unit (excluding TERMINATOR units) that is arriving using the Deep Strike or Teleport Assault abilities this phase.
Warpbane Task Force.effect: Set up your unit wholly within your army’s Hallowed Ground and more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy units.

Warpbane Task Force.name: SANCTIFIED KILL ZONE
Warpbane Task Force.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Warpbane Task Force.target: One GREY KNIGHTS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase and that is wholly within your army’s Hallowed Ground.
Warpbane Task Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1, or, re-roll the Wound roll instead if your unit is a PURIFIER SQUAD.

Warpbane Task Force.name: FLAMES OF SANCTITY
Warpbane Task Force.target: One PURIFIER SQUAD unit from your army that was eligible to fight this phase.
Warpbane Task Force.effect: Roll one D6 for each enemy unit within 6" of your unit, adding 1 to the result if your unit includes CASTELLAN CROWE: on a 4+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

Warspeke’s Prospect.name: Payment in Kind
Warspeke’s Prospect.target: One Leagues of Votann unit from your army that was just destroyed by an attack made by an enemy model. You can use this Stratagem on that Leagues of Votann unit even though it was just destroyed.
Warspeke’s Prospect.effect: Until the end of the battle, each time a Leagues of Votann model from your army makes an attack that targets that enemy model’s unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

Warspeke’s Prospect.name: Pan-spectral Sweep
Warspeke’s Prospect.target: One Leagues of Votann unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Warspeke’s Prospect.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

Warspeke’s Prospect.name: Skeinwrought Physiology
Warspeke’s Prospect.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Warspeke’s Prospect.target: One Leagues of Votann unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Warspeke’s Prospect.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Save characteristic of models in your unit by 1.

Hearthband.name: FURY OF THE HEARTH
Hearthband.target: One EINHYR HEARTHGUARD unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Hearthband.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons (excluding Blast weapons) equipped by models in your unit have the [RAPID FIRE 1] ability.

Hearthband.name: SUPERIOR CRAFTSMANSHIP
Hearthband.target: One LEAGUES OF VOTANN unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Hearthband.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of that attack.

Hearthband.name: BRËKKEKNOTS
Hearthband.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Hearthband.target: One KÂHL, ÛTHAR THE DESTINED or EINHYR HEARTHGUARD unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Hearthband.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.

Hearthband.name: MATERIALISATION MATRICES
Hearthband.when: The Reinforcements step of your Movement phase.
Hearthband.target: One LEAGUES OF VOTANN unit from your army that is in Reserves and has the Deep Strike ability.
Hearthband.effect: Until the end of the phase, when your unit is set up on the battlefield using the Deep Strike ability, it can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy units.
Hearthband.restrictions: Until the end of the turn, your unit is not eligible to declare a charge.

Hearthband.name: UNYIELDING AGGRESSION
Hearthband.when: Your Movement phase, just after a LEAGUES OF VOTANN INFANTRY unit from your army Falls Back.
Hearthband.target: That LEAGUES OF VOTANN INFANTRY unit.
Hearthband.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

Hearthband.name: SURE OF PURPOSE
Hearthband.target: One LEAGUES OF VOTANN unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Hearthband.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile-in or Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3".

Hearthfire Strike.name: WEAVEFIELD FLARE
Hearthfire Strike.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Hearthfire Strike.target: One LEAGUES OF VOTANN unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Hearthfire Strike.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

Hearthfire Strike.name: ECONOMY OF AGGRESSION
Hearthfire Strike.target: One EINHYR HEARTHGUARD unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Hearthfire Strike.effect: Select one enemy unit that is visible to your unit and wholly on the opposite side of a Hatchway from it. Until the end of the phase, exo-armour grenade launchers equipped by models in your unit have an Attacks characteristic of 6 and lose the [BLAST] ability while targeting that enemy unit, and attacks made with such weapons that target that enemy unit can be allocated to models that are not visible to the attacking model.

Hearthfire Strike.name: GRAVITRONIC PULSE
Hearthfire Strike.when: Your Charge phase, just after a LEAGUES OF VOTANN unit from your army ends a Charge move.
Hearthfire Strike.effect: For each enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit, until the end of the turn, that unit loses the Fights First ability (if it has it) and, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

Hearthfire Strike.name: PAN-SPECTRAL VISUALISER
Hearthfire Strike.target: One LEAGUES OF VOTANN unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Hearthfire Strike.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability and each time a model in your unit makes an attack with a weapon, you can ignore any or all modifiers to that attack’s or that weapon’s Ballistic Skill characteristic and any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

Oathband.name: WARRIOR PRIDE
Oathband.target: One LEAGUES OF VOTANN unit from your army, and one enemy unit that has one or more Judgement tokens and is within Engagement Range of that LEAGUES OF VOTANN unit.
Oathband.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a melee attack that targets that enemy unit, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1 for each Judgement token that enemy unit has.

Oathband.name: REACTIVE REPRISAL
Oathband.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit that has one or more Judgement tokens has resolved its attacks.
Oathband.target: One LEAGUES OF VOTANN unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Oathband.effect: Your LEAGUES OF VOTANN unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but it must target the enemy unit that just attacked it, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

Oathband.name: ANCESTRAL SENTENCE
Oathband.target: One LEAGUES OF VOTANN unit from your army.
Oathband.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack, that attack has the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability, and each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets a unit that has one or more Judgement tokens, that attack has the [SUSTAINED HITS 2] ability instead.

Oathband.name: ORDERED RETREAT
Oathband.when: Your Movement phase, just after a LEAGUES OF VOTANN unit from your army Falls Back.
Oathband.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge.

Oathband.name: NEWFOUND NEMESIS
Oathband.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has resolved its attacks.
Oathband.target: One LEAGUES OF VOTANN INFANTRY or LEAGUES OF VOTANN MOUNTED unit from your army that was reduced to Below Half-strength as a result of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Oathband.effect: The attacking unit gains 1 Judgement token, or up to 2 Judgement tokens instead if that LEAGUES OF VOTANN unit contained your WARLORD when it was targeted by those attacks.

Oathband.name: VOID ARMOUR
Oathband.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Oathband.target: One LEAGUES OF VOTANN unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Oathband.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your LEAGUES OF VOTANN unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Void Salvagers.name: POINT-BLANK FIRE
Void Salvagers.target: One HEARTHKYN WARRIORS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Void Salvagers.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PISTOL] ability.

Void Salvagers.name: CORRIDOR COVERED
Void Salvagers.when: Your opponent's Movement or Charge phase.
Void Salvagers.target: One LEAGUES OF VOTANN unit from your army that has not fired Overwatch this phase.
Void Salvagers.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack while firing Overwatch, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ is required to score a hit, instead of an unmodified 6.

Void Salvagers.name: JUDGED AND PUNISHED
Void Salvagers.target: One LEAGUES OF VOTANN unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Void Salvagers.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, if the target has 1 or more Judgement tokens, you can re-roll the Hit roll, and if the target has 2 Judgement tokens, you can re-roll the Wound roll as well.

Void Salvagers.name: RELIC CYPHER
Void Salvagers.target: One LEAGUES OF VOTANN unit from your army.
Void Salvagers.effect: Select one closed Hatchway on the battlefield and open it.
Void Salvagers.restrictions: You can only use this Stratagem once.

Amonhotekh’s Guard.name: Mercurial Resilience
Amonhotekh’s Guard.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Amonhotekh’s Guard.target: One Necrons unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Amonhotekh’s Guard.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a 5+ invulnerable save. In addition, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

Amonhotekh’s Guard.name: Disruption Fields
Amonhotekh’s Guard.target: One Necrons unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Amonhotekh’s Guard.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Strength characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit. In addition, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1.

Amonhotekh’s Guard.name: Will of the Overlord
Amonhotekh’s Guard.target: One Overlord model from your army.
Amonhotekh’s Guard.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of each model in your unit. While a friendly Necrons unit is within 6" of your unit, you can re-roll Hit rolls of 1 when resolving attacks made by models in that unit.
Amonhotekh’s Guard.restrictions: You can only use this Stratagem if an Overlord model from your army is on the battlefield.

Annihilation Legion.name: INSANITY’S IRE
Annihilation Legion.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
Annihilation Legion.target: One DESTROYER CULT or FLAYED ONES unit from your army that had one or more of its models destroyed by the attacking unit’s attacks.
Annihilation Legion.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move, but must end that move as close as possible to that enemy unit.

Annihilation Legion.name: MASKS OF DEATH
Annihilation Legion.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Annihilation Legion.target: One DESTROYER CULT or FLAYED ONES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Annihilation Legion.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

Annihilation Legion.name: THE SPOOR OF FRAILTY
Annihilation Legion.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Annihilation Legion.target: One DESTROYER CULT or FLAYED ONES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Annihilation Legion.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model from your unit makes an attack that targets a unit below Starting Strength, add 1 to the Hit roll. If the target is Below Half-strength, add 1 to the Wound roll as well.

Annihilation Legion.name: MURDEROUS REANIMATION
Annihilation Legion.target: One DESTROYER CULT or FLAYED ONES unit from your army that has just destroyed an enemy unit, or just caused an enemy unit that was not Below Half-strength to become Below Half-strength.

Annihilation Legion.name: PITILESS HUNTERS
Annihilation Legion.target: One DESTROYER CULT or FLAYED ONES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Annihilation Legion.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile-in or Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3".

Annihilation Legion.name: BLOOD-FUELLED CRUELTY
Annihilation Legion.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Fall Back move.
Annihilation Legion.target: One DESTROYER CULT or FLAYED ONES unit from your army that started the phase within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
Annihilation Legion.effect: Roll one D6: on a 2-5, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that enemy unit suffers 3 mortal wounds. Your unit can then make a Normal move, but must end that move as close as possible to that enemy unit.

Awakened Dynasty.name: PROTOCOL OF THE CONQUERING TYRANT
Awakened Dynasty.target: One NECRONS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Awakened Dynasty.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit within half range, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. If a NECRONS CHARACTER is leading your unit, until the end of the phase, you can re-roll the Hit roll for that attack instead.

Awakened Dynasty.name: PROTOCOL OF THE HUNGRY VOID
Awakened Dynasty.target: One NECRONS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Awakened Dynasty.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Strength characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit. In addition, If a NECRONS CHARACTER is leading your unit, until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1. (this is not cumulative with any other modifiers that improve Armour Penetration].

Awakened Dynasty.name: PROTOCOL OF THE ETERNAL REVENANT
Awakened Dynasty.target: One NECRONS INFANTRY CHARACTER model from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.
Awakened Dynasty.effect: At the end of the phase, set your model back up on the battlefield as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with half of its starting number of wounds remaining.
Awakened Dynasty.restrictions: Each model can only be targeted with this Stratagem once per battle.

Awakened Dynasty.name: PROTOCOL OF THE VENGEFUL STARS
Awakened Dynasty.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit destroys a NECRONS unit from your army.
Awakened Dynasty.target: One NECRONS CHARACTER unit from your army that was within 6" of that NECRONS unit when it was destroyed.
