Awakened Dynasty.effect: After the attacking unit has resolved its attacks, your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but it must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

Awakened Dynasty.name: PROTOCOL OF THE SUDDEN STORM
Awakened Dynasty.target: One NECRONS unit from your army.
Awakened Dynasty.effect: Until the end of the turn, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [ASSAULT] ability. In addition, if a NECRONS CHARACTER is leading your unit, until the end of the phase, you can re-roll Advance rolls made for your unit.

Awakened Dynasty.name: PROTOCOL OF THE UNDYING LEGIONS
Awakened Dynasty.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has resolved its attacks.
Awakened Dynasty.target: One NECRONS unit from your army that had one or more of its models destroyed as a result of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Awakened Dynasty.effect: Your unit activates its Reanimation Protocols and reanimates D3 wounds (or D3+1 wounds if a NECRONS CHARACTER is leading your unit].

Canoptek Court.name: CYNOSURE OF ERADICATION
Canoptek Court.when: The start of your Shooting phase or the start of the Fight phase.
Canoptek Court.target: One CRYPTEK or CANOPTEK unit from your army that is wholly within your army’s Power Matrix.
Canoptek Court.effect: Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by CRYPTEK or CANOPTEK models in your unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

Canoptek Court.name: CURSE OF THE CRYPTEK
Canoptek Court.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has shot or fought.
Canoptek Court.target: One CRYPTEK model from your army that was destroyed by one of the attacking unit’s attacks. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.
Canoptek Court.effect: Until the end of the battle, each time a friendly CANOPTEK model makes an attack that targets the attacking unit, add 1 to the Hit roll and add 1 to the Wound roll.

Canoptek Court.name: SOLAR PULSE
Canoptek Court.target: One CRYPTEK model from your army.
Canoptek Court.effect: Select one objective marker within 18" of your CRYPTEK model. Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by friendly NECRONS models have the [IGNORES COVER] ability while targeting units within range of that objective marker.

Canoptek Court.name: REACTIVE SUBROUTINES
Canoptek Court.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
Canoptek Court.target: One CANOPTEK unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit.
Canoptek Court.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".

Canoptek Court.name: SUBOPTIMAL FACADE
Canoptek Court.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit has declared a charge.
Canoptek Court.target: One CANOPTEK unit from your army that was selected as a target of that charge and is wholly within your army’s Power Matrix.

Canoptek Court.name: COUNTERTEMPORAL SHIFT
Canoptek Court.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Canoptek Court.target: One CANOPTEK unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Canoptek Court.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 18".

Canoptek Harvesters.name: TARGETING ALGORITHMS
Canoptek Harvesters.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Canoptek Harvesters.target: One CRYPTEK model from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Canoptek Harvesters.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your model makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

Canoptek Harvesters.name: PHASE-SHIFT
Canoptek Harvesters.target: One CANOPTEK WRAITHS unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
Canoptek Harvesters.effect: The next time your unit is selected to move this phase, models in that unit can move through Walls and closed Hatchways as if they were not there, but when doing so, no model can move more than 6".
Canoptek Harvesters.restrictions: You can only use this Stratagem once.

Canoptek Harvesters.name: NANOSCARAB VIRUS
Canoptek Harvesters.target: One CRYPTEK unit from your army.
Canoptek Harvesters.effect: For each open Hatchway within 3" of your unit, you can close that Hatchway.
Canoptek Harvesters.restrictions: You can only use this Stratagem once.

Canoptek Harvesters.name: QUANTUM FLARE-SHIELD
Canoptek Harvesters.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Canoptek Harvesters.target: One CRYPTEK model from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Canoptek Harvesters.effect: Until the end of the phase, your model has a 4+ invulnerable save.

Deranged Outcasts.name: BATHED IN BLOOD
Deranged Outcasts.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit is destroyed by a DESTROYER CULT unit from your army
Deranged Outcasts.effect: Select one objective marker that your unit or the destroyed unit was within range of at the start of the phase. That objective marker is Secured by your army.

Deranged Outcasts.name: SHADOW STALKERS
Deranged Outcasts.when: Your Movement phase, at the start of the Reinforcements step.
Deranged Outcasts.target: One FLAYED ONES unit from your army that is in Reserves.
Deranged Outcasts.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Deep Strike ability.
Deranged Outcasts.restrictions: You can only use this Stratagem once.

Deranged Outcasts.name: RUSH TO SLAUGHTER
Deranged Outcasts.target: One NECRONS unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
Deranged Outcasts.effect: Until the end of the phase, if your unit has the FLAYED ONES keyword, each time it moves, models in that unit can move through friendly DESTROYER CULT models as if they were not there. If your unit has the DESTROYER CULT keyword, models in it can move through friendly FLAYED ONES models as if they were not there.

Deranged Outcasts.name: TERRIFYING AMBUSH
Deranged Outcasts.when: Your Movement phase, just after a DESTROYER CULT unit from your army opens a Hatchway.
Deranged Outcasts.effect: For each enemy unit within 3" of that Hatchway, if that Hatchway is visible to that unit and that unit is wholly on the opposite side of it from your unit, that unit must take a Leadership test, subtracting 2 from the result: if failed, until the end of the phase, that enemy unit cannot fire Overwatch.

Hypercrypt Legion.name: DIMENSIONAL CORRIDOR
Hypercrypt Legion.target: One NECRONS unit from your army that was set up on the battlefield this turn using the Eternity Gate ability of a MONOLITH model that started the turn on the battlefield.
Hypercrypt Legion.effect: Your unit is eligible to charge this phase.

Hypercrypt Legion.name: HYPERPHASIC RECALL
Hypercrypt Legion.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has shot or fought.
Hypercrypt Legion.target: One NECRONS INFANTRY unit from your army that had one or more of its models destroyed as a result of the attacking unit’s attacks and one friendly MONOLITH model.
Hypercrypt Legion.effect: Remove your INFANTRY unit from the battlefield and then set it back up anywhere on the battlefield that is wholly within 6" of your MONOLITH model and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

Hypercrypt Legion.name: COSMIC PRECISION
Hypercrypt Legion.target: One NECRONS unit from your army (excluding MONSTER units) that is arriving using the Deep Strike or Hyperphasing abilities this phase.
Hypercrypt Legion.effect: Your unit can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy models.
Hypercrypt Legion.restrictions: A unit targeted with this Stratagem is not eligible to declare a charge in the same turn.

Hypercrypt Legion.name: REANIMATION CRYPTS
Hypercrypt Legion.effect: For each of your NECRONS units in Reserves, that Reserves unit’s Reanimation Protocols activate.

Hypercrypt Legion.name: ENTROPIC DAMPING
Hypercrypt Legion.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Hypercrypt Legion.target: One TITANIC model from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks and is within 18" of the attacking unit.
Hypercrypt Legion.effect: Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in the attacking unit have the [HAZARDOUS] ability.

Hypercrypt Legion.name: QUANTUM DEFLECTION
Hypercrypt Legion.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Hypercrypt Legion.target: One NECRONS VEHICLE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Hypercrypt Legion.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.

Obeisance Phalanx.name: SUFFER NO RIVAL
Obeisance Phalanx.target: One LYCHGUARD or TRIARCH unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Obeisance Phalanx.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PRECISION] ability.

Obeisance Phalanx.name: NANOASSEMBLY PROTOCOLS
Obeisance Phalanx.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Obeisance Phalanx.target: One NECRONS VEHICLE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Obeisance Phalanx.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to a model in your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

Obeisance Phalanx.name: ENSLAVED ARTIFICE
Obeisance Phalanx.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Obeisance Phalanx.target: One NECRONS unit from your army (excluding TITANIC units) that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Obeisance Phalanx.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

Obeisance Phalanx.name: YOUR TIME IS NIGH
Obeisance Phalanx.when: Any phase, just after your opponent’s WARLORD is destroyed.
Obeisance Phalanx.effect: Until the end of the battle, each time an enemy unit takes a Battle-shock or Leadership test, subtract 1 from the result.

Obeisance Phalanx.name: SENTINELS OF ETERNITY
Obeisance Phalanx.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Obeisance Phalanx.target: One LYCHGUARD or TRIARCH PRAETORIANS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Obeisance Phalanx.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model’s unit has finished making attacks, and is then removed from play.

Obeisance Phalanx.name: TERRITORIAL OBSESSION
Obeisance Phalanx.target: One LYCHGUARD or TRIARCH unit from your army.
Obeisance Phalanx.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in your unit. If your unit has the VEHICLE keyword, add 3 to the Objective Control characteristic instead.

Starshatter Arsenal.name: MERCILESS RECLAMATION
Starshatter Arsenal.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Starshatter Arsenal.target: One NECRONS unit (excluding TITANIC units) from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Starshatter Arsenal.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, if the target of that attack is within range of one or more objective markers, add 1 to the Wound roll.

Starshatter Arsenal.name: UNYIELDING FORMS
Starshatter Arsenal.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Starshatter Arsenal.target: One NECRONS VEHICLE or NECRONS MOUNTED unit (excluding TITANIC units) from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Starshatter Arsenal.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets a model in your unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of that unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

Starshatter Arsenal.name: REACTIVE REPOSITION
Starshatter Arsenal.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
Starshatter Arsenal.target: One NECRONS unit from your army (excluding TITANIC units) that was the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Starshatter Arsenal.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6".

Starshatter Arsenal.name: ENDLESS SERVITUDE
Starshatter Arsenal.target: One NECRONS unit (excluding TITANIC units) from your army that is within range of one or more objective markers you control.

Starshatter Arsenal.name: DIMENSIONAL TUNNEL
Starshatter Arsenal.target: One NECRONS VEHICLE or NECRONS MOUNTED unit (excluding TITANIC units) from your army.
Starshatter Arsenal.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit can move horizontally through models and terrain features.

Starshatter Arsenal.name: CHRONOSHIFT
Starshatter Arsenal.target: One NECRONS VEHICLE or NECRONS MOUNTED unit (excluding TITANIC units) from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
Starshatter Arsenal.effect: Until the end of the phase, if your unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.

Tomb Ship Complement.name: DISRUPTION FIELDS
Tomb Ship Complement.target: One NECRONS unit from your army.
Tomb Ship Complement.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Strength characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit.

Tomb Ship Complement.name: UNWAVERING DEFENCE
Tomb Ship Complement.target: One NECRONS unit from your army that is Set to Defend and has not fought this phase.
Tomb Ship Complement.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 2] ability.

Tomb Ship Complement.name: CONCENTRATED ATOMISATION
Tomb Ship Complement.target: One NECRON WARRIORS or IMMORTALS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Tomb Ship Complement.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

Tomb Ship Complement.name: DISINTEGRATION BEAMS
Tomb Ship Complement.when: Your Movement phase, just after an enemy unit attempts to prevent a NECRONS unit from you army from operating a closed Hatchway.
Tomb Ship Complement.effect: Roll one D6: on a 2-4, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound; on a 5+, that enemy unit suffers 2 mortal wounds.

Gordrang’s Gitstompas.name: Get Stuck In
Gordrang’s Gitstompas.target: One Orks unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Gordrang’s Gitstompas.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile-in or Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3".

Gordrang’s Gitstompas.name: Brutal But Kunnin’
Gordrang’s Gitstompas.target: One Orks Infantry unit from your army.
Gordrang’s Gitstompas.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

Gordrang’s Gitstompas.name: Krump da Gitz!
Gordrang’s Gitstompas.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has finished making its attacks.
Gordrang’s Gitstompas.target: One Orks unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Gordrang’s Gitstompas.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6", but must end that move as close as possible to that enemy unit.

Bully Boyz.name: HULKING BRUTES
Bully Boyz.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Bully Boyz.target: One NOBZ or MEGANOBZ unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Bully Boyz.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Bully Boyz.name: ARMED TO DATEEF
Bully Boyz.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Bully Boyz.target: One NOBZ or MEGANOBZ unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Bully Boyz.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. If a Waaagh! is active for your unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll instead.

Bully Boyz.name: CUT’EM DOWN
Bully Boyz.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit is selected to Fall Back.
Bully Boyz.target: One NOBZ or MEGANOBZ unit from your army within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
Bully Boyz.effect: When that enemy unit Falls Back, all models in that enemy unit must take a Desperate Escape test. When doing so, if a Waaagh! is active for your unit, subtract 1 from each of those tests.

Bully Boyz.name: CRUSHING IMPACT
Bully Boyz.when: Your Charge phase, just after a NOBZ or MEGANOBZ unit from your army ends a Charge move.
Bully Boyz.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit, then roll one D6 for each model in your unit that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit: for each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds). If a Waaagh! is active for your unit, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound for each 4+ instead.

Bully Boyz.name: ALWAYS LOOKIN’ FER A FIGHT
Bully Boyz.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit is destroyed.
Bully Boyz.target: One NOBZ or MEGANOBZ unit from your army that destroyed that enemy unit.
Bully Boyz.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes a Consolidation move, it can move up to D3+3" instead of up to 3". If a Waaagh! is active for your unit, it can move up to 6" instead.

Bully Boyz.name: TOO ARROGANT TO DIE
Bully Boyz.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Bully Boyz.target: One NOBZ or MEGANOBZ unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Bully Boyz.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not shot or fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 2 to the result if a Waaagh! is active for your unit. On a 5+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can shoot or fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

Da Big Hunt.name: STALKIN’ TAKTIKS
Da Big Hunt.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Da Big Hunt.target: One BEAST SNAGGA INFANTRY or BEAST SNAGGA MOUNTED unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Da Big Hunt.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a ranged attack targets your unit, models in your unit have the Benefit of Cover against that attack. In addition, if your unit has the INFANTRY keyword, until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Stealth ability.

Da Big Hunt.name: DRAG IT DOWN
Da Big Hunt.target: One BEAST SNAGGA unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Da Big Hunt.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. In addition, each time a model in your unit makes a melee attack that targets your Prey, a Critical Hit is scored on an unmodified Hit roll of 5+, instead of only a 6.

Da Big Hunt.name: WHERE D’YA FINK YOU’RE GOING?
Da Big Hunt.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Fall Back move.
Da Big Hunt.target: One BEAST SNAGGA INFANTRY or BEAST SNAGGA MOUNTED unit from your army that was within Engagement Range of that enemy unit at the start of the phase.
Da Big Hunt.effect: If your unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 6".

Da Big Hunt.name: UNSTOPPABLE MOMENTUM
Da Big Hunt.when: Your Charge phase, just after a BEAST SNAGGA MOUNTED unit from your army ends a Charge move.
Da Big Hunt.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit and roll one D6 for each model in your unit: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds). If that enemy unit is your Prey, roll three additional D6.

Da Big Hunt.name: DAT ONE’S EVEN BIGGA!
Da Big Hunt.target: One BEAST SNAGGA unit from your army.
Da Big Hunt.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to charge in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back. In addition, you can re-roll Charge rolls made for your unit, provided one of the targets of that charge is your Prey.

Da Big Hunt.name: INSTINCTIVE HUNTERS
Da Big Hunt.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
Da Big Hunt.target: One BEAST SNAGGA unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy unit.
Da Big Hunt.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

Dread Mob.name: EXTRA GUBBINZ
Dread Mob.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Dread Mob.target: One ORKS WALKER or GROTS VEHICLE unit from your army (excluding TITANIC units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Dread Mob.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to a model in your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

Dread Mob.name: KLANKIN’ KLAWS
Dread Mob.target: One ORKS WALKER unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Dread Mob.effect: Each time you use this Stratagem, you can choose to push it. Until the end of the phase, add 2 to the Strength characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit and, if you chose to push it, until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of those weapons and they have the [HAZARDOUS] ability as well.

Dread Mob.name: BIGGER SHELLS FOR BIGGER GITZ
Dread Mob.target: One MEK, ORKS WALKER or GROTS VEHICLE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Dread Mob.effect: Each time you use this Stratagem, you can choose to push it. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE, add 1 to the Wound roll. If you chose to push it, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of that attack and, until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [HAZARDOUS] ability as well.

Dread Mob.name: DAKKA! DAKKA! DAKKA!
Dread Mob.target: One ORKS WALKER or GROTS VEHICLE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Dread Mob.effect: Each time you use this Stratagem, you can choose to push it. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. If you chose to push it, you can re-roll the Hit roll instead and, until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [HAZARDOUS] ability as well.

Dread Mob.name: CONNIVING RUNTS
Dread Mob.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
Dread Mob.target: One GRETCHIN unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units.
Dread Mob.effect: Roll one D6: on a 4+, that enemy unit suffers D3+1 mortal wounds. Your unit can then make a Normal move.

Dread Mob.name: SUPERFUELLED BOILER
Dread Mob.when: Your Movement phase, just after an ORKS WALKER unit from your army has been selected to Advance.
Dread Mob.effect: Until the end of the turn, you can re-roll Advance rolls made for your unit and ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [ASSAULT] ability.

Green Tide.name: BULLDOZER BRUTALITY
Green Tide.target: One BOYZ unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase and is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Green Tide.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit is selected to fight, when determining which models in your unit are eligible to fight, any models in your unit that are within 3" of one or more enemy models are eligible to fight. When resolving those attacks, such models can target one of those enemy units that is within 3" of them and within Engagement Range of their unit.

Green Tide.name: COMPETITIVE STREAK
Green Tide.target: One BOYZ unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Green Tide.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1. If your unit contains 10 or more models, re-roll the Wound roll instead.

Green Tide.name: TIDE OF MUSCLE
Green Tide.target: One BOYZ unit from your army that has not declared a charge this phase.
Green Tide.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit declares a charge, add 1 to the Charge roll and, if your unit contains 10 or more models, you can re-roll the Charge roll.’

Green Tide.name: GO GET ’EM!
Green Tide.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Green Tide.target: One BOYZ unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Green Tide.effect: After the attacking unit has shot, your unit can make a Go Get ’Em! move. To do so, roll one D6: each model in your unit can move a distance in inches up to the result, but your unit must end that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit. When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit. If your unit contains 10 or more models, you can re-roll the D6 to determine how far your unit can move.

Green Tide.name: COME ON LADZ!
Green Tide.target: One BOYZ unit from your army.
Green Tide.effect: Return up to D3+2 destroyed models to your unit (excluding CHARACTER models).

Green Tide.name: BRAGGIN’ RIGHTS
Green Tide.target: Two BOYZ units from your army that are within 6" of each other.
Green Tide.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, while those two units are within 6" of each other, they both count as containing 10 or more models for the purposes of your Detachment rule, any Enhancements models from your army have and any Stratagems you use.

Kaptin Killers.name: CORNERED AND KRUMPED
Kaptin Killers.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit is selected to Fall Back.
Kaptin Killers.target: One ORKS unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
Kaptin Killers.effect: Your unit can fight as if it were the Fight phase, but when doing so, models in your unit can only target that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target) and each time a model in your unit makes an attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 6 is required to score a hit.

Kaptin Killers.name: PIT FIGHTER
Kaptin Killers.target: One WARBOSS model from your army.
Kaptin Killers.effect: Until the end of the phase, your model is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

Kaptin Killers.name: PILE THROUGH
Kaptin Killers.when: Your Movement phase, just after an ORKS unit from your army opens a Hatchway.
Kaptin Killers.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit has the Fights First ability.

Kaptin Killers.name: LOOT ON THE MOVE
Kaptin Killers.when: Your Movement phase, just after an ORKS unit from your army opens a Hatchway.
Kaptin Killers.effect: Until the end of the battle, that Hatchway cannot be closed. Until the end of the turn, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Kult of Speed.name: FULL THROTTLE!
Kult of Speed.when: Your Charge phase, just after a SPEED FREEKS unit from your army ends a Charge move.
Kult of Speed.effect: Until the end of the turn, each time a model in your unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

Kult of Speed.name: BLITZA FIRE
Kult of Speed.target: One SPEED FREEKS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Kult of Speed.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability and, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit within 9", a Critical Hit is scored on an unmodified Hit roll of 5+, instead of only a 6.
Kult of Speed.restrictions: A unit cannot be targeted by this and the Dakkastorm Stratagem in the same phase.

Kult of Speed.name: DAKKASTORM
Kult of Speed.target: One SPEED FREEKS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Kult of Speed.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. While targeting a unit within 9", they have the [SUSTAINED HITS 2] ability instead.
Kult of Speed.restrictions: A unit cannot be targeted by this and the Blitza Fire Stratagem in the same phase.

Kult of Speed.name: MORE GITZ OVER ’ERE!
Kult of Speed.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
Kult of Speed.target: One SPEED FREEKS unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit and is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Kult of Speed.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".

Kult of Speed.name: SQUIG FLINGIN’
Kult of Speed.when: Your Movement phase, just after a SPEED FREEKS or TRUKK unit from your army ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
Kult of Speed.target: That SPEED FREEKS or TRUKK unit.
Kult of Speed.effect: Select one enemy unit within 9" of your unit. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test and, when doing so, subtract 1 from the result.

Kult of Speed.name: SPEEDIEST FREEKS
Kult of Speed.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Kult of Speed.target: One SPEED FREEKS or TRUKK unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Kult of Speed.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a 5+ invulnerable save. If your unit is a VEHICLE unit with an unmodified Toughness characteristic of 8 or less, until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a 4+ invulnerable save instead.

More Dakka!.name: LONG, UNCONTROLLED BURSTS
More Dakka!.target: One ORKS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
More Dakka!.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability.

More Dakka!.name: ORKS IS STILL ORKS
More Dakka!.target: One ORKS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
More Dakka!.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets an enemy unit, re-roll a Wound roll of 1. If that enemy unit is within range of an objective marker, you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.

More Dakka!.name: HUGE SHOW-OFFS
More Dakka!.target: One ORKS WALKER unit (excluding KILLA KANS) from your army.
More Dakka!.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, improve your unit’s Move, Leadership and Objective Control characteristics by 1, and each time a model in your unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

More Dakka!.name: GET STUCK IN, LADZ!
More Dakka!.target: One ORKS unit from your army (excluding GRETCHIN units).
More Dakka!.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, the Waaagh! is active for your unit, even if you have already called a Waaagh! this battle. Designer’s Note: This means that any abilities that are in effect while the Waaagh! is active for your army will be in effect for your unit.

More Dakka!.name: CALL DAT DAKKA?
More Dakka!.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
More Dakka!.target: One ORKS unit from your army that had one or more of its models destroyed as a result of the attacking unit’s attacks.
More Dakka!.effect: Your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

More Dakka!.name: SPESHUL SHELLS
More Dakka!.target: One ORKS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
More Dakka!.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets the closest eligible target within 18", improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1.

Ramship Raiders.name: RAMBOYZ RAMPAGE
Ramship Raiders.target: One BOYZ unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
Ramship Raiders.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced and each time your unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll; instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.

Ramship Raiders.name: EAGER TO FIGHT
Ramship Raiders.when: Your Movement phase, in the Reinforcements step, just after an ORKS unit from your army is set up in an Entry Zone.
Ramship Raiders.effect: Your unit can make an Advance move.

Ramship Raiders.name: ENRAGED RUSH
Ramship Raiders.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
Ramship Raiders.target: One BOYZ unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Ramship Raiders.effect: Your unit can make an Enraged Rush move. To do so, roll one D6: your unit can be moved a distance in inches up to the result, but must end that move as close as possible to the attacking unit. When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit, but only that enemy unit.

Ramship Raiders.name: PILE THROUGH
Ramship Raiders.when: Your Movement phase, just after an ORKS unit from your army opens a Hatchway.
Ramship Raiders.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit has the Fights First ability.

Taktikal Brigade.name: FIGHT PROPPA
Taktikal Brigade.target: One ORKS INFANTRY or ORKS MOUNTED unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Taktikal Brigade.effect: Select the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] or [LETHAL HITS] ability. Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the selected ability.

Taktikal Brigade.name: KRUNCHIN’ DESCENT
Taktikal Brigade.when: Your Charge phase, just after a STORMBOYZ unit from your army ends a Charge move.
Taktikal Brigade.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit, then roll one D6 for each model in your unit that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).

Taktikal Brigade.name: DED SNEAKY
Taktikal Brigade.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
Taktikal Brigade.target: One KOMMANDOS or STORMBOYZ unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Taktikal Brigade.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

Taktikal Brigade.name: DAT’S OURS
Taktikal Brigade.target: One ORKS unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Taktikal Brigade.effect: Until the start of the next Command phase, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in your unit.

Taktikal Brigade.name: TAKTIKAL RETREAT
Taktikal Brigade.when: Your Movement phase, just after an ORKS unit from your army Falls Back.
Taktikal Brigade.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

Taktikal Brigade.name: ON TO DA NEXT
Taktikal Brigade.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit Falls Back.
Taktikal Brigade.target: One ORKS unit from your army that was within Engagement Range of that enemy unit at the start of the phase.
Taktikal Brigade.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".

War Horde.name: UNBRIDLED CARNAGE
War Horde.target: One ORKS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
War Horde.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a melee attack, an unmodified hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

War Horde.name: ERE WE GO
War Horde.target: One ORKS INFANTRY unit from your army.
War Horde.effect: Until the end of the turn, add 2 to Advance and Charge rolls made for your unit.

War Horde.name: MOB RULE
War Horde.target: One MOB unit from your army that contains 10 or more models and is not Below Half-strength.
War Horde.effect: Select one friendly Battle-shocked ORKS INFANTRY unit within 6" of that MOB unit. That ORKS INFANTRY unit is no longer Battle-shocked.

War Horde.name: ’ARD AS NAILS
War Horde.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
War Horde.target: One ORKS unit from your army (excluding GROTS, MONSTER and VEHICLE units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
War Horde.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

War Horde.name: ORKS IS NEVER BEATEN
War Horde.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
War Horde.target: One ORKS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
War Horde.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model’s unit has finished making attacks, and is then removed from play.

War Horde.name: CAREEN!
War Horde.when: Any phase, just after an ORKS VEHICLE unit from your army with the Deadly Demise ability is destroyed.
War Horde.target: That destroyed ORKS VEHICLE unit, if you roll a 6 for its Deadly Demise ability. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
War Horde.effect: Your unit can make a Normal or Fall Back move before its Deadly Demise ability is resolved, and before any embarked units perform an Emergency Disembarkation. When making this move, your unit can move over enemy units (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) as if they were not there.

Noble Lance.name: SQUIRES' DUTY
Noble Lance.when: The start of your Shooting phase or the start of the Fight phase.
Noble Lance.target: Two or more ARMIGER models from your army and one enemy unit that is an eligible target for all of those ARMIGER models.
Noble Lance.effect: Until the end of the phase, when resolving attacks that target that enemy unit, improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of weapons equipped by those ARMIGER models by 1. If your army is Honoured, until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of those weapons as well.

Noble Lance.name: SHOULDER THE BURDEN
Noble Lance.target: One IMPERIAL KNIGHTS model from your army that has lost one or more wounds.
Noble Lance.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, improve your model’s Move, Toughness, Save, Leadership and Objective Control characteristics by 1 and each time your model makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.
Noble Lance.restrictions: You can only use this Stratagem once per battle. If your army is Honoured, you can use this Stratagem one additional time.

Noble Lance.name: TROPHY CLAIM
Noble Lance.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Noble Lance.target: One IMPERIAL KNIGHTS model from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase, and one enemy MONSTER or VEHICLE unit.
Noble Lance.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your model makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, add 1 to the Wound roll. If your model destroys that enemy unit this phase, you gain 1CP, but if your model does not destroy that enemy unit this phase, you cannot use this Stratagem again for the rest of the battle.

Noble Lance.name: VALIANT LAST STAND
Noble Lance.target: One IMPERIAL KNIGHTS model from your army that was just destroyed and that is eligible to fight but has not been selected to fight this phase. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.
Noble Lance.effect: Before rolling to see if this model deals any mortal wounds as a result of its Deadly Demise ability, it can fight; when doing so, it is assumed to have 1 wound remaining, or all its wounds remaining if your army is Honoured. After it has finished resolving its attacks, resolve its Deadly Demise ability as normal.
Noble Lance.restrictions: You cannot target SIR HEKHTUR with this Stratagem.

Noble Lance.name: THUNDERSTOMP
Noble Lance.target: One IMPERIAL KNIGHTS model from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Noble Lance.effect: Until the end of the phase, your model cannot target MONSTER or VEHICLE units, but all melee weapons equipped by your model have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

Noble Lance.name: ROTATE ION SHIELDS
Noble Lance.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Noble Lance.target: One IMPERIAL KNIGHTS model from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Noble Lance.effect: Until the end of the phase, that IMPERIAL KNIGHTS model has a 4+ invulnerable save against ranged attacks.

Questor Forgepact.name: BONDED IMPERATIVE
Questor Forgepact.when: Your Command phase, just before an IMPERIAL KNIGHTS CHARACTER unit from your army uses a Bondsman ability.
Questor Forgepact.effect: When selecting targets for that use of that Bondsman ability, you can select one friendly ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit within 12" of your unit in addition, or instead of selecting one ARMIGER model. Until the start of your next Command phase, every model in that ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit is affected by that Bondsman ability.
Questor Forgepact.restrictions: You cannot target a KNIGHT PRECEPTOR with this Stratagem.

Questor Forgepact.name: OMNISSIAH’S GRACE
Questor Forgepact.when: Any phase, just after a mortal wound is allocated to an IMPERIAL KNIGHTS or ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army.
Questor Forgepact.target: That IMPERIAL KNIGHTS or ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit.
Questor Forgepact.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against mortal wounds.

Questor Forgepact.name: MACHINE FOCUS
Questor Forgepact.target: One IMPERIAL KNIGHTS unit from your army.
Questor Forgepact.effect: Until the start of your next turn, your unit can ignore any or all modifiers to the following: the Weapon Skill or Ballistic Skill characteristics of weapons equipped by its models; any Hit roll or Wound roll made for it.

Questor Forgepact.name: THRONEGHEIST FURY
Questor Forgepact.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit is set up or ends a Normal, Advance, or Fall Back move.
Questor Forgepact.target: One IMPERIAL KNIGHTS TITANIC unit from your army that is within 24" of and visible to that enemy unit.
Questor Forgepact.effect: Select one ranged weapon equipped by a model in your unit. That model can shoot at that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target). When doing so, that model can only make attacks with that weapon and each time it makes a ranged attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 6 is required to score a hit, irrespective of the attacking weapon’s Ballistic Skill or any modifiers.

Questor Forgepact.name: AGGRESSION BEGETS AGGRESSION
Questor Forgepact.target: One IMPERIAL KNIGHTS unit from your army or one IMPERIAL KNIGHTS CHARACTER unit from your army and one friendly ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit that is within 6" of that unit.
Questor Forgepact.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your units have the [ASSAULT] ability.

Questor Forgepact.name: VENGEANCE OF THE MACHINE CULT
Questor Forgepact.target: One IMPERIAL KNIGHTS unit from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
Questor Forgepact.effect: Until the end of the battle, the enemy unit that destroyed your unit is Marked. Each time an ADEPTUS MECHANICUS model from your army makes an attack that targets a Marked unit, that attack has the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

Houndpack Lance.name: HUNGRY FOR COMBAT
Houndpack Lance.target: Two or more WAR DOG units from your army within Engagement Range of the same enemy unit.
Houndpack Lance.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of those WAR DOG units. Until the end of the phase, models in those WAR DOG units can only target that enemy unit, but each time a model in one of those WAR DOG units makes an attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

Houndpack Lance.name: ANIMALISTIC RAGE
Houndpack Lance.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after a WAR DOG unit from your army is destroyed.
Houndpack Lance.target: That WAR DOG unit. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
Houndpack Lance.effect: Before resolving your unit’s Deadly Demise ability, it can either shoot or fight. When doing so, it must target only the enemy unit that just destroyed it, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target. After it has done so and after any Consolidation moves have been made, resolve your unit’s Deadly Demise ability as normal.

Houndpack Lance.name: VOX-HOWL
Houndpack Lance.when: Start of the Shooting phase or the start of the Fight phase.
Houndpack Lance.target: One WAR DOG CHARACTER unit from your army.
Houndpack Lance.effect: Each enemy unit within 6" of your unit must take a Battle-shock test. Each friendly WAR DOG unit that is within 6" of your unit and is Battle-shocked must take a Leadership test; if that test is passed, that unit is no longer Battle-shocked.
Houndpack Lance.restrictions: You can only use this Stratagem once per turn.

Houndpack Lance.name: HARRYING HOUNDS
Houndpack Lance.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
Houndpack Lance.target: One WAR DOG unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit.
Houndpack Lance.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".

Houndpack Lance.name: ENCIRCLING PACK
Houndpack Lance.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
Houndpack Lance.target: One WAR DOG unit from your army that is wholly within 12" of one or more battlefield edges and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Houndpack Lance.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

Houndpack Lance.name: CUNNING HUNTER
Houndpack Lance.when: Your Movement phase, just after a WAR DOG unit from your army Falls Back.
Houndpack Lance.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

Iconoclast Fiefdom.name: SOUL HUNGER
Iconoclast Fiefdom.when: Fight phase, just after a CHAOS KNIGHTS unit from your army has fought.
Iconoclast Fiefdom.effect: If one or more models were destroyed as a result of those attacks, your unit regains up to D3 lost wounds. If one or more models from Battle-shocked units were destroyed as a result of those attacks, your unit regains up to D3+2 lost wounds instead.

Iconoclast Fiefdom.name: WRETCHED MASSES
Iconoclast Fiefdom.target: One DAMNED unit (excluding ACCURSED CULTISTS) from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
Iconoclast Fiefdom.effect: Add a new unit to your army identical to your destroyed unit, in Strategic Reserves, at its Starting Strength and with all of its wounds remaining.
Iconoclast Fiefdom.restrictions: You can only use this Stratagem once per battle. This Stratagem cannot be used to return destroyed CHARACTER units to Attached units.

Iconoclast Fiefdom.name: AVENGE THE MASTERS!
Iconoclast Fiefdom.target: One CHAOS KNIGHTS unit from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
Iconoclast Fiefdom.effect: Until the end of the battle, the enemy unit that destroyed your unit is Marked. Each time a DAMNED model from your army makes an attack that targets a Marked unit, that attack has the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

Iconoclast Fiefdom.name: PRESERVE THE IDOLS
Iconoclast Fiefdom.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
Iconoclast Fiefdom.target: One CHAOS KNIGHTS unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit.
Iconoclast Fiefdom.effect: Select one DAMNED unit from your army that is not Battle-shocked, not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and is within 6" of your unit. That DAMNED unit can make a Normal move of up to 6", but it must end this move closer to that enemy unit than when it started the move.

Iconoclast Fiefdom.name: WORTHLESS CHATTEL
Iconoclast Fiefdom.target: One DAMNED unit from your army.
Iconoclast Fiefdom.effect: Until the end of the phase, enemy units are not considered to be within Engagement Range of your unit for the purposes of selecting targets of ranged weapons. Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy model loses a wound, while that model’s unit is within Engagement Range of your unit, roll one D6: on a 4+, one model from your unit is destroyed after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks.

Iconoclast Fiefdom.name: UNRESTRAINED RAGE
Iconoclast Fiefdom.when: Your Movement phase, just after a CHAOS KNIGHTS unit from your army Advances or Falls Back.
Iconoclast Fiefdom.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back.

Infernal Lance.name: PROFANE SYMBIOSIS
Infernal Lance.target: One CHAOS KNIGHTS unit from your army that is not Empowered.
Infernal Lance.effect: Your unit makes a Malefic Surge.
Infernal Lance.restrictions: You cannot select the same unit as the target of this Stratagem more than once per battle round.

Infernal Lance.name: HELLFORGED CONSTRUCTION
Infernal Lance.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Infernal Lance.target: One CHAOS KNIGHTS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Infernal Lance.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Infernal Lance.name: CORRUPTING TAINT
Infernal Lance.when: Your Command phase, just after a CHAOS KNIGHTS CHARACTER unit from your army makes a Malefic Surge.
Infernal Lance.effect: Select one objective marker your unit is within range of that you control. That objective marker remains under your control until your opponent’s Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase.

Infernal Lance.name: DIABOLIC BULWARK
Infernal Lance.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Infernal Lance.target: One CHAOS KNIGHTS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Infernal Lance.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.

Infernal Lance.name: UNLEASH BALEFIRE
Infernal Lance.target: One CHAOS KNIGHTS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Infernal Lance.effect: After your unit has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test; if the test is failed, until the end of your opponent’s next turn, it is aflame. While a unit is aflame, subtract 2" from its Move characteristic and subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for it.

Infernal Lance.name: WARP VISION
Infernal Lance.target: One CHAOS KNIGHTS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Infernal Lance.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability.

Lords of Dread.name: TITANIC DUEL
Lords of Dread.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Lords of Dread.target: One CHAOS KNIGHTS CHARACTER unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Lords of Dread.effect: Select one enemy MONSTER or VEHICLE unit. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and re-roll a Wound roll of 1. Each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, if that enemy unit is TITANIC, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.

Lords of Dread.name: RUNES OF DISDAIN
Lords of Dread.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Lords of Dread.target: One CHAOS KNIGHTS CHARACTER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Lords of Dread.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to a model in your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

Lords of Dread.name: TROPHY HUNTER
Lords of Dread.when: Fight phase, just before a CHAOS KNIGHTS CHARACTER unit from your army consolidates.
Lords of Dread.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit Consolidates, models in it can move an additional 3" as long as your unit can end that move within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

Lords of Dread.name: CRUSHED LIKE VERMIN
Lords of Dread.when: Your Movement phase, just after a CHAOS KNIGHTS CHARACTER unit from your army ends a Normal move.
Lords of Dread.effect: Select one enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) that your unit moved over during that move and roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If one or more models are destroyed as a result of this Stratagem, that enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test.

Lords of Dread.name: SPITEFUL DEMISE
Lords of Dread.when: Any phase, just after a CHAOS KNIGHTS CHARACTER unit from your army is destroyed.
Lords of Dread.target: That CHAOS KNIGHTS CHARACTER unit. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
Lords of Dread.effect: When rolling to determine whether mortal wounds are inflicted by your unit’s Deadly Demise ability, that model’s Deadly Demise ability inflicts mortal wounds on a D6 roll of a 4+ instead of on a 6.

Lords of Dread.name: CLAIMED FOR THE DARK GODS
Lords of Dread.target: One CHAOS KNIGHTS CHARACTER unit from your army that is within range of one or more objective markers you control.
Lords of Dread.effect: Select one of those objective markers. That objective marker remains under your control, with a Level of Control of 5 (unless it would otherwise be higher), until your opponent’s Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase.

Traitoris Lance.name: CONQUERORS WITHOUT MERCY
Traitoris Lance.target: One CHAOS KNIGHTS model from your army that made a Charge move this turn and has not been selected to fight this phase.
Traitoris Lance.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of melee weapons equipped by your model by 1. After your model has finished making its attacks this phase, if it destroyed one or more enemy units this phase, each enemy unit within 6" of your model must take a Battle-shock test.

Traitoris Lance.name: IMPERIOUS ADVANCE
Traitoris Lance.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
Traitoris Lance.target: Up to two WAR DOG units from your army or one TITANIC CHAOS KNIGHTS unit from your army.
Traitoris Lance.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in one of your units makes a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move, it can move through models and terrain features. When doing so, it can move within Engagement Range of such models but, unless it made a Charge move, cannot end that move within Engagement Range of them, and any Desperate Escape test is automatically passed (the Super-heavy Walker ability does not apply while using this Stratagem).

Traitoris Lance.name: DISDAIN FOR THE WEAK
Traitoris Lance.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Traitoris Lance.target: One CHAOS KNIGHTS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Traitoris Lance.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability, and the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against attacks made by Battle-shocked models.

Traitoris Lance.name: A LONG LEASH
Traitoris Lance.target: One ABHORRENT unit from your army and up to two friendly WAR DOG units.
Traitoris Lance.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, those WAR DOG units are treated as being within range of any Aura abilities your ABHORRENT unit has.

Traitoris Lance.name: STORM OF DARKNESS
Traitoris Lance.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Traitoris Lance.target: One CHAOS KNIGHTS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Traitoris Lance.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Stealth ability, and each time an attack targets your unit, models in it have the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

Traitoris Lance.name: PTERRORSHADES
Traitoris Lance.when: Any phase, just after an enemy unit fails a Battle-shock test.
Traitoris Lance.target: One CHAOS KNIGHTS unit from your army that is within 12" of that enemy unit.
Traitoris Lance.effect: Roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound and one model in your unit regains up to 1 lost wound.
Traitoris Lance.restrictions: You can only use this Stratagem once per battle round.

Strike Team Solarien.name: Vanguard Strike
Strike Team Solarien.target: One Strike Team Solarien unit from your army.
Strike Team Solarien.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of each model in that unit.

Strike Team Solarien.name: Giantslayer Doctrine
Strike Team Solarien.when: Your Shooting phase, when a Suppressor Squad unit from your army is selected to shoot.
Strike Team Solarien.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1 and those weapons gain the abilities ANTI‑MONSTER 4+ and ANTI‑VEHICLE 4+.

Strike Team Solarien.name: Rapid Repositioning
Strike Team Solarien.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move within nine inches of a friendly PHOBOS unit from your army.
Strike Team Solarien.target: One PHOBOS unit from your army that is within nine inches of that enemy unit.
Strike Team Solarien.effect: That unit can make a Normal move of up to three inches. It cannot end this move within Engagement Range of any enemy units.

1st Company Task Force.name: LEGENDARY FORTITUDE
1st Company Task Force.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Charge move.
1st Company Task Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR, BLADEGUARD VETERAN SQUAD, STERNGUARD VETERAN SQUAD or VANGUARD VETERAN SQUAD unit from your army within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
1st Company Task Force.effect: Until the end of the turn, each time an attack is allocated to a model in your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

1st Company Task Force.name: HEROES OF THE CHAPTER
1st Company Task Force.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
1st Company Task Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR, BLADEGUARD VETERAN SQUAD, STERNGUARD VETERAN SQUAD or VANGUARD VETERAN SQUAD unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
1st Company Task Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll. If your unit is Below Half-strength, add 1 to the Wound roll as well.

1st Company Task Force.name: ARMOUR OF CONTEMPT
1st Company Task Force.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
1st Company Task Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
1st Company Task Force.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

1st Company Task Force.name: ORBITAL TELEPORTARIUM
1st Company Task Force.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
1st Company Task Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR unit from your army.
1st Company Task Force.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves. It will arrive back on the battlefield in the Reinforcements step of your next Movement phase using the Deep Strike ability.
1st Company Task Force.restrictions: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

1st Company Task Force.name: TERRIFYING PROFICIENCY
1st Company Task Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR, BLADEGUARD VETERAN SQUAD, STERNGUARD VETERAN SQUAD or VANGUARD VETERAN SQUAD unit from your army that made a Charge move this turn and destroyed one or more enemy units this phase.
1st Company Task Force.effect: In your opponent’s next Command phase, each enemy unit within 6" of your unit must take a Battle-shock test. If the unit taking that test is Below Half-strength, subtract 1 from that test. Enemy units affected by this Stratagem do not need to take any other Battle-shock tests in the same phase.

1st Company Task Force.name: DUTY AND HONOUR
1st Company Task Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR, BLADEGUARD VETERAN SQUAD, STERNGUARD VETERAN SQUAD or VANGUARD VETERAN SQUAD unit from your army within range of an objective marker you control.
1st Company Task Force.effect: That objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

Angelic Inheritors.name: IN THE SHADOW OF GREAT WINGS
Angelic Inheritors.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Angelic Inheritors.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES CHARACTER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Angelic Inheritors.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 18".

Angelic Inheritors.name: FOCUSED FURY
Angelic Inheritors.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Angelic Inheritors.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability. If your unit is a CHARACTER unit, until the end of the phase, those weapons have the [LANCE] ability as well.

Angelic Inheritors.name: ARMOUR OF CONTEMPT
Angelic Inheritors.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Angelic Inheritors.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Angelic Inheritors.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Angelic Inheritors.name: INSTANT OF GRACE
Angelic Inheritors.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army.
Angelic Inheritors.effect: Select one non-CHARACTER model in your unit. Until the start of your next Command phase, your model has the CHARACTER keyword. Designer’s Note: While in effect, your model’s unit is therefore a CHARACTER unit, meaning it can interact with the Legacy of the Angel Detachment rule, in addition to other rules that interact with CHARACTER units.

Angelic Inheritors.name: UNTO THE BURNING SKIES
Angelic Inheritors.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
Angelic Inheritors.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES JUMP PACK unit from your army. You cannot target a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, unless it is THE SANGUINOR.
Angelic Inheritors.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

Angelic Inheritors.name: STRIKE NOW FOR GLORY
Angelic Inheritors.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Angelic Inheritors.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

Anvil Siege Force.name: ARMOUR OF CONTEMPT
Anvil Siege Force.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Anvil Siege Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Anvil Siege Force.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Anvil Siege Force.name: NO THREAT TOO GREAT
Anvil Siege Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Anvil Siege Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

Anvil Siege Force.name: BATTLE DRILL RECALL
Anvil Siege Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Anvil Siege Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. If your unit Remained Stationary this turn, then until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

Anvil Siege Force.name: HAIL OF VENGEANCE
Anvil Siege Force.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has resolved its attacks.
Anvil Siege Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that had one or more of its models destroyed as a result of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Anvil Siege Force.effect: Your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

Anvil Siege Force.name: RIGID DISCIPLINE
Anvil Siege Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Anvil Siege Force.effect: Your unit can immediately make a Fall Back move of up to 6".
Anvil Siege Force.restrictions: When making that move, your unit must end that move either wholly within your deployment zone or within range of an objective marker.

Anvil Siege Force.name: NOT ONE BACKWARDS STEP
Anvil Siege Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army within range of an objective marker.
Anvil Siege Force.effect: Until the end of the turn, double the Objective Control characteristic of models in your unit, but it must Remain Stationary this turn.

Black Spear Task Force.name: ARMOUR OF CONTEMPT
Black Spear Task Force.group: SPACE MARINES – Black Spear Task Force
Black Spear Task Force.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Black Spear Task Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Black Spear Task Force.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Black Spear Task Force.name: SITE-TO-SITE TELEPORTATION
Black Spear Task Force.group: SPACE MARINES – Black Spear Task Force
Black Spear Task Force.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
Black Spear Task Force.target: Up to two KILL TEAM units from your army, or one other ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army, if those units are not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Black Spear Task Force.effect: Remove those units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves. Until the end of your next Movement phase, models in those units that do not have the Deep Strike ability have the Deep Strike ability.

Black Spear Task Force.name: ADAPTIVE TACTICS
Black Spear Task Force.group: SPACE MARINES – Black Spear Task Force
Black Spear Task Force.target: Up to two KILL TEAM units from your army, or one other ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army.
Black Spear Task Force.effect: For each unit targeted, select Furor Tactics, Malleus Tactics or Purgatus Tactics. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Mission Tactic is active for that unit instead of any Mission Tactic that is active for your army.

Black Spear Task Force.name: HELLFIRE ROUNDS
Black Spear Task Force.group: SPACE MARINES – Black Spear Task Force
Black Spear Task Force.target: One KILL TEAM unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Black Spear Task Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons (excluding Devastating Wounds weapons) equipped by models in your unit have the [ANTI-INFANTRY 2+] and [ANTI-MONSTER 5+] abilities.
Black Spear Task Force.restrictions: You cannot select any units that have already been targeted with either the Kraken Rounds or Dragonfire Rounds Stratagems this phase.

Black Spear Task Force.name: KRAKEN ROUNDS
Black Spear Task Force.group: SPACE MARINES – Black Spear Task Force
Black Spear Task Force.target: One KILL TEAM unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Black Spear Task Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1 and improve the Range characteristic of those weapons by 6".
Black Spear Task Force.restrictions: You cannot select any units that have already been targeted with either the Dragonfire Rounds or Hellfire Rounds Stratagems this phase.

Black Spear Task Force.name: DRAGONFIRE ROUNDS
Black Spear Task Force.group: SPACE MARINES – Black Spear Task Force
Black Spear Task Force.target: One KILL TEAM unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Black Spear Task Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [ASSAULT] and [IGNORES COVER] abilities.
Black Spear Task Force.restrictions: You cannot select any units that have already been targeted with either the Kraken Rounds or Hellfire Rounds Stratagems this phase.

Boarding Strike.name: CERAMITE BULWARK
Boarding Strike.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES BATTLELINE unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Boarding Strike.effect: Select any number of models in your unit. Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks and Strength characteristics of melee weapons equipped by the selected models and each time you select targets for attacks made by those models, they must target an enemy unit that is wholly on the opposite side of a Hatchway from them.

Boarding Strike.name: IN THE EMPEROR’S NAME
Boarding Strike.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Boarding Strike.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES BATTLELINE unit from your army that is within range of an objective marker and was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Boarding Strike.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

Boarding Strike.name: DUTY AND DEFIANCE
Boarding Strike.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Boarding Strike.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Boarding Strike.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if your unit has the BATTLELINE keyword: on a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

Boarding Strike.name: VOX-AMPLIFIED ROAR
Boarding Strike.when: Your Charge phase, just after an ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army declares a charge.
Boarding Strike.effect: Each target of that charge must take a Battle-shock test.

Champions of Fenris.name: STALKING WOLVES
Champions of Fenris.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Champions of Fenris.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Champions of Fenris.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Stealth ability.

Champions of Fenris.name: CHILLING HOWL
Champions of Fenris.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR unit from your army.
Champions of Fenris.effect: Each enemy unit within 6" of your unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from that test if that unit is Below Half-strength.

Champions of Fenris.name: RUNES OF CLAIMING
Champions of Fenris.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY or ADEPTUS ASTARTES WALKER unit from your army.
Champions of Fenris.effect: Select one objective marker you control that your unit is within range of. That objective marker remains under your control until your opponent’s Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase.

Champions of Fenris.name: ONRUSHING STORM
Champions of Fenris.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
Champions of Fenris.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Champions of Fenris.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

Champions of Fenris.name: ARMOUR OF CONTEMPT
Champions of Fenris.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Champions of Fenris.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Champions of Fenris.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Champions of Fenris.name: PREYTAKER’S EYE
Champions of Fenris.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Champions of Fenris.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Champions of Fenris.effect: Select either the [LETHAL HITS] or [SUSTAINED HITS 1] abilities. Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have that ability.

Companions of Vehemence.name: DEVOUT PUSH
Companions of Vehemence.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Companions of Vehemence.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile-in or Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3".
Companions of Vehemence.restrictions: A unit cannot be targeted with this and the Hearts Hardened to Duty Stratagem in the same phase unless it has the CHAPLAIN or JUDICIAR keywords.

Companions of Vehemence.name: FOR THE EMPEROR'S HONOUR!
Companions of Vehemence.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Companions of Vehemence.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PRECISION] ability.

Companions of Vehemence.name: PIOUS ENMITY
Companions of Vehemence.target: One CHAPLAIN or JUDICIAR unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Companions of Vehemence.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a melee attack that targets an enemy unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. If that target is a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, re-roll a Wound roll of 1 as well.

Companions of Vehemence.name: HERESY BEGETS RETRIBUTION
Companions of Vehemence.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
Companions of Vehemence.target: One CHAPLAIN or JUDICIAR unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit and is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Companions of Vehemence.effect: Your unit can make a Retribution move. To do so, roll one D6: models in your unit move a number of inches up to the result, but your unit must end that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit (excluding AIRCRAFT). When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.

Companions of Vehemence.name: HEARTS HARDENED TO DUTY
Companions of Vehemence.when: Fight phase, just before an ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army Consolidates.
Companions of Vehemence.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Consolidation move, it does not need to end that move closer to the closest enemy model (or the closest enemy unit if the Suffer Not the Unclean to Live Vow is active for it).

Companions of Vehemence.name: DREAD CRUSADERS
Companions of Vehemence.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit declares a charge.
Companions of Vehemence.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as one of the targets of that charge.
Companions of Vehemence.effect: That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result.

Company of Hunters.name: RAPID REAPPRAISAL
Company of Hunters.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
Company of Hunters.target: One RAVENWING unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Company of Hunters.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

Company of Hunters.name: HIGH-SPEED FOCUS
Company of Hunters.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Company of Hunters.target: One RAVENWING unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Company of Hunters.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

Company of Hunters.name: ARMOUR OF CONTEMPT
Company of Hunters.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Company of Hunters.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Company of Hunters.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Company of Hunters.name: DEATH ON THE WIND
Company of Hunters.target: One RAVENWING unit from your army that has just shot.
