Company of Hunters.effect: Select one enemy unit that was hit by one or more of those attacks. That unit must take a Battle-shock test. When doing so, if one or more RAVENWING units from your army are within 6" of that enemy unit, subtract 1 from the test.

Company of Hunters.name: HUNTERS’ TRAIL
Company of Hunters.target: One RAVENWING MOUNTED unit from your army that is within range of an objective marker you control.
Company of Hunters.effect: That objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

Company of Hunters.name: TALON STRIKE
Company of Hunters.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Company of Hunters.target: One RAVENWING MOUNTED unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Company of Hunters.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets an INFANTRY CHARACTER or MOUNTED CHARACTER unit, add 1 to the Wound roll.

Firestorm Assault Force.name: BURNING VENGEANCE
Firestorm Assault Force.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has resolved its attacks.
Firestorm Assault Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TRANSPORT unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Firestorm Assault Force.effect: One unit embarked within that TRANSPORT can disembark as if it were your Movement phase, and can then shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

Firestorm Assault Force.name: ARMOUR OF CONTEMPT
Firestorm Assault Force.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Firestorm Assault Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Firestorm Assault Force.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Firestorm Assault Force.name: ONSLAUGHT OF FIRE
Firestorm Assault Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Firestorm Assault Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets the closest eligible target within 12", add 1 to the Hit roll. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as the result of any of those attacks, select one of those destroyed models; that destroyed model’s unit must take a Battle-shock test.

Firestorm Assault Force.name: CRUCIBLE OF BATTLE
Firestorm Assault Force.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Firestorm Assault Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Firestorm Assault Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets the closest eligible target within 6", add 1 to the Wound roll.

Firestorm Assault Force.name: IMMOLATION PROTOCOLS
Firestorm Assault Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Firestorm Assault Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, Torrent weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

Firestorm Assault Force.name: RAPID EMBARKATION
Firestorm Assault Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TRANSPORT unit from your army that has no models embarked within it, and one ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army wholly within 6" of that TRANSPORT.
Firestorm Assault Force.effect: Your INFANTRY unit can embark within that TRANSPORT.
Firestorm Assault Force.restrictions: You cannot target an INFANTRY unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, that cannot normally embark within that TRANSPORT, or that disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn.

Forgefather’s Seekers.name: IMMOLATION PROTOCOLS
Forgefather’s Seekers.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Forgefather’s Seekers.effect: Until the end of the phase, Torrent weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

Forgefather’s Seekers.name: BURNING VENGEANCE
Forgefather’s Seekers.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
Forgefather’s Seekers.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TRANSPORT unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Forgefather’s Seekers.effect: One unit embarked within that TRANSPORT can disembark as if it were your Movement phase, and can then shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

Forgefather’s Seekers.name: ARMOUR OF CONTEMPT
Forgefather’s Seekers.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Forgefather’s Seekers.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Forgefather’s Seekers.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Forgefather’s Seekers.name: CRUCIBLE OF BATTLE
Forgefather’s Seekers.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Forgefather’s Seekers.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Forgefather’s Seekers.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets the closest eligible target within 6", add 1 to the Wound roll.

Forgefather’s Seekers.name: BLAZING EARTH
Forgefather’s Seekers.when: Start of your opponent’s Charge phase.
Forgefather’s Seekers.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army equipped with one or more Torrent weapons.
Forgefather’s Seekers.effect: Select one enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES and units with the FLY keyword) within 12" of and visible to your unit. Until the end of the phase, each time that enemy unit declares a charge, subtract 2 from the Charge roll (this is not cumulative with any other negative modifiers to that Charge roll).

Forgefather’s Seekers.name: WRATHFUL INFERNO
Forgefather’s Seekers.when: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army Falls Back.
Forgefather’s Seekers.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back.

Gladius Task Force.name: HONOUR THE CHAPTER
Gladius Task Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army.
Gladius Task Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LANCE] ability. If your unit is under the effects of the Assault Doctrine, until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of such weapons by 1 as well.

Gladius Task Force.name: STORM OF FIRE
Gladius Task Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Gladius Task Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability. If your unit is under the effects of the Devastator Doctrine, until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of such weapons by 1 as well.

Gladius Task Force.name: ARMOUR OF CONTEMPT
Gladius Task Force.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Gladius Task Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Gladius Task Force.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Gladius Task Force.name: ONLY IN DEATH DOES DUTY END
Gladius Task Force.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Gladius Task Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Gladius Task Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model’s unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

Gladius Task Force.name: ADAPTIVE STRATEGY
Gladius Task Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army.
Gladius Task Force.effect: Select the Devastator Doctrine, Tactical Doctrine or Assault Doctrine. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Combat Doctrine is active for that unit instead of any other Combat Doctrine that is active for your army, even if you have already selected that doctrine this battle.

Gladius Task Force.name: SQUAD TACTICS
Gladius Task Force.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
Gladius Task Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY or ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army that is within 9" of the enemy unit that just ended that move.
Gladius Task Force.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6", or a Normal move of up to 6" instead if it is under the effects of the Tactical Doctrine.
Gladius Task Force.restrictions: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

Godhammer Assault Force.name: CONDEMNATORY INFO-SCREED
Godhammer Assault Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Godhammer Assault Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, if it disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn, re-roll a Wound roll of 1. If that TRANSPORT has the LAND RAIDER keyword, you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.

Godhammer Assault Force.name: BLESSED HULL
Godhammer Assault Force.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Godhammer Assault Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES VEHICLE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Godhammer Assault Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to a model in your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

Godhammer Assault Force.name: UNCOMPROMISING EGRESS
Godhammer Assault Force.target: One LAND RAIDER model from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
Godhammer Assault Force.effect: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit embarked within your LAND RAIDER can disembark. When doing so, models in that unit can be set up anywhere on the battlefield wholly within 6" of your LAND RAIDER and can be set up within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

Godhammer Assault Force.name: GAUNTLET OF THE GOD-EMPEROR
Godhammer Assault Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES VEHICLE model from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
Godhammer Assault Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your model makes a Normal or Advance move, it can move horizontally through terrain features.

Godhammer Assault Force.name: FOCUSED HATRED
Godhammer Assault Force.when: Your Charge phase, just after you make a Charge roll for an ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn.
Godhammer Assault Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes a Charge move, models in your unit can move through models (when doing so, its models can move within Engagement Range of enemy models, but they can only end that move within Engagement Range of enemy models if those enemy models belong to a unit that your unit declared a charge against this turn).

Godhammer Assault Force.name: A CEASELESS CAUSE
Godhammer Assault Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that was eligible to fight this phase.
Godhammer Assault Force.effect: If your unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 6". It cannot embark within a TRANSPORT at the end of this move if it disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn.

Inner Circle Task Force.name: UNMATCHED FORTITUDE
Inner Circle Task Force.group: SPACE MARINES – Inner Circle Task Force
Inner Circle Task Force.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Inner Circle Task Force.target: One DEATHWING INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Inner Circle Task Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than your unit’s Toughness characteristic, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

Inner Circle Task Force.name: ARMOUR OF CONTEMPT
Inner Circle Task Force.group: SPACE MARINES – Inner Circle Task Force
Inner Circle Task Force.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Inner Circle Task Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Inner Circle Task Force.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Inner Circle Task Force.name: WRATH OF THE LION
Inner Circle Task Force.group: SPACE MARINES – Inner Circle Task Force
Inner Circle Task Force.target: One DEATHWING INFANTRY unit from your army that just ended a Charge move.
Inner Circle Task Force.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit and roll one D6 for each model in your unit, adding 1 to the result if that enemy unit is within range of your Vowed objective marker: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 3 mortal wounds).

Inner Circle Task Force.name: MARTIAL MASTERY
Inner Circle Task Force.group: SPACE MARINES – Inner Circle Task Force
Inner Circle Task Force.target: One DEATHWING INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Inner Circle Task Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1. If your unit is within range of your Vowed objective marker, you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.

Inner Circle Task Force.name: RELIC TELEPORTARIUM
Inner Circle Task Force.group: SPACE MARINES – Inner Circle Task Force
Inner Circle Task Force.target: One DEATHWING unit from your army that is arriving using the Deep Strike ability this phase.
Inner Circle Task Force.effect: Your unit can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy models.
Inner Circle Task Force.restrictions: Until the end of the turn, your unit is not eligible to declare a charge.

Inner Circle Task Force.name: DUTY UNTO DEATH
Inner Circle Task Force.group: SPACE MARINES – Inner Circle Task Force
Inner Circle Task Force.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Inner Circle Task Force.target: One DEATHWING unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Inner Circle Task Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 if your unit is within range of your Vowed objective marker. On a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

Ironstorm Spearhead.name: UNBOWED CONVICTION
Ironstorm Spearhead.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that is below its Starting Strength.
Ironstorm Spearhead.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit can ignore any or all modifiers to its characteristics and/or to any roll or test made for it (excluding modifiers to saving throws).

Ironstorm Spearhead.name: MERCY IS WEAKNESS
Ironstorm Spearhead.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Ironstorm Spearhead.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Ironstorm Spearhead.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit that is below its Starting Strength, that attack has the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability, and when making such an attack, if the attacking model is a VEHICLE, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

Ironstorm Spearhead.name: ARMOUR OF CONTEMPT
Ironstorm Spearhead.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Ironstorm Spearhead.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Ironstorm Spearhead.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Ironstorm Spearhead.name: ANCIENT FURY
Ironstorm Spearhead.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES WALKER model from your army.
Ironstorm Spearhead.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, improve your model’s Move, Toughness, Leadership and Objective Control characteristics by 1 and each time your model makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

Ironstorm Spearhead.name: VENGEFUL ANIMUS
Ironstorm Spearhead.when: Any phase, just after an ADEPTUS ASTARTES VEHICLE model from your army with the Deadly Demise ability is destroyed.
Ironstorm Spearhead.target: That ADEPTUS ASTARTES VEHICLE model. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.
Ironstorm Spearhead.effect: Do not roll one D6 to determine whether mortal wounds are inflicted by your model’s Deadly Demise ability. Instead, mortal wounds are automatically inflicted.

Ironstorm Spearhead.name: POWER OF THE MACHINE SPIRIT
Ironstorm Spearhead.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has resolved its attacks.
Ironstorm Spearhead.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES VEHICLE unit from your army that was reduced to Below Half-strength as a result of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Ironstorm Spearhead.effect: Your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

Liberator Assault Group.name: ARMOUR OF CONTEMPT
Liberator Assault Group.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Liberator Assault Group.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Liberator Assault Group.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Liberator Assault Group.name: RED RAMPAGE
Liberator Assault Group.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Liberator Assault Group.effect: Select either the [LANCE] or [LETHAL HITS] abilities. Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the selected ability. You can instead choose for your unit to give in to the Red Thirst; if it does, then it becomes Battle-shocked (but the effects of this Stratagem still apply to it) and until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LANCE] and [LETHAL HITS] abilities.

Liberator Assault Group.name: SAVAGE ECHOES
Liberator Assault Group.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was just charged by an enemy unit.
Liberator Assault Group.effect: Select either the Strength or Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit. Until the end of the turn, add 1 to the selected characteristic. You can instead choose for your unit to give in to the Red Thirst; if it does, it becomes Battle-shocked (but the effects of this Stratagem still apply to it) and until the end of the turn, add 1 to the Strength and Attacks characteristics of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit.

Liberator Assault Group.name: AGGRESSIVE ONSLAUGHT
Liberator Assault Group.when: Your Movement phase, just after an Adeptus Astartes unit from your army has Advanced.
Liberator Assault Group.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to either shoot or declare a charge, even though it Advanced. You can instead choose for your unit to give in to the Red Thirst; if it does, it becomes Battle-shocked (but the effects of this Stratagem still apply to it) and until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to both shoot and declare a charge, even though it Advanced.

Liberator Assault Group.name: RELENTLESS ASSAULT
Liberator Assault Group.when: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army Falls Back.
Liberator Assault Group.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to either shoot or declare a charge even though it Fell Back. You can instead choose for your unit to give in to the Red Thirst; if it does, it becomes Battle-shocked (but the effects of this Stratagem still apply to it) and until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to both shoot and declare a charge, even though it Fell Back.

Liberator Assault Group.name: ANGELIC GRACE
Liberator Assault Group.when: Any phase, just after an ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army has a mortal wound allocated to it.
Liberator Assault Group.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against mortal wounds.

Librarius Conclave.name: PRESCIENT PRECISION
Librarius Conclave.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES PSYKER unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Librarius Conclave.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, that attack has the [LETHAL HITS] ability, and the [IGNORES COVER] ability as well if the Divination Discipline is active for your army.

Librarius Conclave.name: ARMOUR OF CONTEMPT
Librarius Conclave.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Librarius Conclave.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Librarius Conclave.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Librarius Conclave.name: SENSORY ASSAULT
Librarius Conclave.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES PSYKER unit from your army.
Librarius Conclave.effect: Select one enemy unit that is within 18" of and visible to one PSYKER model in your unit. Until the start of your next turn, that enemy unit is pinned. While a unit is pinned, subtract 2 from that unit’s Move characteristic and subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for it. In addition, if the Telepathy Discipline is active for your army, that enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result.

Librarius Conclave.name: ASSAIL
Librarius Conclave.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES PSYKER unit from your army that is eligible to shoot.
Librarius Conclave.effect: Select one enemy unit within 18" of and visible to one or more PSYKER models in your unit (excluding units with the Lone Operative ability), and roll six D6, adding 1 to each result if the Telekinesis Discipline is active for your army: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

Librarius Conclave.name: IRON ARM
Librarius Conclave.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that is within 18" of one or more ADEPTUS ASTARTES PSYKER models from your army and has not been selected to Fight this phase.
Librarius Conclave.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Strength characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit, or add 2 if the Biomancy Discipline is active for your army.

Librarius Conclave.name: FIERY SHIELD
Librarius Conclave.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Librarius Conclave.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY or ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army that is within 18" of one or more friendly ADEPTUS ASTARTES PSYKER models, and that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Librarius Conclave.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll, and if the Pyromancy Discipline is active for your army, weapons that target your unit have the [HAZARDOUS] ability.

Lion’s Blade Task Force.name: ILLUMINATING FIRE
Lion’s Blade Task Force.group: SPACE MARINES – Lion’s Blade Task Force
Lion’s Blade Task Force.when: Your Shooting phase, just after a RAVENWING unit from your army has selected its targets.
Lion’s Blade Task Force.effect: Select one enemy unit within 12" of your unit that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks. Until the end of the phase, each time a friendly DEATHWING unit makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, add 1 to the Wound roll.

Lion’s Blade Task Force.name: ARMOUR OF CONTEMPT
Lion’s Blade Task Force.group: SPACE MARINES – Lion’s Blade Task Force
Lion’s Blade Task Force.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Lion’s Blade Task Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Lion’s Blade Task Force.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Lion’s Blade Task Force.name: STRENGTH IN UNITY
Lion’s Blade Task Force.group: SPACE MARINES – Lion’s Blade Task Force
Lion’s Blade Task Force.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Lion’s Blade Task Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Lion’s Blade Task Force.effect: If that enemy unit is within Engagement Range of one or more RAVENWING units from your army, until the end of the phase, each time a model in that enemy unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll. If that enemy unit is within Engagement Range of one or more DEATHWING units from your army, until the end of the phase, each time a model in that enemy unit makes an attack, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of the target, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.
Lion’s Blade Task Force.restrictions: A unit cannot be targeted by this and the Armour of Contempt Stratagem in the same phase.

Lion’s Blade Task Force.name: INESCAPABLE WRATH
Lion’s Blade Task Force.group: SPACE MARINES – Lion’s Blade Task Force
Lion’s Blade Task Force.when: End of your opponent’s Charge phase.
Lion’s Blade Task Force.target: One DEATHWING INFANTRY or DEATHWING WALKER unit from your army that is within 6" of one or more enemy units and would be eligible to declare a charge against one or more of those enemy units if it were your Charge phase.
Lion’s Blade Task Force.effect: Your unit now declares a charge that only targets one or more of those enemy units, and you resolve that charge.
Lion’s Blade Task Force.restrictions: Note that even if this charge is successful, your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

Lion’s Blade Task Force.name: KNIGHTS OF IRON
Lion’s Blade Task Force.group: SPACE MARINES – Lion’s Blade Task Force
Lion’s Blade Task Force.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
Lion’s Blade Task Force.target: One RAVENWING unit from your army.
Lion’s Blade Task Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Normal, Advance or Charge move, it can move horizontally through terrain features.

Lion’s Blade Task Force.name: OVERPOWERING EXACTION
Lion’s Blade Task Force.group: SPACE MARINES – Lion’s Blade Task Force
Lion’s Blade Task Force.when: Command phase or the start of the Fight phase.
Lion’s Blade Task Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army.
Lion’s Blade Task Force.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test. When doing so, if your unit has the DEATHWING or RAVENWING keyword, subtract 1 from the result.
Lion’s Blade Task Force.restrictions: You can only use this Stratagem once per battle round.

Pilum Strike Team.name: MASTER MARKSMEN
Pilum Strike Team.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Pilum Strike Team.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

Pilum Strike Team.name: KNIFE WORK
Pilum Strike Team.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Pilum Strike Team.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1.

Pilum Strike Team.name: FIGHTING RETREAT
Pilum Strike Team.when: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army is selected to Fall Back.
Pilum Strike Team.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit and roll one D6: on a 2-4, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound; on a 5+, that enemy unit suffers 2 mortal wounds.

Pilum Strike Team.name: ENHANCED EFFICIENCY
Pilum Strike Team.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
Pilum Strike Team.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit is selected to make a Normal or Advance move, it can attempt to operate one Hatchway it is within 1” of either at the start or end of that move. If it does, it cannot attempt to operate a Hatchway again this turn.

Saga of the Beastslayer.name: UNBRIDLED FEROCITY
Saga of the Beastslayer.group: SPACE MARINES – Saga of the Beastslayer
Saga of the Beastslayer.target: One SPACE WOLVES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Saga of the Beastslayer.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

Saga of the Beastslayer.name: COORDINATED STRIKE
Saga of the Beastslayer.group: SPACE MARINES – Saga of the Beastslayer
Saga of the Beastslayer.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
Saga of the Beastslayer.target: One SPACE WOLVES unit from your army that is wholly within 9" of one or more battlefield edges and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Saga of the Beastslayer.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

Saga of the Beastslayer.name: IMPETUOSITY
Saga of the Beastslayer.group: SPACE MARINES – Saga of the Beastslayer
Saga of the Beastslayer.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Saga of the Beastslayer.target: One WULFEN INFANTRY or BLOOD CLAWS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Saga of the Beastslayer.effect: Until the end of the phase, after that enemy unit has shot, if one or more models in your unit were destroyed as a result of those attacks, your unit can make an Impetuous move. To do so, roll one D6: your unit can be moved a number of inches up to the result, but your unit must end that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit (excluding AIRCRAFT). When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.

Saga of the Beastslayer.name: THUNDEROUS PURSUIT
Saga of the Beastslayer.group: SPACE MARINES – Saga of the Beastslayer
Saga of the Beastslayer.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
Saga of the Beastslayer.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Saga of the Beastslayer.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6". If your unit has the SPACE WOLVES INFANTRY or THUNDERWOLF CAVALRY keywords, it can make a Normal move of up to 6" instead.

Saga of the Beastslayer.name: PINNING FIRE
Saga of the Beastslayer.group: SPACE MARINES – Saga of the Beastslayer
Saga of the Beastslayer.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Saga of the Beastslayer.effect: Until the end of the phase, after your unit has shot, select one enemy CHARACTER, MONSTER, or VEHICLE unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next Shooting phase, that unit is pinned. While a unit is pinned, subtract 2" from its Move characteristic and subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for it.

Saga of the Beastslayer.name: SHOCK CAVALRY
Saga of the Beastslayer.group: SPACE MARINES – Saga of the Beastslayer
Saga of the Beastslayer.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
Saga of the Beastslayer.target: One THUNDERWOLF CAVALRY unit from your army that has not been selected to move or declared a charge this phase.
Saga of the Beastslayer.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move, it can move through models (excluding TITANIC models) and sections of terrain features that are 4" or less in height. When doing so, it can move within Engagement Range of enemy models, but unless it is making a Charge move, it cannot end that move within Engagement Range of them.

Saga of the Bold.name: COUNTERCHARGE
Saga of the Bold.group: SPACE MARINES – Saga of the Bold
Saga of the Bold.when: End of your opponent’s Charge phase.
Saga of the Bold.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES CHARACTER unit from your army that is within 6" of one or more enemy units and would be eligible to declare a charge against one or more of those enemy units if it were your Charge phase.
Saga of the Bold.effect: Your unit now declares a charge that targets only one or more of those enemy units, and you resolve that charge as if it were your Charge phase. Note that even if this charge is successful, your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

Saga of the Bold.name: HEROIC RESOLVE
Saga of the Bold.group: SPACE MARINES – Saga of the Bold
Saga of the Bold.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Saga of the Bold.target: One SPACE WOLVES CHARACTER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Saga of the Bold.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to a model in your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

Saga of the Bold.name: ALPHA STRIKE
Saga of the Bold.group: SPACE MARINES – Saga of the Bold
Saga of the Bold.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES CHARACTER unit from your army.
Saga of the Bold.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

Saga of the Bold.name: BIRTH OF A SAGA
Saga of the Bold.group: SPACE MARINES – Saga of the Bold
Saga of the Bold.target: One Wolf Guard Headtaker or Wolf Guard Terminator Pack Leader model from your army.
Saga of the Bold.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, your model has the CHARACTER keyword. Designer’s Note: While in effect, your model’s unit is therefore a CHARACTER unit, meaning it can interact with the Heroes All rule, in addition to other rules that interact with CHARACTER units.

Saga of the Bold.name: CHAMPION’S GUIDANCE
Saga of the Bold.group: SPACE MARINES – Saga of the Bold
Saga of the Bold.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Saga of the Bold.target: One SPACE WOLVES CHARACTER unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Saga of the Bold.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

Saga of the Bold.name: INSPIRING PRESENCE
Saga of the Bold.group: SPACE MARINES – Saga of the Bold
Saga of the Bold.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES CHARACTER unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Saga of the Bold.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

Saga of the Hunter.name: OVERWHELMING ONSLAUGHT
Saga of the Hunter.group: SPACE MARINES – Saga of the Hunter
Saga of the Hunter.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Saga of the Hunter.target: Two ADEPTUS ASTARTES units from your army within Engagement Range of that enemy unit, or one SPACE WOLVES BEASTS unit from your army within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
Saga of the Hunter.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in that enemy unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

Saga of the Hunter.name: MARKED FOR DESTRUCTION
Saga of the Hunter.group: SPACE MARINES – Saga of the Hunter
Saga of the Hunter.target: Two ADEPTUS ASTARTES units from your army (excluding BEASTS) that have not been selected to shoot this phase.
Saga of the Hunter.effect: Select one enemy unit visible to both of your units. Until the end of the phase, models in your units can only target that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target) and each time a model in one of your units makes an attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1.

Saga of the Hunter.name: TERRITORIAL ADVANTAGE
Saga of the Hunter.group: SPACE MARINES – Saga of the Hunter
Saga of the Hunter.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit is destroyed by an ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army.
Saga of the Hunter.effect: Select one objective marker you control that your unit is within range of. That objective marker remains under your control until your opponent’s Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase.

Saga of the Hunter.name: CHOSEN PREY
Saga of the Hunter.group: SPACE MARINES – Saga of the Hunter
Saga of the Hunter.when: Your Movement phase, just after a SPACE WOLVES unit from your army Falls Back.
Saga of the Hunter.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

Saga of the Hunter.name: BOUNDING ADVANCE
Saga of the Hunter.group: SPACE MARINES – Saga of the Hunter
Saga of the Hunter.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
Saga of the Hunter.target: One SPACE WOLVES INFANTRY or SPACE WOLVES BEASTS unit from your army that has not been selected to move or declared a charge this phase.
Saga of the Hunter.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move, it can move through models (excluding TITANIC models). When doing so, it can move within Engagement Range of enemy models, but unless it is making a Charge move, it cannot end that move within Engagement Range of them.

Saga of the Hunter.name: HUNTERS’ TRAIL
Saga of the Hunter.group: SPACE MARINES – Saga of the Hunter
Saga of the Hunter.target: One SPACE WOLVES unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Saga of the Hunter.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile-in or Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3". When doing so, it does not need to end that move closer to the closest enemy model, provided it ends that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit.

Stormlance Task Force.name: RIDE HARD, RIDE FAST
Stormlance Task Force.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Stormlance Task Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED or ADEPTUS ASTARTES FLY VEHICLE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Stormlance Task Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll and subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

Stormlance Task Force.name: ARMOUR OF CONTEMPT
Stormlance Task Force.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Stormlance Task Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Stormlance Task Force.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Stormlance Task Force.name: BLITZING FUSILLADE
Stormlance Task Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Stormlance Task Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [ASSAULT] ability. If such a weapon already has this ability, until the end of the phase, that weapon has the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability as well.

Stormlance Task Force.name: SHOCK ASSAULT
Stormlance Task Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army that has not declared a charge this phase.
Stormlance Task Force.effect: Until the end of the turn, you can re-roll Charge rolls made for your unit and melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LANCE] ability.

Stormlance Task Force.name: WIND-SWIFT EVASION
Stormlance Task Force.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
Stormlance Task Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY or ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit.
Stormlance Task Force.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".
Stormlance Task Force.restrictions: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

Stormlance Task Force.name: FULL THROTTLE
Stormlance Task Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED or ADEPTUS ASTARTES VEHICLE unit (excluding WALKERS) from your army.
Stormlance Task Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, if your unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit, or 9" instead if your unit is MOUNTED.

Terminator Assault.name: CLEANSING SWEEP
Terminator Assault.when: Your opponent's Movement or Charge phase.
Terminator Assault.target: One TERMINATOR SQUAD unit from your army that has not fired Overwatch this phase.
Terminator Assault.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack while firing Overwatch, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ is required to score a hit, instead of an unmodified 6.

Terminator Assault.name: TOWER OF STRENGTH
Terminator Assault.when: Start or end of any phase.
Terminator Assault.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR unit from your army.
Terminator Assault.effect: Until the end of your next Command phase, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in your unit.
Terminator Assault.restrictions: Each time you use this Stratagem, you cannot use it again until after your next Command phase.

Terminator Assault.name: CARVE A PATH
Terminator Assault.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
Terminator Assault.target: One TERMINATOR ASSAULT SQUAD unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase and has not declared a charge this phase.
Terminator Assault.effect: Until the end of the phase, when making a Normal, Advance or Charge move, your unit can move through a single closed Hatchway as if it was open. When doing so, that Hatchway is opened and cannot be closed for the rest of the battle. This can allow that unit to declare a charge against enemy units that are not visible to it, but to do so those enemy units must be within 1" of that Hatchway and wholly on the opposite side of it from your unit.
Terminator Assault.restrictions: You cannot use this Stratagem more than once per turn.

Terminator Assault.name: FOCUSING SHRINE
Terminator Assault.when: Your Movement phase, at the start of the Reinforcements step.
Terminator Assault.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR unit from your army that is in Reserves.
Terminator Assault.effect: Until the end of the phase, when setting up your unit on the battlefield using its Deep Strike ability, you can set it up unit anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy models (measure this distance as you would normally for the Deep Strike ability, ignoring Walls and closed Hatchways).
Terminator Assault.restrictions: Until the end of the turn, your unit is not eligible to declare a charge.

The Angelic Host.name: MARTIAL EXEMPLARS
The Angelic Host.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES JUMP PACK unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
The Angelic Host.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LETHAL HITS] and [PRECISION] abilities.

The Angelic Host.name: ANGEL’S SACRIFICE
The Angelic Host.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES JUMP PACK unit from your army.
The Angelic Host.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy model within Engagement Range of your unit selects its targets, it must select your unit as the target of all of its attacks.

The Angelic Host.name: ARMOUR OF CONTEMPT
The Angelic Host.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
The Angelic Host.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
The Angelic Host.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

The Angelic Host.name: DEATH FROM THE SKIES
The Angelic Host.when: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTUS ASTARTES JUMP PACK unit from your army Advances or Falls Back.
The Angelic Host.target: That ADEPTUS ASTARTES JUMP PACK unit.
The Angelic Host.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back.

The Angelic Host.name: DESCENT OF ANGELS
The Angelic Host.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES JUMP PACK unit from your army that is arriving using the Deep Strike ability this phase.
The Angelic Host.effect: Your unit can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy units.
The Angelic Host.restrictions: A unit targeted by this Stratagem is not eligible to declare a charge in the same turn.

The Angelic Host.name: UNBRIDLED ARDOUR
The Angelic Host.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
The Angelic Host.effect: Until the end of the battle, each time a friendly SANGUINARY GUARD unit makes an attack that targets the enemy unit that just destroyed your unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

The Lost Brethren.name: LOST TO RAGE
The Lost Brethren.target: One DEATH COMPANY unit from your army that is below Starting Strength and has not been selected to fight this phase.
The Lost Brethren.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Attacks, Stength and Armour Penetration characteristics of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1 and, unless your unit is within 12" of one or more friendly CHAPLAIN models, until the end of the phase, those weapons have the [HAZARDOUS] ability.

The Lost Brethren.name: FURIOUS ONSLAUGHT
The Lost Brethren.target: One DEATH COMPANY unit from your army, just before that unit Piles-in.
The Lost Brethren.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile-in move, it can move up to D3+3" instead of up to 3". If your unit is within 12" of one or more friendly CHAPLAIN models, or if it is below Starting Strength, it can move up to 6" instead. In either case, it can only do so provided your unit ends that Pile-in move in Unit Coherency and within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

The Lost Brethren.name: ARMOUR OF CONTEMPT
The Lost Brethren.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
The Lost Brethren.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
The Lost Brethren.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

The Lost Brethren.name: GLORIOUS SACRIFICE
The Lost Brethren.target: One DEATH COMPANY unit from your army that was just destroyed while it was within range of an objective marker you controlled. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
The Lost Brethren.effect: That objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

The Lost Brethren.name: FINAL RETRIBUTION
The Lost Brethren.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
The Lost Brethren.target: One DEATH COMPANY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
The Lost Brethren.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if your unit is within 12" of one or more friendly CHAPLAIN models; on a 4+, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

The Lost Brethren.name: WRATHFUL RAMPAGE
The Lost Brethren.when: Your Movement phase, just after a DEATH COMPANY unit from your army Advances.
The Lost Brethren.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced. If your unit is within 12" of one or more friendly CHAPLAIN models, or it is below its Starting Strength, until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

Unforgiven Task Force.name: UNFORGIVEN FURY
Unforgiven Task Force.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Unforgiven Task Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Unforgiven Task Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability. In addition, if one or more ADEPTUS ASTARTES units from your army are currently Battle-shocked, until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

Unforgiven Task Force.name: UNBREAKABLE LINES
Unforgiven Task Force.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Charge move.
Unforgiven Task Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
Unforgiven Task Force.effect: Until the end of the turn, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

Unforgiven Task Force.name: ARMOUR OF CONTEMPT
Unforgiven Task Force.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Unforgiven Task Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Unforgiven Task Force.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Unforgiven Task Force.name: FIRE DISCIPLINE
Unforgiven Task Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Unforgiven Task Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [ASSAULT], [HEAVY] and [IGNORES COVER] abilities.

Unforgiven Task Force.name: GRIM RETRIBUTION
Unforgiven Task Force.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
Unforgiven Task Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that had one or more models destroyed as a result of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Unforgiven Task Force.effect: Your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but it must target the enemy unit that just attacked it, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

Unforgiven Task Force.name: INTRACTABLE
Unforgiven Task Force.when: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army Falls Back.
Unforgiven Task Force.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

Vanguard Spearhead.name: STRIKE FROM THE SHADOWS
Vanguard Spearhead.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Vanguard Spearhead.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit that is more than 12" away, improve the Ballistic Skill and Armour Penetration characteristics of that attack by 1. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as a result of those attacks, select one of those destroyed models; that destroyed model’s unit must take a Battle-shock test.

Vanguard Spearhead.name: ARMOUR OF CONTEMPT
Vanguard Spearhead.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Vanguard Spearhead.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Vanguard Spearhead.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Vanguard Spearhead.name: SURGICAL STRIKES
Vanguard Spearhead.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Vanguard Spearhead.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PRECISION] ability.

Vanguard Spearhead.name: CALCULATED FEINT
Vanguard Spearhead.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit declares a charge.
Vanguard Spearhead.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as a target of that charge.
Vanguard Spearhead.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6", or up to 6" instead if it is a PHOBOS or SCOUT SQUAD unit.
Vanguard Spearhead.restrictions: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

Vanguard Spearhead.name: GUERRILLA TACTICS
Vanguard Spearhead.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
Vanguard Spearhead.target: Up to two PHOBOS and/or SCOUT SQUAD units from your army, or one other ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army.
Vanguard Spearhead.effect: Remove those units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves.
Vanguard Spearhead.restrictions: Each unit selected for this Stratagem must be more than 3" away from all enemy models.

Vanguard Spearhead.name: A DEADLY PRIZE
Vanguard Spearhead.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY or ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army within range of an objective marker you control.
Vanguard Spearhead.effect: That objective marker is said to be Sabotaged, and remains under your control even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn. While an objective marker is Sabotaged and under your control, each time an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move within range of that objective marker, roll one D6: on a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

Vindication Task Force.name: LITANIES OF PURGATION
Vindication Task Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Vindication Task Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, if that model’s unit is within range of one or more objective markers or the target unit is within range of one or more objective markers, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Vindication Task Force.name: SPOOR OF THE UNHOLY
Vindication Task Force.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Vindication Task Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Vindication Task Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability and each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the following: that attack’s Ballistic Skill or Weapon Skill characteristic; the Hit roll.

Vindication Task Force.name: REFUSAL TO YIELD
Vindication Task Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Vindication Task Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile-in or Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3".
Vindication Task Force.restrictions: A unit cannot be targeted with this and the Hearts Hardened to Duty Stratagem in the same phase unless it has the CHAPLAIN or JUDICIAR keywords.

Vindication Task Force.name: RECLAIM OUR HONOUR!
Vindication Task Force.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit destroys an ANCIENT model from your army that has not been targeted with the Refusal to Yield Stratagem this phase.
Vindication Task Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army visible to that enemy unit.
Vindication Task Force.effect: Until the end of the battle, each time an ADEPTUS ASTARTES model from your army makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, add 1 to the Hit roll.
Vindication Task Force.restrictions: You cannot target that ANCIENT model with the Refusal to Yield Stratagem this phase.

Vindication Task Force.name: RECITATION OF THE REVERED
Vindication Task Force.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Vindication Task Force.target: One ANCIENT unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Vindication Task Force.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

Vindication Task Force.name: PERFERVID INTERVENTION
Vindication Task Force.when: End of your opponent’s Charge phase.
Vindication Task Force.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that is within 6" of one or more enemy units and would be eligible to declare a charge against one or more of those enemy units if it were your Charge phase.
Vindication Task Force.effect: Your unit now declares a charge that only targets one or more of those enemy units, and you resolve that charge.
Vindication Task Force.restrictions: Note that even if this charge is successful, your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

Wrath of the Rock.name: INESCAPABLE JUSTICE
Wrath of the Rock.group: SPACE MARINES – Wrath of the Rock
Wrath of the Rock.when: Any phase, just after your Oath of Moment target is destroyed.
Wrath of the Rock.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES CHARACTER unit that is on the battlefield.
Wrath of the Rock.effect: Select one enemy unit within 12" and visible to your unit. That enemy unit becomes your Oath of Moment target until the start of your next Command phase.

Wrath of the Rock.name: TACTICAL MASTERY
Wrath of the Rock.group: SPACE MARINES – Wrath of the Rock
Wrath of the Rock.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army.
Wrath of the Rock.effect: Your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced. If your unit has the RAVENWING keyword, it is also eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

Wrath of the Rock.name: ARMOUR OF CONTEMPT
Wrath of the Rock.group: SPACE MARINES – Wrath of the Rock
Wrath of the Rock.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Wrath of the Rock.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Wrath of the Rock.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Wrath of the Rock.name: RELICS OF THE DARK AGE
Wrath of the Rock.group: SPACE MARINES – Wrath of the Rock
Wrath of the Rock.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY or ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Wrath of the Rock.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 2 to the Strength characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit.

Wrath of the Rock.name: LEONINE AGGRESSION
Wrath of the Rock.group: SPACE MARINES – Wrath of the Rock
Wrath of the Rock.when: End of your opponent’s Charge phase.
Wrath of the Rock.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army within 3" of one or more enemy units, or one DEATHWING unit from your army within 6" of one or more enemy units.
Wrath of the Rock.effect: Your unit now declares a charge that only targets one or more of those enemy units, and you resolve that charge.
Wrath of the Rock.restrictions: Note that even if this charge is successful, your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

Wrath of the Rock.name: LION’S WILL
Wrath of the Rock.group: SPACE MARINES – Wrath of the Rock
Wrath of the Rock.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Wrath of the Rock.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in your unit. In addition, until the end of the turn, if your unit does not have the DEATHWING, RAVENWING or VEHICLE keyword, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

Wrathful Procession.name: FUELLED BY FAITH
Wrathful Procession.when: Any phase, just after a mortal wound is allocated to an ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army.
Wrathful Procession.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against mortal wounds.

Wrathful Procession.name: ARMOUR OF CONTEMPT
Wrathful Procession.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Wrathful Procession.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Wrathful Procession.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Wrathful Procession.name: CASTIGATE THE DEMAGOGUES
Wrathful Procession.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Wrathful Procession.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PRECISION] ability.

Wrathful Procession.name: BRUTE FERVOUR
Wrathful Procession.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Wrathful Procession.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and you can ignore any or all modifiers to the following: that attack’s Weapon Skill characteristic; the Hit roll; the Wound roll.

Wrathful Procession.name: RELENTLESS MOMENTUM
Wrathful Procession.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase and is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Wrathful Procession.effect: Until the end of the phase, when determining which models in your unit are eligible to fight, any models in it that are within 3" of one or more enemy models are eligible to fight. When resolving those attacks, such models can target one of those enemy units that is within 3" of them and within Engagement Range of their unit.

Wrathful Procession.name: VOICE OF DEVOTION
Wrathful Procession.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY or ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army.
Wrathful Procession.effect: Select the Chorus of Relentless Hate, Rite of Perfervid Wrath or Chant of Deathless Devotion Litany. Until the end of the battle round, that Litany is active for your unit instead of any other Litany that is active for your army.

Sudden Dawn Cadre.name: Fight by the Code
Sudden Dawn Cadre.target: One T’au Empire unit from your army.
Sudden Dawn Cadre.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back.

Sudden Dawn Cadre.name: Rampart of Fire
Sudden Dawn Cadre.target: One T’au Empire unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Sudden Dawn Cadre.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets an enemy unit within 10", improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Sudden Dawn Cadre.name: Lives Before Territory
Sudden Dawn Cadre.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Sudden Dawn Cadre.target: One T’au Empire Infantry or T’au Empire Battlesuit unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Sudden Dawn Cadre.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6" and, until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, it has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

Auxiliary Cadre.name: MULTISENSORY SCANNING
Auxiliary Cadre.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Auxiliary Cadre.target: One T’AU EMPIRE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Auxiliary Cadre.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1. If it is a KROOT or VESPID STINGWINGS unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.

Auxiliary Cadre.name: ALIEN EXPERTISE
Auxiliary Cadre.target: One T’AU EMPIRE unit from your army.
Auxiliary Cadre.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Advanced. If it is a KROOT or VESPID STINGWINGS unit, until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced as well.

Auxiliary Cadre.name: GUIDED FIRE
Auxiliary Cadre.target: One T’AU EMPIRE unit from your army (excluding KROOT and VESPID STINGWINGS units) that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Auxiliary Cadre.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Strength characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit. If your unit is wholly within 9" of one or more KROOT or VESPID STINGWINGS units from your army, add 2 to the Strength characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit instead.

Auxiliary Cadre.name: INTERLOCKING MANOUEVRES
Auxiliary Cadre.target: One T’AU EMPIRE unit from your army that was eligible to fight this phase.
Auxiliary Cadre.effect: If your unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 6". Otherwise, your unit can make a Fall Back move. It cannot embark within a TRANSPORT at the end of this move if it disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn.

Auxiliary Cadre.name: PHEROMONE WAYPOINTS
Auxiliary Cadre.target: One KROOT or VESPID STINGWINGS unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
Auxiliary Cadre.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.

Auxiliary Cadre.name: EXPERIMENTAL MODIFICATIONS
Auxiliary Cadre.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Auxiliary Cadre.target: One KROOT or VESPID STINGWINGS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Auxiliary Cadre.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1.

Experimental Prototype Cadre.name: REACTIVE IMPACT DAMPENERS
Experimental Prototype Cadre.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Experimental Prototype Cadre.target: One T’AU EMPIRE BATTLESUIT unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Experimental Prototype Cadre.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

Experimental Prototype Cadre.name: EXPERIMENTAL WEAPONRY
Experimental Prototype Cadre.target: One T’AU EMPIRE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Experimental Prototype Cadre.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time you roll one or more dice to determine the number of attacks made with a weapon equipped by a model in your unit, you can re-roll the result.

Experimental Prototype Cadre.name: AUTOMATED REPAIR DRONES
Experimental Prototype Cadre.target: One T’AU EMPIRE BATTLESUIT unit from your army.
Experimental Prototype Cadre.effect: Select one BATTLESUIT model in your unit: that model regains up to D3+1 lost wounds.

Experimental Prototype Cadre.name: EXPERIMENTAL AMMUNITION
Experimental Prototype Cadre.target: One T’AU EMPIRE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Experimental Prototype Cadre.effect: Select one of the following to apply to your unit until the end of the phase: Improve the Strength characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1.Improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1, and those weapons have the [HAZARDOUS] ability.
Experimental Prototype Cadre.restrictions: You cannot target the same unit with the Experimental Ammunition and Threat Assessment Analyser Stratagems in the same phase.

Experimental Prototype Cadre.name: NEUROWEB SYSTEM JAMMER
Experimental Prototype Cadre.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Experimental Prototype Cadre.target: One T’AU EMPIRE CRISIS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Experimental Prototype Cadre.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 18".

Experimental Prototype Cadre.name: THREAT ASSESSMENT ANALYSER
Experimental Prototype Cadre.target: One T’AU EMPIRE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Experimental Prototype Cadre.effect: Select the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] or [LETHAL HITS] ability. Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the selected ability. You can instead select the [SUSTAINED HITS 1], [LETHAL HITS] and [HAZARDOUS] abilities to apply to those weapons until the end of the phase.
Experimental Prototype Cadre.restrictions: You cannot target the same unit with the Experimental Ammunition and Threat Assessment Analyser Stratagems in the same phase.

Kauyon.name: WALL OF MIRRORS
Kauyon.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
Kauyon.target: One STEALTH, GHOSTKEEL or COMMANDER SHADOWSUN unit from your army.
Kauyon.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.
Kauyon.restrictions: You cannot target a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

Kauyon.name: A TEMPTING TRAP
Kauyon.target: One T’AU EMPIRE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase. The first time you use this Stratagem, you must also select one objective marker that is not in your opponent’s deployment zone; until the end of the battle, this becomes your Trap objective marker.
Kauyon.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit within range of your Trap objective marker, add 1 to the Wound roll.
Kauyon.restrictions: You cannot use this Stratagem during the first or second battle rounds.

Kauyon.name: COORDINATE TO ENGAGE
Kauyon.target: One T’AU EMPIRE unit from your army that has just been selected as an Observer unit (see For the Greater Good).
Kauyon.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets their Spotted unit, improve the Ballistic Skill characteristic of that attack by 1 and, if your unit has the MARKERLIGHT keyword, that attack has the [IGNORES COVER] ability.

Kauyon.name: POINT-BLANK AMBUSH
Kauyon.target: One T’AU EMPIRE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Kauyon.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit within 9", improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.
Kauyon.restrictions: You cannot use this Stratagem during the first or second battle rounds.

Kauyon.name: PHOTON GRENADES
Kauyon.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit has declared a charge.
Kauyon.target: One T’AU EMPIRE GRENADES unit from your army that was selected as one of the targets of that charge.
Kauyon.effect: That enemy unit must immediately take a Battle-shock test, and until the end of the phase, subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for that enemy unit.

Kauyon.name: COMBAT EMBARKATION
Kauyon.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit has declared a charge.
Kauyon.target: One T’AU EMPIRE INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as one of the targets of that charge, and one friendly TRANSPORT.
Kauyon.effect: Your unit can embark within that TRANSPORT. If it does, your opponent can select new targets for that charge.
Kauyon.restrictions: Every model in your T’AU EMPIRE INFANTRY unit must be within 3" of that TRANSPORT and there must be sufficient transport capacity to embark the entire unit.

Kroot Hunting Pack.name: A TRAP WELL LAID
Kroot Hunting Pack.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Kroot Hunting Pack.target: One KROOT unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Kroot Hunting Pack.effect: After your unit has resolved its attacks this phase, select one enemy unit that was hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the phase, each time a KROOT model from your army makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, unless the attacking unit is Battle-shocked, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Kroot Hunting Pack.name: JOIN THE HUNT
Kroot Hunting Pack.target: One KROOT INFANTRY or KROOT HOUNDS unit from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
Kroot Hunting Pack.effect: Add a new unit to your army identical to your destroyed unit, in Strategic Reserves, at its Starting Strength.
Kroot Hunting Pack.restrictions: This Stratagem cannot be used to return destroyed CHARACTER units to Attached units. You can only use this Stratagem once per battle.

Kroot Hunting Pack.name: THE GRISLY FEAST
Kroot Hunting Pack.target: One KROOT unit from your army that destroyed one or more enemy units this phase.
Kroot Hunting Pack.effect: In your opponent’s next Command phase, each enemy unit within 6" of your unit must take a Battle-shock test. If the unit taking that test is Below Half-strength, subtract 1 from that test. Enemy units affected by this Stratagem do not need to take any other Battle-shock tests in the same phase.

Kroot Hunting Pack.name: GUERRILLA WARRIORS
Kroot Hunting Pack.when: Your Movement phase, just after a KROOT unit from your army Falls Back.
Kroot Hunting Pack.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge.

Kroot Hunting Pack.name: HIDDEN HUNTERS
Kroot Hunting Pack.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Kroot Hunting Pack.target: One KROOT unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Kroot Hunting Pack.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 18".

Kroot Hunting Pack.name: EMP GRENADES
Kroot Hunting Pack.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy VEHICLE unit is selected to shoot or fight.
Kroot Hunting Pack.target: One KROOT GRENADES unit from your army within 8" of that enemy VEHICLE unit.
Kroot Hunting Pack.effect: Until the end of the phase, worsen the Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill characteristics of that enemy VEHICLE unit’s weapons by 1.

Kroot Raiding Party.name: BOARDING BLADES
Kroot Raiding Party.target: One KROOT unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Kroot Raiding Party.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1. In addition, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, on a Critical Wound, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by an additional 1.

Kroot Raiding Party.name: SWEEPING AMBUSH
Kroot Raiding Party.target: One KROOT unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Kroot Raiding Party.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile-in or Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3". In addition, when making a Consolidation move, that model can end that move within Engagement Range of the closest enemy unit that was not visible to its unit when it started that move.

Kroot Raiding Party.name: BRUTE FORCE
Kroot Raiding Party.when: Your Movement phase, just after a KROOTOX RIDERS unit from your army opens a Hatchway.
Kroot Raiding Party.effect: Roll one D6 for each unit that is within 3" of that Hatchway, if that Hatchway is visible to that unit and that unit is wholly on the opposite side of it from your unit: on a 2-4, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound; on a 5+, that enemy unit suffers 2 mortal wounds.

Kroot Raiding Party.name: TANGLEBOMB BOLAS
Kroot Raiding Party.target: One KROOT unit from your army.
Kroot Raiding Party.effect: Select one enemy unit within 9" of and visible to your unit and roll one D6: on a 2+, until the start of your next Shooting phase, halve the Move characteristic of models in that enemy unit and halve Advance and Charge rolls made for it.

Mont’ka.name: COMBAT DEBARKATION
Mont’ka.target: One T’AU EMPIRE INFANTRY unit from your army that disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn.
Mont’ka.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets the closest enemy unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

Mont’ka.name: FOCUSED FIRE
