Mont’ka.target: Two T’AU EMPIRE units from your army that have not been selected to shoot this phase, and one enemy unit.
Mont’ka.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in either of your units makes an attack, it can only target that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target for that attack), and when resolving that attack, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic by 1.
Mont’ka.restrictions: You cannot use this Stratagem during the fourth or fifth battle rounds.

Mont’ka.name: PINPOINT COUNTER-OFFENSIVE
Mont’ka.target: One T’AU EMPIRE unit (excluding KROOT units) from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
Mont’ka.effect: Until the end of the battle, each time a T’AU EMPIRE unit (excluding KROOT units) from your army makes an attack that targets the enemy unit that just destroyed your unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

Mont’ka.name: AGGRESSIVE MOBILITY
Mont’ka.target: One T’AU EMPIRE unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
Mont’ka.effect: Until the end of the phase, if your unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.

Mont’ka.name: PULSE ONSLAUGHT
Mont’ka.target: One T’AU EMPIRE INFANTRY unit (excluding KROOT units) from your army that has just shot, and one enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) hit by one or more of those attacks.
Mont’ka.effect: Until the end of your opponent’s next turn, that enemy unit is shaken. While a unit is shaken, subtract 2 from its Move characteristic and subtract 2 from Advance and Charge rolls made for it.

Mont’ka.name: COUNTERFIRE DEFENCE SYSTEMS
Mont’ka.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Mont’ka.target: One T’AU EMPIRE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Mont’ka.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

Retaliation Cadre.name: THE ARRO’KON PROTOCOL
Retaliation Cadre.target: One T’AU EMPIRE BATTLESUIT unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Retaliation Cadre.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets an enemy unit that contains 6 or more models, that attack has the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. If that attack targets an enemy unit that contains 11 or more models, it has the [SUSTAINED HITS 2] ability instead.

Retaliation Cadre.name: FAIL-SAFE DETONATOR
Retaliation Cadre.when: Any phase, just after a T’AU EMPIRE BATTLESUIT model from your army is destroyed.
Retaliation Cadre.target: That destroyed model’s unit. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even if that unit was just destroyed.
Retaliation Cadre.effect: Before removing your model from play, if it has the Deadly Demise ability, do not roll for that ability; instead, you can choose whether the result of that roll is a 1 or a 6. If your model does not have the Deadly Demise ability, roll one D6 for each unit within 6" of it: on a 4+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

Retaliation Cadre.name: THE SHORTENED BLADE
Retaliation Cadre.target: One T’AU EMPIRE BATTLESUIT unit from your army that is arriving using the Deep Strike ability this phase.
Retaliation Cadre.effect: Your unit can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy models.
Retaliation Cadre.restrictions: A unit targeted with this Stratagem is not eligible to declare a charge in the same turn.

Retaliation Cadre.name: GRAV-INHIBITOR FIELD
Retaliation Cadre.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit has declared a charge.
Retaliation Cadre.target: One T’AU EMPIRE BATTLESUIT unit from your army that was selected as a target of that charge.
Retaliation Cadre.effect: That enemy unit must immediately take a Battle-shock test and you must roll one D6 for each model in that enemy unit: for each 6, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

Retaliation Cadre.name: THE TORCHSTAR GAMBIT
Retaliation Cadre.target: One T’AU EMPIRE BATTLESUIT unit from your army that can FLY whose attacks have been resolved this phase.
Retaliation Cadre.effect: If your unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move. If it does, your unit cannot declare a charge this turn

Retaliation Cadre.name: STIMM INJECTORS
Retaliation Cadre.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Retaliation Cadre.target: One T’AU EMPIRE BATTLESUIT unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Retaliation Cadre.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability.

Starfire Cadre.name: RESPONSIVE VOLLEY
Starfire Cadre.when: Your Movement phase, just after a FIRE WARRIOR or PATHFINDER TEAM unit from your army opens a Hatchway.
Starfire Cadre.target: That FIRE WARRIOR or PATHFINDER TEAM unit.
Starfire Cadre.effect: Until the end of the turn, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit wholly on the opposite side of that Hatchway from them, a Critical Hit is scored on an unmodified Hit roll of 5+, instead of only a 6.

Starfire Cadre.name: PULSE BARRAGE
Starfire Cadre.when: Your opponent’s Movement or Charge phase.
Starfire Cadre.target: One FIRE WARRIOR or PATHFINDER TEAM unit from your army that has not fired Overwatch this phase.
Starfire Cadre.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack while firing Overwatch, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ is required to score a hit, instead of an unmodified 6.

Starfire Cadre.name: RETREATING FIRE
Starfire Cadre.target: One FIRE WARRIOR or PATHFINDER TEAM unit from your army.
Starfire Cadre.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back.

Starfire Cadre.name: FIRING LINE
Starfire Cadre.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit destroys a T’AU EMPIRE unit from your army.
Starfire Cadre.target: One FIRE WARRIOR or PATHFINDER TEAM unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, has not fired Overwatch this turn and is within 9" of that enemy unit.
Starfire Cadre.effect: Your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but when doing so, models in your unit can only target that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target) and, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ is required to score a hit.

The Coven Temporus.name: Wreathed in Warpflame
The Coven Temporus.target: One Thousand Sons unit from your army (excluding Tzaangors units) that has not been selected to fight this phase.
The Coven Temporus.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability and each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a Monster or Vehicle unit, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

The Coven Temporus.name: Mutant Cunning
The Coven Temporus.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
The Coven Temporus.target: One Tzaangors unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
The Coven Temporus.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6" and, until the end of the phase, each time a ranged attack targets your unit, models in your unit have the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

The Coven Temporus.name: Malign Entanglement
The Coven Temporus.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit has declared a charge.
The Coven Temporus.target: One Thousand Sons unit from your army that was selected as a target of that charge.
The Coven Temporus.effect: Until the end of the phase, subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for that enemy unit.

Changehost of Deceit.name: SULPHUROUS VEIL
Changehost of Deceit.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Changehost of Deceit.target: One THOUSAND SONS or SCINTILLATING LEGIONS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Changehost of Deceit.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

Changehost of Deceit.name: ETHEREAL PHANTASM
Changehost of Deceit.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
Changehost of Deceit.target: One SCINTILLATING LEGIONS unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Changehost of Deceit.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6", or a Normal move of up to 6" instead if it is wholly within 6" of one or more friendly THOUSAND SONS units.

Changehost of Deceit.name: CHRONOSORCEROUS BLEED
Changehost of Deceit.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit has declared a charge.
Changehost of Deceit.target: One THOUSAND SONS PSYKER or SCINTILLATING LEGIONS unit from your army that was selected as a target of that charge.
Changehost of Deceit.effect: Until the end of the phase, subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for that enemy unit (this is not cumulative with any other negative modifiers to that Charge roll).

Changehost of Deceit.name: DECEPTIVE GLAMOUR
Changehost of Deceit.target: One THOUSAND SONS unit from your army.
Changehost of Deceit.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy model within Engagement Range of your unit selects targets for its attacks, it can only target your unit if there are no eligible SCINTILLATING LEGIONS targets for those attacks.

Changehost of Deceit.name: FRACTAL DISJUNCTION
Changehost of Deceit.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Changehost of Deceit.target: One SCINTILLATING LEGIONS unit from your army (excluding MONSTERS) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Changehost of Deceit.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 18".

Changehost of Deceit.name: GLIMMERSHIFT PORTAL
Changehost of Deceit.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
Changehost of Deceit.target: Up to two SCINTILLATING LEGIONS units from your army (excluding MONSTERS), or one SCINTILLATING LEGIONS MONSTER unit from your army, if all of those units are more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy units.
Changehost of Deceit.effect: Remove those units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves.

Chosen Cabal.name: TZEENTCH’S BOON
Chosen Cabal.target: One THOUSAND SONS PSYKER model from your army within range of an objective marker that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Chosen Cabal.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your model makes a Psychic Attack, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

Chosen Cabal.name: EMPYRIC DESECRATION
Chosen Cabal.target: One THOUSAND SONS PSYKER CHARACTER model from your army.
Chosen Cabal.effect: Select one objective marker Secured by your opponent’s army that is within 6" of and visible to your model, then roll one D6: on a 2+, that objective marker is no longer considered Secured by your opponent’s army.

Chosen Cabal.name: COSTLY BLESSING
Chosen Cabal.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Chosen Cabal.target: One THOUSAND SONS PSYKER CHARACTER model from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Chosen Cabal.effect: Until the end of the phase, your model has a 3+ invulnerable save. At the end of the phase, your model suffers D3 mortal wounds.

Chosen Cabal.name: INFERNO BOLTERS
Chosen Cabal.target: One RUBRIC MARINES or SCARAB OCCULT TERMINATORS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Chosen Cabal.effect: Select one closed Hatchway. Until the end of the phase, models in your unit can make attacks with ranged weapons (excluding Torrent weapons) that target enemy units within 1" of that Hatchway and that are wholly on the opposite side of it from your unit, as if that Hatchway was open. Each time a model does so, that attack has an Armour Penetration characteristic of 0.

Devoted Thralls.name: FLESH CHANGE
Devoted Thralls.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Devoted Thralls.target: One TZAANGORS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Devoted Thralls.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

Devoted Thralls.name: PSYCHIC INGRESS
Devoted Thralls.target: One THOUSAND SONS PSYKER CHARACTER model from your army.
Devoted Thralls.effect: Open every Hatchway within 3" of your model. When measuring this distance, ignore Walls and closed Hatchways.
Devoted Thralls.restrictions: You can only use this Stratagem once.

Devoted Thralls.name: BESTIAL SURGE
Devoted Thralls.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
Devoted Thralls.target: One TZAANGORS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Devoted Thralls.effect: Your unit can make a Bestial Surge move. To do so, roll one D6: your unit can be moved a distance in inches up to the result, but must end that move as close as possible to the attacking unit. When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit, but only that enemy unit.

Devoted Thralls.name: FELL SACRIFICE
Devoted Thralls.when: Your opponent’s Command phase, at the start of the Battle-shock step.
Devoted Thralls.target: One THOUSAND SONS CHARACTER or TZAANGORS unit from your army.
Devoted Thralls.effect: Select one enemy unit below its Starting Strength that is within Engagement Range of your unit. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test. If that enemy unit is also Below Half-strength, subtract 1 from that test. This Enhancement cannot cause a unit to take two Battle-shock tests in the same phase.

Fateseekers.name: INVISIBLE ASSAILANTS
Fateseekers.when: Start of your opponent’s Movement phase.
Fateseekers.target: One THOUSAND SONS PSYKER model from your army.
Fateseekers.effect: Select one enemy unit visible to your model. That unit must take a Leadership test, subtracting 1 from the result: if failed, until the start of your opponent’s next Movement phase, subtract 2" from the Move characteristic of models in that unit and subtract 2 from Advance and Charge rolls made for it; if passed, subtract 1" from the Move characteristic of models in that unit and subtract 1 from Advance and Charge rolls made for it.

Fateseekers.name: PHANTASMIC MUNITIONS
Fateseekers.target: One THOUSAND SONS PSYKER unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Fateseekers.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit can ignore enemy models for the purposes of determining visibility.

Fateseekers.name: STRATEGIC VISION
Fateseekers.target: One THOUSAND SONS PSYKER unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Fateseekers.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PISTOL] ability, and models in your unit can target enemy units that are not within Engagement Range of them (as long as they are otherwise eligible targets).

Fateseekers.name: ENDURING ANIMUS
Fateseekers.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Fateseekers.target: One THOUSAND SONS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Fateseekers.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6. On a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

Grand Coven.name: DEVASTATING SORCERY
Grand Coven.target: One THOUSAND SONS PSYKER unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Grand Coven.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 9" to the Range characteristic of Psychic weapons equipped by models in your unit, and each time a model in your unit makes an attack with a Psychic weapon, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

Grand Coven.name: PSYCHIC DOMINION
Grand Coven.when: Any phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Grand Coven.target: One THOUSAND SONS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Grand Coven.effect: Until the end of the phase, Psychic weapons equipped by models in the attacking unit have the [hazardous] ability, and models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against Psychic Attacks.

Grand Coven.name: DESECRATION OF WORLDS
Grand Coven.target: One THOUSAND SONS PSYKER unit from your army within range of an objective marker you control.
Grand Coven.effect: That objective marker remains under your control until your opponent’s Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase.

Grand Coven.name: ARCANE FOCUS
Grand Coven.when: Your Shooting phase, just after you take a Psychic test for a THOUSAND SONS model from your army that Channelled the Warp (before resolving that Ritual).
Grand Coven.effect: Re-roll all of the D6 rolled for that Psychic test (including the additional D6 for Channelling the Warp).

Grand Coven.name: DESTINED BY FATE
Grand Coven.when: Any phase, just after a saving throw is failed for a THOUSAND SONS PSYKER model from your army. If you are using fast dice rolling, this Stratagem can still be used after rolling multiple saving throws at once.
Grand Coven.effect: Change the Damage characteristic of that attack to 0. If you are using fast dice rolling, select one of those attacks you failed a saving throw for.

Grand Coven.name: EGOTISTICAL POWER
Grand Coven.target: One THOUSAND SONS PSYKER unit from your army.
Grand Coven.effect: Select the Imbued Manifestation, Psychic Maelstrom or Wrath of the Immaterium ability. Until the start of your next Command phase, that ability applies to your unit instead of any other Kindred Sorcery ability, even if you have already selected that ability this battle.

Hexwarp Thrallband.name: KALEIDOSCOPIC TEMPEST
Hexwarp Thrallband.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Hexwarp Thrallband.target: One THOUSAND SONS PSYKER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Hexwarp Thrallband.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit has the Stealth ability, and, if your unit is wholly within your army’s Flow of Magic, each time an attack targets your unit, it has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

Hexwarp Thrallband.name: WARDING HEX
Hexwarp Thrallband.target: One THOUSAND SONS PSYKER unit from your army within range of an objective marker you control, if that objective marker is wholly within your army’s Flow of Magic.
Hexwarp Thrallband.effect: That objective marker remains under your control until your opponent’s Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase.

Hexwarp Thrallband.name: THROUGH THE VEIL
Hexwarp Thrallband.when: Start of the Reinforcements step of your Movement phase.
Hexwarp Thrallband.target: One RUBRIC MARINES or SCARAB OCCULT TERMINATORS unit from your army that is in Strategic Reserves.
Hexwarp Thrallband.effect: If it is a RUBRIC MARINES unit, until the end of the phase, it has the Deep Strike ability. When your unit is set up on the battlefield using the Deep Strike ability, if it is a SCARAB OCCULT TERMINATOR unit it can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is wholly within your army’s Flow of Magic and more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy models.
Hexwarp Thrallband.restrictions: If a SCARAB OCCULT TERMINATORS unit is targeted with this Stratagem, it is not eligible to declare a charge in the same turn.

Hexwarp Thrallband.name: WRATH OF THE DOOMED
Hexwarp Thrallband.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Hexwarp Thrallband.target: One THOUSAND SONS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Hexwarp Thrallband.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if your unit is wholly within your army’s Flow of Magic: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. That destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

Hexwarp Thrallband.name: STRANDS OF TIME
Hexwarp Thrallband.when: Your Movement phase, just after a THOUSAND SONS PSYKER unit from your army Falls Back.
Hexwarp Thrallband.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot or declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back. If your unit is wholly within your army’s Flow of Magic when it is targeted with this Stratagem, then until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

Hexwarp Thrallband.name: SCOURING WARPFLAME
Hexwarp Thrallband.target: One THOUSAND SONS PSYKER unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase and is wholly within your army’s Flow of Magic.
Hexwarp Thrallband.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability. After your unit has shot this phase, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the phase, models in that unit cannot have the Benefit of Cover.

Rubricae Phalanx.name: UNWAVERING PHALANX
Rubricae Phalanx.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Charge move.
Rubricae Phalanx.target: One RUBRIC MARINES unit from your army within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
Rubricae Phalanx.effect: Until the end of the turn, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

Rubricae Phalanx.name: REVENGE OF THE RUBRICAE
Rubricae Phalanx.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after a THOUSAND SONS PSYKER model from your army is destroyed.
Rubricae Phalanx.target: One RUBRICAE unit from your army that was within 6" of that PSYKER model when it was destroyed.
Rubricae Phalanx.effect: After the attacking unit has shot, your RUBRICAE unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but when resolving those attacks it can only target the enemy unit that just destroyed your PSYKER model (and only if it is an eligible target).

Rubricae Phalanx.name: ARDENT AUTOMATA
Rubricae Phalanx.when: Your Movement phase, just after a RUBRICAE unit from your army Falls Back.
Rubricae Phalanx.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

Rubricae Phalanx.name: INEXORABLE ADVANCE
Rubricae Phalanx.target: One RUBRICAE unit from your army.
Rubricae Phalanx.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit can ignore any or all modifiers to its Move characteristic and to Advance rolls made for it, and ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [ASSAULT] ability.

Rubricae Phalanx.name: IMPLACABLE GUARDIANS
Rubricae Phalanx.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Rubricae Phalanx.target: One RUBRIC MARINES PSYKER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Rubricae Phalanx.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to a model in your unit (excluding PSYKER models), subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

Rubricae Phalanx.name: INFERNAL FUSILLADE
Rubricae Phalanx.target: One THOUSAND SONS PSYKER unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Rubricae Phalanx.effect: Until the end of the phase, all inferno bolt pistols, inferno boltguns, inferno combi-bolters and inferno combi-weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PSYCHIC] ability and a Strength characteristic of 5.

Warpforged Cabal.name: ENSORCELLED INFUSION
Warpforged Cabal.target: One THOUSAND SONS VEHICLE unit from your army within 6" of one or more friendly THOUSAND SONS PSYKER units.
Warpforged Cabal.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by VEHICLE models in your unit have the [PSYCHIC] ability and each time an attack is made with such a weapon, add 1 to the Wound roll.

Warpforged Cabal.name: HEX-MARKED ARMOUR
Warpforged Cabal.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Warpforged Cabal.target: One THOUSAND SONS VEHICLE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Warpforged Cabal.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Warpforged Cabal.name: MUTATE LANDSCAPE
Warpforged Cabal.target: One THOUSAND SONS PSYKER unit from your army within range of an objective marker you control.
Warpforged Cabal.effect: That objective marker is mutated, and remains under your control until your opponent’s Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase. While an objective marker is mutated and under your control, each time an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move within range of that objective marker, roll one D6: on a 4+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

Warpforged Cabal.name: MALEVOLENT ANIMUS
Warpforged Cabal.target: One THOUSAND SONS VEHICLE unit from your army within 6" of one or more friendly THOUSAND SONS PSYKER units.
Warpforged Cabal.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, your VEHICLE unit is malevolent. While a unit is malevolent, it can ignore any or all modifiers to the following: the profile characteristics of its models; the Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill characteristics of weapons equipped by its models; any roll or test made for it (excluding modifiers to saving throws).

Warpforged Cabal.name: CYBERSPIRIT MACHINATIONS
Warpforged Cabal.when: Your Movement phase, just after a THOUSAND SONS VEHICLE unit from your army Falls Back.
Warpforged Cabal.target: That VEHICLE unit, and one friendly THOUSAND SONS PSYKER unit within 6" of that VEHICLE unit.
Warpforged Cabal.effect: Until the end of the turn, your VEHICLE unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

Warpforged Cabal.name: WARPFLAME GARGOYLES
Warpforged Cabal.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Charge move.
Warpforged Cabal.target: One THOUSAND SONS VEHICLE unit from your army within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
Warpforged Cabal.effect: Roll six D6: for each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound. That enemy unit must then take a Battle-shock test.

Warpmeld Pact.name: GIFT OF CHANGE
Warpmeld Pact.target: One THOUSAND SONS CHARACTER model from your army (excluding MONSTERS) that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.
Warpmeld Pact.effect: At the end of the phase, add one TZEENTCH CHAOS SPAWN unit containing one model to your army, and set it up as close as possible to where your model was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Warpmeld Pact.restrictions: You can only use this Stratagem once per battle round.

Warpmeld Pact.name: TWISTED MIRAGE
Warpmeld Pact.when: Reinforcements step of your Movement phase.
Warpmeld Pact.target: One TZEENTCH MUTANT unit from your army that is arriving from Strategic Reserves this phase.
Warpmeld Pact.effect: Your unit can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy units, or anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy units if it is a MONSTER unit. In either case, until the end of the turn, it is not eligible to declare a charge.

Warpmeld Pact.name: TOUCHED BY TZEENTCH
Warpmeld Pact.target: One TZEENTCH MUTANT unit from your army.
Warpmeld Pact.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot or declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

Warpmeld Pact.name: BLESSED TRANSMUTATIONS
Warpmeld Pact.target: One THOUSAND SONS PSYKER model from your army, and one friendly TZAANGORS unit that is below its Starting Strength and within 12" of that PSYKER model.
Warpmeld Pact.effect: Return up to D3+1 destroyed models (excluding CHARACTERS) to your TZAANGORS unit.

Warpmeld Pact.name: DERANGED FEROCITY
Warpmeld Pact.when: Fight phase, just after a TZEENTCH MUTANT unit from your army is selected to fight.
Warpmeld Pact.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile-in or Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3", and when determining which models in it are eligible to fight, any models in it that are within 3" of one or more enemy models are eligible to fight. When resolving those attacks, such models can target one of those enemy units that is within 3" of them and within Engagement Range of their unit.

Warpmeld Pact.name: WARPED VICISSITUDE
Warpmeld Pact.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Warpmeld Pact.target: One TZAANGORS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Warpmeld Pact.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.

The Vardenghast Swarm.name: Hyper‑Reactive
The Vardenghast Swarm.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
The Vardenghast Swarm.target: One Tyranids Infantry unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
The Vardenghast Swarm.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

The Vardenghast Swarm.name: Voracious Assault
The Vardenghast Swarm.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
The Vardenghast Swarm.target: One Tyranids unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
The Vardenghast Swarm.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets the closest eligible target, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

The Vardenghast Swarm.name: Teeming Broods
The Vardenghast Swarm.when: The Reinforcements step of your Movement phase.
The Vardenghast Swarm.target: One Termagants unit from your army. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even if it is destroyed.
The Vardenghast Swarm.effect: If your unit is not destroyed, return up to D6 destroyed models to it. Otherwise, add a new unit to your army identical to your destroyed unit, in Strategic Reserves, containing 2D6 models.

Assimilation Swarm.name: RAPACIOUS HUNGER
Assimilation Swarm.target: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that just destroyed an enemy unit.
Assimilation Swarm.effect: Your unit immediately Regenerates (See Feed the Swarm). When doing so, if your unit is a HARVESTER unit and you choose for one model to regain up to D3 lost wounds, that model regains up to 3 lost wounds instead.

Assimilation Swarm.name: ABLATIVE CARAPACE
Assimilation Swarm.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Assimilation Swarm.target: One HARVESTER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Assimilation Swarm.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability. If your unit is within range of an objective marker you control, until the end of the phase models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability instead.

Assimilation Swarm.name: BROODGUARD IMPULSE
Assimilation Swarm.target: One HARVESTER unit from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
Assimilation Swarm.effect: Until the end of the battle, each time a friendly TYRANIDS model makes an attack that targets the enemy unit that just destroyed your HARVESTER unit, add 1 to the Wound roll.

Assimilation Swarm.name: SECURE BIOMASS
Assimilation Swarm.target: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Assimilation Swarm.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability. If your unit is a HARVESTER unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit as well.

Assimilation Swarm.name: TYRANNOFORMED
Assimilation Swarm.target: One HARVESTER unit from your army that is within range of an objective marker you control.
Assimilation Swarm.effect: That objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

Assimilation Swarm.name: RECLAIM BIOMASS
Assimilation Swarm.when: Any phase, when a TYRANIDS unit from your army is destroyed, before the last model in it is removed from play.
Assimilation Swarm.target: One HARVESTER unit from your army that is within 6" of that destroyed unit.
Assimilation Swarm.effect: Regenerate one friendly TYRANIDS unit within 6" of your HARVESTER unit (See Feed the Swarm).

Biotide.name: SWARM HUNTERS
Biotide.target: One TERMAGANTS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Biotide.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit can ignore other models in their unit for the purposes of determining visibility. In addition, if your unit is within Synapse Range of your army, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

Biotide.name: ONRUSHING HORDE
Biotide.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Biotide.target: One TYRANIDS unit from your army (excluding WINGED TYRANID PRIME units), that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Biotide.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

Biotide.name: LIVING AVALANCHE
Biotide.when: Your Movement phase, just after a TYRANIDS unit from your army has opened a Hatchway.
Biotide.effect: Your unit can make a Swarm move. To do so, your unit can be moved up to 3", but at least one model from your unit must end that move on the opposite side of that Hatchway from the one it started the phase on. When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of enemy units.

Biotide.name: SQUIRMING MASSES
Biotide.when: Your Movement phase, at the start of the Reinforcements step.
Biotide.target: One ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit from your army that is in Reserves.
Biotide.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Deep Strike ability and, when setting them upon the battlefield using that ability, they can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy units, provided they are also within Synapse Range of your army.
Biotide.restrictions: You can only use this Stratagem once and, until the end of the turn, your unit is not eligible to declare a charge.

Boarding Swarm.name: LITHE KILLERS
Boarding Swarm.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Boarding Swarm.target: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Boarding Swarm.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a 5+ invulnerable save.

Boarding Swarm.name: ADRENALISED SLAUGHTER
Boarding Swarm.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Boarding Swarm.target: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Boarding Swarm.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6. On a 5+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

Boarding Swarm.name: TALON-TIP SWARM
Boarding Swarm.when: Fight phase, just after a TYRANIDS unit from your army destroys an enemy unit.
Boarding Swarm.effect: If your unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 3". After that move, if your unit is within range of an objective marker and no enemy units are within range of that objective marker, that objective marker is Secured by your army.

Boarding Swarm.name: PREDATORY POUNCE
Boarding Swarm.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit opens a Hatchway.
Boarding Swarm.target: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that is within 3" of that Hatchway and is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Boarding Swarm.effect: Your unit can make a Pounce move. To do so, your unit can be moved up to 3", but must end that move as close as possible to that Hatchway. When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit, but only that enemy unit.

Crusher Stampede.name: SWARM-GUIDED SALVOES
Crusher Stampede.target: One TYRANIDS MONSTER unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Crusher Stampede.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability, and until the end of the phase each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to that model’s Ballistic Skill characteristic and any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

Crusher Stampede.name: SAVAGE ROAR
Crusher Stampede.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Crusher Stampede.target: One TYRANIDS MONSTER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Crusher Stampede.effect: That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test and, until the end of the phase, each time a model in that enemy unit makes an attack that targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll. If that Battle-shock test was failed, subtract 1 from the Wound roll as well.

Crusher Stampede.name: RAMPAGING MONSTROSITIES
Crusher Stampede.target: One TYRANIDS MONSTER unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Crusher Stampede.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

Crusher Stampede.name: MASSIVE IMPACT
Crusher Stampede.when: Your Charge phase, just after a TYRANIDS MONSTER model from your army ends a Charge move.
Crusher Stampede.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your model and roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

Crusher Stampede.name: UNTRAMMELLED FEROCITY
Crusher Stampede.target: One TYRANIDS MONSTER unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
Crusher Stampede.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, it can move through models (excluding TITANIC models) and sections of terrain features that are 4" or less in height. When doing so: It can move within Engagement Range of enemy models, but cannot end that move within Engagement Range of them. It can also move through sections of terrain features that are more than 4" in height, but if it does, after its unit has moved, roll one D6: on a 1, your unit is Battle-shocked.

Crusher Stampede.name: CORROSIVE VISCERA
Crusher Stampede.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after a TYRANIDS MONSTER model from your army with the Deadly Demise ability that cannot FLY is destroyed.
Crusher Stampede.target: That TYRANIDS MONSTER model. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.
Crusher Stampede.effect: Do not roll one D6 to determine whether mortal wounds are inflicted by your model’s Deadly Demise ability. Instead, mortal wounds are automatically inflicted.

Infestation Swarm.name: HYPERADRENAL REFLEXES
Infestation Swarm.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Infestation Swarm.target: One GREAT DEVOURER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Infestation Swarm.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.

Infestation Swarm.name: OUTFLANK
Infestation Swarm.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
Infestation Swarm.target: One GENESTEALERS or PURESTRAIN GENESTEALERS unit from your army that is wholly within an Entry Zone.
Infestation Swarm.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves. It will arrive back on the battlefield in the Reinforcements step of your next Movement phase. When doing so, if it was within one of your Entry Zones when it was removed, it must be set up wholly within another one of your Entry Zones. If it was within one of your opponent’s Entry Zones when it was removed, it must be set up wholly within another one of your opponent’s Entry Zones instead. If this is not possible, your unit is destroyed.

Infestation Swarm.name: PERVASIVE DREAD
Infestation Swarm.when: Fight phase, just after the enemy WARLORD is destroyed (and is not returned to the battlefield) by a GREAT DEVOURER unit from your army.
Infestation Swarm.effect: In your opponent’s next Command phase, each enemy unit on the battlefield must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result. This Stratagem cannot cause a unit to take two Battle-shock tests in the same phase.

Infestation Swarm.name: HUNTING GROUNDS
Infestation Swarm.when: Your Movement phase, just after a GREAT DEVOURER unit from your army opens a Hatchway.
Infestation Swarm.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 3", provided at least one of its models ends that move on the opposite side of that Hatchway from when your unit opened it.

Invasion Fleet.name: ADRENAL SURGE
Invasion Fleet.target: Up to two TYRANIDS units from your army that are within Synapse Range of your army and are eligible to fight, or one other TYRANIDS unit from your army that is eligible to fight.
Invasion Fleet.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in any of those selected units makes an attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

Invasion Fleet.name: RAPID REGENERATION
Invasion Fleet.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Invasion Fleet.target: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Invasion Fleet.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability. If your unit is within Synapse Range of your army, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability instead.

Invasion Fleet.name: DEATH FRENZY
Invasion Fleet.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Invasion Fleet.target: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Invasion Fleet.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model’s unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

Invasion Fleet.name: OVERRUN
Invasion Fleet.when: Fight phase, just before a TYRANIDS unit from your army Consolidates.
Invasion Fleet.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit Consolidates, models in it can move an additional 3" as long as your unit can end that move within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units. If your unit is within Synapse Range of your army and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, instead of making that Consolidation move, it can make a Normal move of up to 6".

Invasion Fleet.name: ENDLESS SWARM
Invasion Fleet.target: Up to two ENDLESS MULTITUDE units from your army that are within Synapse Range of your army, or one other ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit from your army.
Invasion Fleet.effect: You can return up to D3+3 destroyed models to each of the selected units.

Invasion Fleet.name: PREDATORY IMPERATIVE
Invasion Fleet.target: Up to two TYRANIDS units from your army that are within Synapse Range of your army, or one other TYRANIDS unit from your army.
Invasion Fleet.effect: Select one Hyper-adaptation. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Hyper-adaptation is active for those selected units in addition to any other that may be active for your army.
Invasion Fleet.restrictions: You cannot select the same Hyper-adaptation you selected at the start of the first battle round.

Subterranean Assault.name: TUNNEL NETWORK
Subterranean Assault.target: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that is wholly within 9" of one or more of your Tunnel Markers and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Subterranean Assault.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and set it up again, wholly within 9" of another Tunnel Marker you placed, and more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy units.

Subterranean Assault.name: SWARMING ASSAULT
Subterranean Assault.target: One TYRANIDS MONSTER unit from your army that was set up as Reinforcements this turn.
Subterranean Assault.effect: Until the end of the phase, friendly TYRANIDS units within 6" of your unit can re-roll Charge rolls.

Subterranean Assault.name: RETREAT BELOW
Subterranean Assault.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
Subterranean Assault.target: One TYRANIDS unit or up to two BURROWER units from your army that are not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Subterranean Assault.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

Subterranean Assault.name: ENFILADING EMERGENCE
Subterranean Assault.target: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that was set up as Reinforcements this turn.
Subterranean Assault.effect: Until the end of your next Fight phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] and [IGNORES COVER] abilities.

Subterranean Assault.name: ADAPTIVE OPTIMISATION
Subterranean Assault.target: One MAWLOC or TRYGON unit from your army.
Subterranean Assault.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, your unit has the SYNAPSE keyword.

Subterranean Assault.name: REPLENISHING SWARMS
Subterranean Assault.target: One TYRANIDS unit from your army, wholly within 9" of one or more Tunnel Markers you placed.
Subterranean Assault.effect: One model in your unit regains up to D3+1 lost wounds, or you can return up to D3+1 destroyed models with a Wounds characteristic of 1 to your unit, with their full wounds remaining, instead.

Synaptic Nexus.name: SYNAPTIC CHANNELLING
Synaptic Nexus.target: One SYNAPSE unit from your army.
Synaptic Nexus.effect: Until the end of the turn, while a friendly TYRANIDS unit is within 9" of the selected unit, that unit is within Synapse Range of your army.

Synaptic Nexus.name: IRRESISTIBLE WILL
Synaptic Nexus.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Synaptic Nexus.target: One SYNAPSE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase, and one enemy unit within 24" of and visible to the SYNAPSE unit.
Synaptic Nexus.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a friendly TYRANIDS model makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, if the attacking model’s unit is within 6" of your SYNAPSE unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and re-roll a Wound roll of 1.

Synaptic Nexus.name: REINFORCED HIVE NODE
Synaptic Nexus.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Synaptic Nexus.target: One SYNAPSE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Synaptic Nexus.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

Synaptic Nexus.name: THE SMOTHERING SHADOW
Synaptic Nexus.when: Any phase, just after an enemy unit fails a Battle-shock test.
Synaptic Nexus.target: One SYNAPSE unit from your army within 12" of that enemy unit.
Synaptic Nexus.effect: Roll six D6: for each 3+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

Synaptic Nexus.name: IMPERATIVE DOMINANCE
Synaptic Nexus.target: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that is within Synapse Range of your army.
Synaptic Nexus.effect: Select one Synaptic Imperative, even if you have already selected that imperative this battle. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Synaptic Imperative is active for your unit instead of any other Synaptic Imperative that is active for your army.

Synaptic Nexus.name: OVERRIDE INSTINCTS
Synaptic Nexus.target: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that is within Synapse Range of your army and made a Fall Back move this phase.
Synaptic Nexus.effect: Your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge this turn.

Tyranid Attack.name: BIO-ACID SURGE
Tyranid Attack.target: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that is within Synapse Range of your army and has not been selected to fight this phase.
Tyranid Attack.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

Tyranid Attack.name: HIVE SIGHT
Tyranid Attack.target: One TYRANIDS SYNAPSE unit from your army and one friendly TYRANIDS unit that has not declared a charge this phase.
Tyranid Attack.effect: Select one enemy unit that is visible to your SYNAPSE unit. Until the end of the phase, each time your other unit declares a charge, it can include that enemy unit as a target of that charge, even if it is not visible to it, and when doing so, add 1 to the Charge roll.

Tyranid Attack.name: PHAGIC SPORES
Tyranid Attack.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Tyranid Attack.target: One TYRANID WARRIORS WITH MELEE BIO-WEAPONS or TYRANID WARRIORS WITH RANGED BIO-WEAPONS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Tyranid Attack.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed as a result of an attack, do not remove it from play; after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, roll one D6: on a 3-5, the closest enemy unit within 3" of and visible to your unit suffers 1 mortal wound; on a 6, the closest enemy unit within 3" of and visible to your unit suffers 2 mortal wounds. The destroyed model is then removed from play.

Unending Swarm.name: BOUNDING ADVANCE
Unending Swarm.target: One ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit from your army.
Unending Swarm.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.

Unending Swarm.name: SWARMING MASSES
Unending Swarm.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Unending Swarm.target: One ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Unending Swarm.effect: Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability, and If your unit contains 15 or more models, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

Unending Swarm.name: TEEMING MASSES
Unending Swarm.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Unending Swarm.target: One ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Unending Swarm.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

Unending Swarm.name: SYNAPTIC GOADING
Unending Swarm.when: Any phase, just before an ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit from your army that is within Synapse Range of your army makes a Surge move.
Unending Swarm.effect: When making that Surge move, you can re-roll the D6 to determine how far your unit moves, and your unit can end that move as close as possible to the closest objective marker (instead of as close as possible to the closest enemy unit]. All other rules for making Surge moves still apply.

Unending Swarm.name: PRESERVATION IMPERATIVE
Unending Swarm.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Unending Swarm.target: One ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Unending Swarm.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is treated as containing fewer than five models for the purpose of the [BLAST] ability.

Unending Swarm.name: UNENDING WAVES
Unending Swarm.target: One ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
Unending Swarm.effect: Add a new unit to your army identical to your destroyed unit, in Strategic Reserves, at its Starting Strength.
Unending Swarm.restrictions: Any destroyed CHARACTER units that were attached to your unit are not returned. You can only use this Stratagem once per battle.

Vanguard Onslaught.name: ASSASSIN BEASTS
Vanguard Onslaught.target: One VANGUARD INVADER INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Vanguard Onslaught.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PRECISION] ability.

Vanguard Onslaught.name: SURPRISE ASSAULT
Vanguard Onslaught.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after a VANGUARD INVADER unit from your army has selected its targets.
Vanguard Onslaught.effect: Select one enemy unit that was selected as the target of one or more of your unit’s attacks. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, add 1 to the Hit roll. If the Battle-shock test was failed, add 1 to the Wound roll as well.

Vanguard Onslaught.name: UNSEEN LURKERS
Vanguard Onslaught.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Vanguard Onslaught.target: One VANGUARD INVADER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Vanguard Onslaught.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 18" or, if your unit has the Lone Operative ability, if the attacking model is within 6". Your opponent can select new targets for the attacking unit’s attacks.

Vanguard Onslaught.name: INVISIBLE HUNTER
Vanguard Onslaught.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
Vanguard Onslaught.target: Up to two VANGUARD INVADER units from your army, or one TYRANIDS INFANTRY unit from your army.
Vanguard Onslaught.effect: Remove the targeted units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves.
Vanguard Onslaught.restrictions: The targeted units must be more than 3" away from all enemy units.

Vanguard Onslaught.name: HYPERSENSORY SCILLIA
Vanguard Onslaught.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
Vanguard Onslaught.target: Up to two VANGUARD INVADER units from your army that are within 9" of that enemy unit, or one other TYRANIDS INFANTRY unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit.
Vanguard Onslaught.effect: Those selected units can each make a Normal move of up to 6".
Vanguard Onslaught.restrictions: You cannot target units that are within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

Vanguard Onslaught.name: SEEDED BROODS
Vanguard Onslaught.target: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that is in Reserves, or up to two VANGUARD INVADER units from your army that are in Reserves.
Vanguard Onslaught.effect: Until the end of the phase, for the purposes of setting up those selected units on the battlefield, treat the current battle round number as being one higher than it actually is.

Warrior Bioform Onslaught.name: SYNAPTIC AMPLIFICATION
Warrior Bioform Onslaught.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Warrior Bioform Onslaught.target: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Warrior Bioform Onslaught.effect: If that unit is a TYRANID WARRIORS unit, select up to one ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit from your army, that is not Battle-shocked, within 6" of it. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in those units makes an attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1, and, if it is a TYRANID WARRIORS unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 as well.

Warrior Bioform Onslaught.name: RESTORATIVE IMPULSE
Warrior Bioform Onslaught.target: One TYRANID WARRIORS unit from your army that is below its Starting Strength.
Warrior Bioform Onslaught.effect: Return 1 destroyed model (excluding CHARACTER models) to your unit.

Warrior Bioform Onslaught.name: SYNAPTIC MICRONODES
Warrior Bioform Onslaught.target: One TYRANID WARRIORS unit from your army.
Warrior Bioform Onslaught.effect: Select one objective marker you control that your unit is within range of. That objective marker remains under your control until your opponent’s Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase.

Warrior Bioform Onslaught.name: PARASITIC PAYLOAD
Warrior Bioform Onslaught.target: One TYRANID WARRIORS WITH RANGED BIO-WEAPONS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Warrior Bioform Onslaught.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability. After your unit has resolved its shooting attacks this phase, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the turn, models in that unit cannot have the Benefit of Cover.

Warrior Bioform Onslaught.name: SYNAPTIC SHIELD
Warrior Bioform Onslaught.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Warrior Bioform Onslaught.target: One TYRANID WARRIORS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Warrior Bioform Onslaught.effect: If that unit is a TYRANID WARRIORS unit, select up to one ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit from your army, that is not Battle-shocked, within 6" of it. Until the end of the phase, each time a ranged attack targets one of those units, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of that unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

Warrior Bioform Onslaught.name: SPONTANEOUS HYPERCORROSION
Warrior Bioform Onslaught.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Warrior Bioform Onslaught.target: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Warrior Bioform Onslaught.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 2 to the Strength characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit and add 1 to the Strength characteristic of melee weapons equipped by TYRANID WARRIORS and WINGED TYRANID PRIME models in your unit.

Karagar’s Rampagers.name: Rage Unchecked
Karagar’s Rampagers.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
Karagar’s Rampagers.target: One Berzerkers unit from your army that is Below Half-strength and has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Karagar’s Rampagers.effect: Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

Karagar’s Rampagers.name: Unstoppable Fury
Karagar’s Rampagers.when: Fight phase, just before a World Eaters unit from your army Consolidates.
Karagar’s Rampagers.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3", provided your unit ends that Consolidation move within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

Karagar’s Rampagers.name: Overwhelming Onslaught
Karagar’s Rampagers.when: Your Charge phase, just after a World Eaters unit from your army ends a Charge move.
Karagar’s Rampagers.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test and when doing so, subtract 1 from the result.

Berzerker Warband.name: FRENZIED RESILIENCE
Berzerker Warband.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Berzerker Warband.target: One WORLD EATERS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Berzerker Warband.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to a model in your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

Berzerker Warband.name: HACK AND SLASH
Berzerker Warband.target: One WORLD EATERS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase and that made a charge move this turn.
Berzerker Warband.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1.

Berzerker Warband.name: BLOOD OFFERING
Berzerker Warband.target: One WORLD EATERS unit from your army that was just destroyed while it was within range of one or more objective markers you controlled at the end of the previous phase. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
Berzerker Warband.effect: Select one of those objective markers. That objective marker remains under your control until your opponent’s Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase.

Berzerker Warband.name: BERZERKER’S WRATH
Berzerker Warband.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
Berzerker Warband.target: One KHORNE BERZERKERS unit from your army that can make a Blood Surge move as a result of those attacks.
Berzerker Warband.effect: Do not roll a D6 to determine how far models in your unit can move when they make their Blood Surge move. Instead, when making their Blood Surge move, these models can move up to 8".

Berzerker Warband.name: APOPLECTIC FRENZY
Berzerker Warband.when: Your Movement phase, just after a KHORNE BERZERKERS unit from your army is selected to Advance.
Berzerker Warband.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

Berzerker Warband.name: SKULLS FOR THE SKULL THRONE!
Berzerker Warband.when: Fight phase, just after a WORLD EATERS unit from your army destroys a CHARACTER or MONSTER model.
Berzerker Warband.effect: Make a Blessings of Khorne roll and use the results to activate one Blessing of Khorne. Until the end of the battle round, that Blessing of Khorne is active in addition to any other Blessings of Khorne that are currently active.

Boarding Butchers.name: SAVAGE RESILIENCE
Boarding Butchers.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Boarding Butchers.target: One WORLD EATERS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Boarding Butchers.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to a model in your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

Boarding Butchers.name: COWARDS’ BANE
Boarding Butchers.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit is selected to Fall Back.
Boarding Butchers.target: One WORLD EATERS unit from your army (excluding JAKHAL units) within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
Boarding Butchers.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time that enemy unit Falls Back, models in it must take Desperate Escape tests as if their unit was Battle-shocked. When doing so, if that enemy unit is also Battle-shocked by other means, subtract 1 from each of those Desperate Escape tests.

Boarding Butchers.name: TERRIFYING SCREAMS
Boarding Butchers.when: Fight phase, just after a WORLD EATERS unit from your army destroys an enemy unit.
Boarding Butchers.effect: Until the end of your opponent’s next Command phase, subtract 1 from Battle-shock and Leadership tests taken for all enemy units.

Boarding Butchers.name: UNSTOPPABLE RAGE
Boarding Butchers.when: Your Movement phase, just after a WORLD EATERS unit from your army (excluding JAKHAL units) opens a Hatchway.
Boarding Butchers.effect: For each enemy unit within 3" of that Hatchway and wholly on the opposite side of it from your unit, until the start of your next Movement phase, that enemy unit is stunned. While a unit is stunned, each time a model in it makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

Cult of Blood.name: BLOODTHIRSTY HORDE
Cult of Blood.target: One JAKHALS or GOREMONGERS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase and is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Cult of Blood.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit is selected to fight, when determining which models in it are eligible to fight, any models in your unit that are within 3" of one or more enemy models are eligible to fight. When resolving those attacks, such models can target one of those enemy units that is within 3" of them and within Engagement Range of their unit.

Cult of Blood.name: BRAZEN IDOL
Cult of Blood.target: One WORLD EATERS MONSTER or WORLD EATERS TITANIC unit from your army.
Cult of Blood.effect: Select the Idol of Infinite Rage, Idol of Burning Wrath or Idol of Blessed Blood. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Idols of Khorne ability is active for your unit instead of any other Idols of Khorne ability that is active for your army, even if you have already selected that ability this battle.
Cult of Blood.restrictions: You can only use this Stratagem once per battle.

Cult of Blood.name: BLOODY VENGEANCE
Cult of Blood.target: One WORLD EATERS MONSTER or WORLD EATERS TITANIC unit from your army that was just destroyed by an enemy unit. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
Cult of Blood.effect: Until the end of the battle, each time a model in a JAKHALS or GOREMONGERS unit from your army makes an attack that targets the enemy unit that just destroyed your unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

Cult of Blood.name: IN THE SHADOW OF BRASS IDOLS
Cult of Blood.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Cult of Blood.target: One JAKHALS or GOREMONGERS unit from your army that was selected as the target as one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Cult of Blood.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability. If your unit is within 6" of one or more friendly WORLD EATERS MONSTER units, or within 9" of one or more friendly WORLD EATERS TITANIC units, your unit has the Feel No Pain 5+ ability instead.

Cult of Blood.name: FAIL NOT THE BLOOD GOD
Cult of Blood.target: One JAKHALS or GOREMONGERS unit from your army.
Cult of Blood.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. If that model’s unit is within 6" of one or more friendly WORLD EATERS MONSTER units, or within 9" of one or more friendly WORLD EATERS TITANIC units, you can re-roll the Hit roll instead.

Cult of Blood.name: DRAWN TO THE SLAUGHTER
Cult of Blood.target: One JAKHALS unit from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
Cult of Blood.effect: Add a new unit to your army identical to your destroyed unit, in Strategic Reserves, at its Starting Strength.
Cult of Blood.restrictions: This Stratagem cannot be used to return destroyed CHARACTER units to Attached units.

Goretrack Onslaught.name: UNRELENTING ADVANCE
Goretrack Onslaught.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
Goretrack Onslaught.target: One WORLD EATERS VEHICLE model from your army that was hit by one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Goretrack Onslaught.effect: Your model can make a Normal move of up to 6".
Goretrack Onslaught.restrictions: A unit cannot be targeted by this Stratagem and the Fury Unleashed Stratagem in the same phase.

Goretrack Onslaught.name: SMASH THROUGH
Goretrack Onslaught.target: One WORLD EATERS VEHICLE model from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
Goretrack Onslaught.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes a Normal or Advance move, it can move horizontally through terrain features.

Goretrack Onslaught.name: AGGRESSIVE DISEMBARKATION
Goretrack Onslaught.target: One WORLD EATERS RHINO model from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
Goretrack Onslaught.effect: One WORLD EATERS unit embarked within your RHINO can disembark. When doing so, models in that unit can be set up anywhere on the battlefield wholly within 6" of your RHINO and can be set up within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

Goretrack Onslaught.name: FULL-THROTTLE ASSAULT
Goretrack Onslaught.target: One WORLD EATERS RHINO model from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
Goretrack Onslaught.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a WORLD EATERS unit disembarks from that model after it has made a Normal move, that unit is still eligible to declare a charge this turn.

Goretrack Onslaught.name: FURY UNLEASHED
Goretrack Onslaught.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
Goretrack Onslaught.target: One WORLD EATERS RHINO model from your army that has one or more wounds remaining and was hit by one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Goretrack Onslaught.effect: One KHORNE BERZERKERS unit embarked within your model can disembark and make a Blood Surge move.
Goretrack Onslaught.restrictions: A unit cannot be targeted by this Stratagem and the Unrelenting Advance Stratagem in the same phase.

Goretrack Onslaught.name: ENDLESS PURSUIT OF VIOLENCE
Goretrack Onslaught.target: One WORLD EATERS INFANTRY unit from your army and one friendly TRANSPORT that it is able to embark within.
Goretrack Onslaught.effect: If your WORLD EATERS INFANTRY unit is wholly within 6" of that TRANSPORT, it can embark within it.

Khorne Daemonkin.name: DAEMONIC FURY
Khorne Daemonkin.target: One BLOOD LEGIONS unit from your army.
Khorne Daemonkin.effect: Select one friendly WORLD EATERS unit within 6" of your unit. Until the end of the turn, melee weapons equipped by models in your WORLD EATERS unit have the [LANCE] ability. If the Daemonic Rage ability is active for your army, then until the end of the phase those melee weapons also have the [TWIN-LINKED] ability.

Khorne Daemonkin.name: BLESSING OF BURNING BLOOD
Khorne Daemonkin.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Khorne Daemonkin.target: One BLOOD LEGIONS unit from your army that is within 6" of a friendly WORLD EATERS unit that was selected as the target as one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Khorne Daemonkin.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your WORLD EATERS unit have a 5+ invulnerable save. If the Boon of Blood ability is active for your army, then until the end of the phase, models in your WORLD EATERS unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.

Khorne Daemonkin.name: A WORTHY SKULL
Khorne Daemonkin.when: Fight phase, just after a BLOOD LEGIONS or WORLD EATERS unit from your army has fought, and one or more enemy CHARACTER or MONSTER models were destroyed as a result of those attacks.
Khorne Daemonkin.target: That BLOOD LEGIONS or WORLD EATERS unit.
Khorne Daemonkin.effect: You gain D3BTP and you can then spend one or more BTP you have to activate one of the Blood Tithe abilities.

Khorne Daemonkin.name: SUMMONED BY SLAUGHTER
Khorne Daemonkin.when: Any phase, when the last model in a unit is destroyed, before removing it from play. (If that unit is a TRANSPORT, any units embarked within that TRANSPORT model must disembark first.)
Khorne Daemonkin.target: One BLOODLETTERS unit from your army that is in Reserves.
Khorne Daemonkin.effect: Set your unit up anywhere on the battlefield wholly within 9" of that destroyed model and more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy units, then remove the destroyed model from play.
Khorne Daemonkin.restrictions: You cannot use this Stratagem more than once per battle round.

Khorne Daemonkin.name: MURDER-CALL
Khorne Daemonkin.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
Khorne Daemonkin.target: One BLOOD LEGIONS unit from your army that is on the battlefield and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Khorne Daemonkin.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

Khorne Daemonkin.name: DAEMONTIDE
Khorne Daemonkin.target: One WORLD EATERS unit from your army.
Khorne Daemonkin.effect: Select one friendly BLOOD LEGIONS unit within 6" of your unit. One destroyed MOUNTED model, up to D3 destroyed BEAST models, or up to D6 destroyed INFANTRY models are returned to that BLOOD LEGIONS unit with their full wounds remaining.
Khorne Daemonkin.restrictions: This Stratagem cannot be used to return destroyed CHARACTER models to Attached units.

Possessed Slaughterband.name: IMMORTAL FURY
Possessed Slaughterband.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Possessed Slaughterband.target: One WORLD EATERS POSSESSED unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Possessed Slaughterband.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model’s unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

Possessed Slaughterband.name: DAEMONIC STRENGTH
Possessed Slaughterband.target: One WORLD EATERS POSSESSED unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Possessed Slaughterband.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack made by a model in your unit is allocated to an enemy model, if your unit has the EIGHTBOUND keyword and that enemy model is not a MONSTER or VEHICLE, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of that attack. If your unit has the EXALTED EIGHTBOUND keyword and that enemy model is a MONSTER or VEHICLE, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of that attack instead.

Possessed Slaughterband.name: DAEMONIC RESISTANCE
Possessed Slaughterband.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Possessed Slaughterband.target: One WORLD EATERS POSSESSED unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Possessed Slaughterband.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

Possessed Slaughterband.name: WARP STALKERS
Possessed Slaughterband.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
Possessed Slaughterband.target: One WORLD EATERS POSSESSED unit from your army that has not been selected to move or declare a charge this phase.
Possessed Slaughterband.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move, it can move through enemy models (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES). When doing so, it can move within Engagement Range of such models but, unless that move was a Charge move, it cannot end that move within Engagement Range of them, and any Desperate Escape test is automatically passed.

Possessed Slaughterband.name: RAPID MANIFESTATION
Possessed Slaughterband.target: One EXALTED EIGHTBOUND unit from your army that is arriving using the Deep Strike ability this phase.
Possessed Slaughterband.effect: Your unit can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy units.
Possessed Slaughterband.restrictions: A unit targeted with this Stratagem is not eligible to declare a charge in the same turn.

Possessed Slaughterband.name: HORRIFYING VIOLENCE
Possessed Slaughterband.target: One WORLD EATERS POSSESSED unit from your army.
Possessed Slaughterband.effect: Each enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from that test.

Skullsworn.name: SHOCKING ONSLAUGHT
Skullsworn.when: Your Movement or Charge phase, just after an enemy unit is selected to fire Overwatch.
Skullsworn.target: One WORLD EATERS unit from your army.
Skullsworn.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy unit is selected to fire Overwatch, it must take a Leadership test, subtracting 1 from the result: if failed, that enemy unit cannot fire Overwatch at your unit this phase.

Skullsworn.name: BLOOD RITE
Skullsworn.when: Fight phase, just after a WORLD EATERS TERMINATOR, EIGHTBOUND or EXALTED EIGHTBOUND unit from your army destroys an enemy unit.
Skullsworn.effect: Select one objective marker that your unit or the destroyed unit was within range of at the start of the phase. That objective marker is Secured by your army.

Skullsworn.name: FURIOUS MOMENTUM
Skullsworn.target: One WORLD EATERS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Skullsworn.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile-in or Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3".

Skullsworn.name: RUINOUS RAMPAGE
Skullsworn.target: One WORLD EATERS TERMINATOR, EIGHTBOUND or EXALTED EIGHTBOUND unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase and has not declared a charge this phase.
Skullsworn.effect: Until the end of the phase, when making a Normal, Advance or Charge move, your unit can move through a single closed Hatchway as if it was open. When doing so, that Hatchway is opened and cannot be closed for the rest of the battle. This can allow that unit to declare a charge against enemy units that are not visible to it, but to do so those enemy units must be within 1" of that Hatchway and wholly on the opposite side of it from your unit.
Skullsworn.restrictions: You can only use this Stratagem once per turn.

Vessels of Wrath.name: ASPIRE TO INFAMY
Vessels of Wrath.target: One KHORNE BERZERKERS or JAKHALS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase and is within 8" of one or more friendly WORLD EATERS CHARACTER models.
Vessels of Wrath.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of melee weapons equipped by non-CHARACTER models in your unit by 1.

Vessels of Wrath.name: BRAZEN CONTEMPT
Vessels of Wrath.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Vessels of Wrath.target: One WORLD EATERS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Vessels of Wrath.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll, or, if it is a VESSEL OF WRATH unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll instead.

Vessels of Wrath.name: OVERSHADOWED BY NONE
Vessels of Wrath.target: One WORLD EATERS INFANTRY, WORLD EATERS MOUNTED or WORLD EATERS DAEMON PRINCE unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Vessels of Wrath.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

Vessels of Wrath.name: GORY DEDICATION
Vessels of Wrath.target: One WORLD EATERS unit from your army that destroyed one or more enemy models with a melee attack this phase.
Vessels of Wrath.effect: Select one objective marker you control that your unit is within range of. That objective marker remains under your control until your opponent’s Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase.

Vessels of Wrath.name: PUNISH THE CRAVEN
Vessels of Wrath.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) is selected to Fall Back.
Vessels of Wrath.target: One WORLD EATERS INFANTRY or WORLD EATERS DAEMON PRINCE unit from your army within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
Vessels of Wrath.effect: When that enemy unit Falls Back, all models in that enemy unit must take a Desperate Escape test. When doing so, if your unit is a VESSEL OF WRATH  unit, subtract 1 from each of those tests.

Vessels of Wrath.name: MEET FORCE WITH FORCE
Vessels of Wrath.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
Vessels of Wrath.target: One WORLD EATERS INFANTRY, WORLD EATERS MOUNTED or WORLD EATERS DAEMON PRINCE unit from your army that lost one or more wounds as a result of those attacks.
Vessels of Wrath.effect: Your unit can make a Blood Surge move. To do so, roll one D6: models in your unit move a number of inches up to the result, but your unit must end that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit (excluding AIRCRAFT). When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit. If your unit is a KHORNE BERZERKERS or VESSEL OF WRATH  unit, you can re-roll the D6 to determine how far your unit can move.
